Title: Project
Answer.transcript: kwiindaba zethu emini nje ayaphokoka amazwi ovelwano emva kokusweleka kowayesakuba ngumphathiswa kwi ofisi yomongameli  yoogqirha Isophahad ngalentsasa. Kusweleke abantu abalishumi elinesixhenxe  kuqhushumbo lwerhasi  eBoksburg kwiMpuma randi . Kweze midlalo ibanyana banyana ifikelele kwisivumelwano semali ne SAFA kanye phambi kokunduluka isindise indebe yehlabathi eAustralia nase New Zealand.Molweni nonke aphekhaya sisamkela nani babukeli bethu kwi Jereyi DDT ndingaphozisanga maseko mandigawule ndiwarhuqa .Owaba ngumphathiswa wokuqala kwiofisi yobongameli ulilandulele eliphakade eneminyaka engamashumi asibhozo anesine ubudala. Ugqirha Pahad waba ngumphathiswa wokuqala ukuchphela i arhenti yoqhagamshelwano ka rhulumente iGCIS uzakufihlwa ngecala emva kwentsimbi yesibini le siya kuyo eWestPark. Ukanti inkonzo yomngcwabo iza kubanjelwa e Heroes acre.Kowu unyana wetsha ntliziyo le nkululeko uRhola Moseni Smile Pahad owayibeka inqawe ngo2001 ugqirha Esop Pahad wazalwa nge 21 ka June 1939 eSchweyzenech emntla ntshona.Uwunabele uqaqaqa eneminyaka eyi84.Ube engu njingalwazi nge ph.d yezifundo zembali azingxongxothe kumthombo wedyunivesithi yase UK i Sussex .Nomgomo wayo owawuqangatha iintshukumo zopoliyiko zamaNdiya emzantsi Afrika . Ekwasisinxiba mxhaga kwizifundo zobungcaphephe kubugcisa bezopolitiko zelizwekazi iAfrika.Ngekambe ubesisithwalandwe nakwidyunivesithi i Witwatersrand kwizifundo zenzululwazi zopolitiko.UPahad usikhonzile isizwe njengomphathiswa kwi ofisi yokongamela yaseMzantsi Afrika.Exeluxanduva lwamalungelo abantwana,izimo zabakhubazekileyo,intlalo yamanina,ikomishini yolutsha ,unxibelelwano kurhulumente neenkqubo zobuxhakaxhaka banamhla.Ibhunga lokukhuthaza utyalo mali kumazwe jikelele ekwakwi arhente yophuhliso yamajelo eendaba okuba abandakanye uluntu ngokungenamkhethe .Izihlalo nezikhundla ubethenjwe ngazo kungasa sizibala .Utshatshele kuzo washiya umzila ozinzileyo kungoko umongameli uCyril Ramaphosa egxwale emswaneni ephosa amazwi oxolo emakaxakathwe lusapho,izihlobo ,iinkokheli,nalilizwe jikelele ngelixesha lokukhatywa kwebhekile kwelibhongo lesizwe.Ukanti uza kufihlwa namhlanje ugqirha Eso Pahad malunga nentsimbi yesibini EWestPark eRhawutini . Ndim lo Lilitha Ntsundazwe kwiindaba ze SABC.ukanti kengoku siqhagamshelana nqo nomhleli wendaba zopolititoi SABC umnumzana Mzwandile Beje nozakusityebisela banzi ngesingakulindela ngalemvakwemini xa kubekwa ugqirha Pahad.Sibulise Shandu sibulele nangexesha lakho .unikwe eliphi izinga lomngcwabo waseburhulumenteni ugqirha Pahad?Sibonge Siyavuya sibingelele nakubabukeli nebala sibonile istatimenti esiphuma kulowo ongumongameli nje ngamanje obambile wazengamela umongameli wezwe uCyril Ramaphosa ungaphandle use DRC okutsho ukuthi ibamba likamongameli namhlanje nguPaul Mashatile usetheke uzomnika izinga lesibili lokuhlonitshwa uma kuwukuthi ke labo abadlala iqhaza elibalulekile sebedlulile emhlabeni.Njengoba usuhilo ke sizwile futhi sekushiwo ukuthi uhambile udokotela uPahad.Uzofihlwa ke kulezizindawo ke , kulemingcwabo yalapha e WestPark nzothi nje ukuqhela kancane khona uzobona ingcwaba lakhe seligutshiwe sekulindwe ukuthi manje mangabe umcimbi usuqala ke ngesikhathi leso ekushiwo ngaso silindele ukuthi beqale bafike abantu balapha ngehora lesibili kodwa njengokuba ubona kusematasatasa ke ngoba abantu basazama ukufaka amatende akuyiwona phela azokwenza ukuthi abazokusingatha umndeni wakwa Pahad bahlale khona .Esikwaziyo futhi yikuthi uzoba yisigaba nje esizoba sifutshane   somndeni lapho bazothi fahlafahla ngamazwi kodwa ke kuyothi makuyiwa esingcwabeni esisemthethweni njengoba eseshilo ukuthi ibamba likamongamelilixoxe ukuthi ke loludambe kombe ubesezingeni likarhulumeni.

Title: Project
Answer.transcript: Kwiindaba zethu emini nje, ayaphokoka amazwi ovelwano emva kokusweleka owayesabangu ngumphathiswa kwioffisi yomongameli yogqirha oyisaphakati ngale ntsasa nje. Kusweleke abantu abalishumi elinesixhenxe kuqhushumbo lwerhasi eBoskburg kwimpumarandi.  Kwezemidlalo iBanyana Banyana ifikelele kwisivumelwano semali neSAFA kanye phambi kokuba induluke isingise kwindebe yehlabathi eAustralia naseNewzland.Molweni apha ekhaya sisamnkela nani babukeli bethu kwijelo leJLT ,ndingaphozisanga maseko ,mandigawule ndiwarhuqa. Owabangumphathi wokuqala kwiofissi yobumongameli, ugqirha Essop pahad ulilandulele eli phakade  eneminyaka engamashumi asibhozo anesine ubudala. Ugqrirha Pahad wabangumphathiswa wokuqala ukuchophela aiarhente yokuqala yozoqhakamshelwano kaRhulumenti iGCIS. Uza kufihlwa ngecala emva kwentsimbi yesibini  le siya kuyo eWest park, ukanti inkonzo yomngcwabo iza kubanjwela eHerozac. Kowu unyana wetsha ntliziyo lenkululeko uGoolam Hoosein Ismail Pahad owayibek inqawa ngo20001. Ugqirha Essopal Pahad wazalwa nge21 kaJune ngonyaka ka1939 eSchweizer-Reneke  emntla Ntshona ulunabele uqaqa enemninyaka eyi84. Ube engunjingalwazi ngePhd yezifundo zembali azinxonxothe kumthombo wasedyunivesithi yaseUK iSussex, nomgomo wayo owawugangatha iintshukumo zopolitiko zamandiya eMzantsi Afrika. Ekwasisinxiba-buxhaka semfundo zobungcaphephe kubugcisa zobupolitiko zelizwekazi iAfrika.Nge kambe ubesisithwalwandwe kwidyunivesithi yaseWitwastrand kwizifundo zonzululwazi yezepolitiko. UPahad usikhonzile isizwe njengomphathiswa kwiofisi yokongamela eMzantsi Afrika exanduxanduva amalungelo wabantwana, izimo zabakhubazekileyo, intlalo yamanina, ikomishini yolutsha unxibelelwano kurhulumento neenqubo zobuxhakaxhaka banamhla, ibhunga lokukhuthaza utyalo mali kumazwe jikelele ekwakwiarhente yophuhliso yamajelo endaba ukuba abandakany eulundu ngokungenamkhethe. Izihlalo nezikhundla ebethenjwe ngazo kungasa sizibala utshatshele kuzo washiya umzila ozinzileyo. Kungoko Ucyril Ramaphosa egxwale emswaneni ephosa amazwi oxolo omaluxakathe lusapho, zizihlobo iinkokheli nalilizwe ngeli xesha lokukhatywa kwebhekile ngobelibhongo lesizwe. Ukanti ke uza kufihlwa namhanje ugqirha Essop Pahad malunga nentsibi yesibin eWet park eRhawutini. Ndim lo Lilitha Ntsundwani kwiindaba zeSABC. Ukanti ke ngokwesiqhakamshelwano nqo nomhleli wendaba zepolitiko iSABC umnumzana Mzwandile Mbhenje nozakusityebisela banzi ngesizakulindela ngale mva kwemini xa kubakwa ugqirha Pahad.Sibulise Shandu sibulele nangexesha lakho. Unikwe eliphi izinga lomgcwabo ugqirha Pahad? Ngawutsho ke Shandu ingaba sele siyazi ukuba iza kubanjwa nin inkonzo yesikhumbuzo yakhe. Sithi tshotsho ubekho Shandu kandaba, lowo ngumhleli wendaba zepolitiko apha ekhaya umnumzana Mzwandile Mbhenje. Lonyuke lafikelela kwishumi elinesixhenxe inani labantu abaswelelkileyo ukulandlea ukuvuza kwerhasi olukhokeleleke kuqhushumbo kwindawo yokugoba ityholo iAngelo eBoksburh empumarandi. Esi sehlo sibandakanya abasetyhini , abantwanakunye nabanye abalishumi elinye abasesibhedle. Inkulu yabaphathi yaseGauteng  umnumanzana Phanyaza lisufi uqinisekise  ngenani labachaphazekileyo nokhuseleko lwabo. Kusaqinisekiswe ngabantu abalishumi elinesixhenxe abathe bachaphazelaka kwisehlo saseBoksburg emva kokuvuza kwerhasi kumatyotyobhe ase enjelo ngokuhlwa kwayizolo, Abanye basesesibhedlele.  Inkulu baphathisi iqinisekisile ngokuthe kwenzeka. Inxabalo kubahlali ingaba iirhasi azizukuphinda ziqhushumbe kusini na, kodwa inkulu baphathiswa yathi kusekhona nengxelo elindelelekileyo malunga nale nyewe. Abahlali bakhalazela ukungakwazi nokulala kwindwo yabo ngenxa yeziqhushumbizi ezivakayo yonke indawo. Uthi ingxaki kukuba kunzima nokulala bayangxolelwa kukho nemigodi ngapha nangapha. Kunzima nakukhuseleko kuba amapolisa ayafumbathiswa. Ukanti le ndawo inengxaki noozamazama neziqhushumbisi kuquka nolwaphulo mthetho. Apho kubuhlungu khona kukuba abantu baphulukene nezihlobo,nezalamane zabo ngenxa yesi sehlo. Umongameli ongumfela ndawonye wemanyano zabasebenzi Icosadu uZingiswa losi ukhokela uqhanqalazo lwabasebenzi eGqeberha eMpumakoloni. Lo mfelandawonye uququzele uqhanqalazo losuku olunye kwize lonke oluqaqambisa iniba edla umzi kwezabasebenzi nakuluntu lweli. ULosi uthi bazakugqithisa intlaninge yamagxwebhu yezinyanzeliso zabo kumasebe ehlukeneyo.Ukufumana iinkcukhacha ezinabile ngeli nqaku masive kwintatheli yethu uLwando Nomoyi eGqberha. Mandithathe eli thuba ndizibulisele kubabukeli emakhaya, namhlanje silapha eNongoza jebe apho ke umanyano wabasabenzi iCOSATU uzobe ubambe umngcelele ukuyotsho kwicity role yalapha eGqeberha bephakamisa izikhalazo bezonikezela noxwebhu lwezinyanzeliso kumasebebe ohlukaneyo bekhalela into yokuba intswelo ngqesho, icrime , icorruption nezinye izinto abazakuzibalula. Kodwa ke apha enqubeni namhlanje ndinaye umongameli weCOSATU umama uZingiswa losi. Mama basikubulise sikwamnkele apha enqubeni , khawusixelele ngento yemini yanamhlanhe nezinto eniza kuzenza apho siya khona. Mandibulise kuwe msasazi nakubabukeli nakubaphulaphuli beSABC. Namhlanje sidibene apha eGqeberha kodwa kwilizwe lonke loMzantsi Africa kumaphondo alithoba , thina apha eVuyisile mini square siyonikezela ke uxwebhu lwezikhalazo kodwa singanikezeli zikhalazo sinikezela nezisombululo kwingxaki esizibonayo. Siyonika ke ophethe isixeko uMayor sinike umphathi wamapolisa , sinike ke ophetheyo ke kwicala labasebenzi Department of employment and labour , siphinde kwakhona sinikezele kuMEC onikwe ukuba makaphathe kwicandelo lwezomnotho. Sithi ke  imiba esijongene nayo eMzantsi Africa yimiba efika ichaphazele abasebenzi ichaphazele nabangaphangeliyo, imiba yentswela ngqesho, imiba yorhwaphilizo.

Title: Project
Answer.transcript: Kwindaba zethu emini nje, ayaphokoka amazi ovelwano emva kokusweleka kowaye sabanguba ngumphathiswa kwi ofisi yomongameli uQhirha Essop Pahad ngalentsasa.  Kusweleke abantu abalishumi elinesixhenxe kuqhushumbo lwerhasi e Boksburg kwiMpuma Randi.  Kwezemidlalo, iBanyana Banyana ifikilele kwisivumelano semali ne SAFA Kanye phambi konduluka isingise kwindebe yehlabathi e Australia nase New Zealand.  Molweni nonke apha ekhaya sisamkela nani babukeli bethu kwijelo elithi ndingaphozisanga maseko mandigawule ndiwarhuqa.  Owaba ngumphathiswa wokuqala kwi ofisi yomongameli uQhirha Essop Pahad ulandulele eliphakade eneminyaka engamashumi asibhozo anesine ubudala, uQhirha Pahad waba ngumphathiswa wokuqala ukuchophela i arhenti yezoqhagamishelwano ka rhulumente I GCIS. Uzakufihlwa ngecala emva lentsimi yesibini le siya kuyo e Westpark, ukanti inkonzo yomngcwabo izakubanjelwa e Heroes Acre.  Kowu unyana wetsha ntliziyo lenkululeko u Goolam Hoosain Ismael Pahad, owayibeka inqawe ngo 2001, uQhirha Essop Pahad owazalwa nge 21 Ka June ngo 1939 e Schweizer-Reneke emtla ntshona, ulinabele uqaqaqa emva kweminyaka eyi-84. Ube engunjinga lwazi nge PHD yezifundo zembali azinxonxothe kumthombo we Dyunivesithi yase UK I Sussex, nomgomo wayo owawugangatha intshukumo zopolitiko zamandiya eMzantsi Afrika ekwabasisinxiba mxhaga sezifundo zobungcaphephe kubugcisa zopolitiko zelizwekazi I Africa. Ngekambe ubesisithwalandwe nakwi Dyunivesithi I Witwatersrand kwizifundo zenzululwazi yezopolitiko. U Pahad usikhonzile isizwe njengomphathiswa kwi ofisi yokongamela yaseMzantsi Africa, exaluxanduva lwamalungelo abantwana, izimo zabakhubazekileyo, intlalo yamanina, ikomishini yolutsha, unxebelelwano kurhulumente nenqubo zobuxhakaxhaka zanamhla, ibhunga lokukhuthaza utyalo mali kumazwe jikelele, ekwa kwi arhente yophuhliso yamajelo endaba ukuba abandakanye uluntu ngokungena mkhethe. Izihlalo nezikhundla ebethenjwe ngazo kungasa sizibala, utshatshele kuzo washiya umzila ozinzileyo. Kungoko uMongameli u Cyril Ramaphosa egxwale emswaleni ephosa amazwi oxolo emaluxakathwe lusapho, zizihlobo, inkokheli, nalilizwe jikelele ngelixesha lokukhatshwa kwebhekile ngobeli bhongo lesizwe ukanti uzakufihlwa namhlanje uQhirha Essop Pahad malunga nentsimbi yesibini e Westpark eRhawutini. Ndim lo Lilitha Ntsundwani kwindaba ze SABC.  Ukanti kengoku siqhagamishelana nqo nomhleli wendaba zopolitiko unomzana Mzwandile Mbeje nozakusityebisela banzi ngesingakulindela ngelemva kwemini xa kubekwa uQhirha Pahad. Sibulise Shandu sibulele nangexesha lakho, unikwe eliphi izinga lomngcwabo waseburhulumenteni uQhirha Pahad? Khawutsho ke Shandu okokugqibela ingaba sele siyazi ukuba izobanjwa nini inkonzo yesikhumbuzo yakhe? Sithi tshotsho ubekho Shandu kandaba, lowo ngumhleli wendaba zopolitiko apha ekhaya umnomzana Mzwandile Mbeje.  Lunyuke lwafikelela kwishumi elinesixhenxe inani labantu abaswelekileyo ukulandela ukuvusa kwe rhasi eqokelelwe kuqhushumbo kwindawo yogobityholo I Angelo e Boksburg kwiMpuma Randi. Esisehlo sibandakanya owasetyhini, abantwana, kunye nabanye abalishumi elinanye basesibhedlele. Inkulu baphathiswa yase Gauteng umnumzana Phanyaza Lesufi uqinisekise ngenani labantu abachaphazekileyo nokhuseleko lwabo.  Kusaqinisekwiswe ngabantu abalishumi elinesixhenxe abathe bachaphazeleka kusehlo esenzeke e Boksburg emva kokuvuza kwe rhasi kuma tyotyombe ase Angelo ngokuhlwa kwayizolo, abanye basesibhedlele. Inkulu baphathiswa iqinisekisile ngokuthe kwenzeka. Inxalabo kubahlali kukuba ingaba iirhasi azizuphinda ziqhushumbe kwisini na kodwa inkulu baphathiswa yathi kusekhona  nengxelo elindelekileyo malunga nale nyewe. Abahlali bakhalazela ukungakwazi nokulala kwindawo yabo ngenxa yeziqhushumbisi ezivakala yonke indawo. Uthi ingxaki kukuba kunzima nokulala bayangxolelwa kukho nemigodi ngapha nangapha, kunzima nakukhuseleko kuba amapolisa ayafumbathiswa, ukanti lendawo inengxaki nozama Zama neziqhushumbisi kuquka nolwaphulo mthetho. Apho kubuhlungu khona kukuba abantu baphukene nezihlobo nezalamane zabo ngenxa yesisehlo.  Umongameli womfela ndawonye womanyano zabasabenzi I Cosatu u Zingiswa losi ukhokhela uqhanqalazo lwabasebenzi eGqeberha eMpuma Koloni. Lomfela ndawonye uququzelele uqhanqalazo losuku olunye kuzwelonke uqaqambisa imiba edlumzi kwezabasebenzi nakuluntu lweli. uLosi uthi bazakugqithisa intlaningi yamaxwebhu yezinyanzeliso zabo kumasebe ohlukeneyo, ukufumana incukacha ezinabileyo ngelinqaku masive kwintatheli yethu u Lwando Nomoyi eGqeberha.  Lwando Nomoyi: Mandithathe elithuba ndizibulisele kubabukeli emakhaya, namhlanje silapha eNangoza Jebe apho ke umanyano lwabasebenzi uCosatu uzabe ebambe umngcelele uyotsho kwi city hall yalapha eGqeberha bephakamisa izikhalazo, bezanikezela noxwebhu lezinyanzeliso kumasebe ohlukeneyo bekhalela into yokubana intswela ngqesho, I crime, I corruption nezinye izinto abazakuzibalula. Kodwa ke apha enkqubeni namhlanje ndinaye umongameli we Cosatu umama uZingiswa Losi, mama masikubulise sikwamkele enkqubeni khasixelele nje ngemini yanamhlanje nento enizazenza apho siya khona.  Zingiswa Losi: Mandibulise kuwe msasazi ndibulise nakubabukeli nakubaphulaphuli be SABC. Namhlanje sidibene apha eGqeberha kodwa kumhlaba wonke ..... Ilizwe konke, ndiyaxolisa loMzantsi Africa kumaphondo alithoba, sisiya thina apha eVuyisile mini square siyonikezela ke uxwebhu lwezikhalazo kodwa singanikezeli zikhalazo sinikezela nezisombululo kwingxaki esizibonayo. Siyonika ke ophethe isixeko u mayor, sinike umphathi wamapolisa, sinike ophetheyo apha kwicandelo labasebenzi I Department of Employment and labour, siphinde kwakhona sinikezele ku MEC onikwe ukuba makaphathe kwicandelo lozomnotho. Sithi ke siyi Cosatu imiba esijongene nayo eMzantsi Afrika yimiba efika ichaphazele abasebenzi, ichaphazele nabangaphangeliyo,imiba yentswela ngqesho, imiba yorhwaphilizo....

Title: Project
Answer.transcript: Imiba yobundlobongela, imiba yokungalingani kwimivuzo abantu abayifumanayo emisebenzini. Enkosi kakhulu mongameli. Ngumongameli weCOSATU lowo uMam'uZingiswa Losi esixelela nje ngemibaba esayiphakamisa nexwebhu lezikhalazo nezinyanzeliso abazawuzisa eCity Hall. Kodwa ke masithathe ezintambo siziphose apho kuni eGauteng.  Kwalapha ezindabeni, abahlali behostele eDalton eThekwini batyholwa ngelithi ukungathalelwa lokungalondolozwa kwayo kuko okubanga ukuba ibe kwimeko engaginyisi mathe, kodwa masithume umntwana evenkileni kuqala.  Sinamkele kwakhona, samkele nabo abasanda kungena. Siniphathele ezindaba ziza ngqo kwikomku leSABC apha eAuckland Park eGauteng. Uyakwazi ke ukufumana ezindaba ukuphela kwazo kwikhasi leYouTube ngokuba uthi "SABC indaba zesiXhosa", ukanti ke makesiphinde silume kwinqaku lethu elitshotshe ntla ngalemva kwemini. Owaba ngumphathi wokuqala kwiofisi yobongameli ugqirha Essop Pahad ulilandulele eliphakade eneminyaka engamashumi asibhozo anesine ubudala. Ugqirha Pahad waba ngumphathi wokuqala kwiofisi yobongameli ukucofel'iarhente yoqhagamshelwano karhulumente iGCIS. Uzakifihlwa malunga nentsimbi yesibini ngalemva kwemini eWest Park. Ukanti inkonzo yomngcwabo izakubanjelwa eEurosec.  Ngoku, masicaphule amagqabantshintshi eziye zaqaqamba kwihlabathi. Ilizwe laseEurope lithumele iRocket uAriane wesihlanu emajukujukwini esibhakabhaka. Ityelo lokuqala emva kwamashumi amane eminyaka, ithwele iiSatellite ezimbini zoqhagamshelwano lomkhosi. UAriane wesithandathu uzakulandela ekuzeni kokuphela konyaka.  Umqhubo kaIsiraele utshale imoto yakhe kwisiqhu sabaqhanqalazi baseTellavive, konzakala ababini ngelixa omnye engqutjwe wabhukuleza phantsi. Amapolisa amngcine  evalelweni lomqhubu, kodwa lusaqhuba uqhanqalazo lokuba kubiliselwe intando yesininzi. Amapolisa achophe phezu kwezithende elinde unogekehli.  Qakatha-qelele kwelamaDutch. Iziphathimandla ziqalisile ukukhuculula emva kwesichotho eidlakaze elilizwe sasuba umphefumlo onmye qwaba. Imimoya evuthuza ngamandla esiphule nengcambu imithi, kwavaleka nendlela.  Xasiqwel'ingqokoqo, kwinyanga ephelileyo izinqana zakwaMeta noTwitter zisongeleni ngelithi zifunana esiqwini ngaphaya kwerhaladiya nomdiyadiya. UElon Musk use ngundabamlonyeni ngucutha inani lemiyalezo enokufundwa kuTwitter. Ngeilixa uMark Zuckerberg esungule inqubo yokudwelisa imiba ethe-ndi kwiqonga leInstagram. "I will launch in Threads an open and friendly public space for conversations, it takes the best parts of Instagram experience and create a whole new app around text, ideas and sharing what's on your mind". Ijaji eyintloko yaseMelika ikhuphe umyalelo wokuba amagosa kamongameli Joe Biden waseMelika ehlisele ukufaka umphokophelo wempumlo yawo kumoqonga ezongxibelelwano, qongqololo. Abahlali behostele eDalton eThekwini bathi ukusilela kolondolozo lwezakhiwo neziseko zophuhliso ngunobangela wokubola nokungabikho kokucoceka kwinhlalo yabo, okwatjholwa nangokwanda kwamatjotjombe kulendawo njengoba konyuse izenzo zobudlobongela.  "Amahostele aseThekwini amanye awo adume kabi ngokuhlala iinkabi, ayenzelwe ukuhlala abesilisa absebenzela emadolophini. Kepha manje, amukele nabesifazane neyingane. Ihostele iDalton, selineyinkulungwane neyinkulungwane zabantu, bakhala ngokubola kwamabhilidi nengqalazine ezindala, ubugebengu nokugcwala ngokweqile". "Lack of inspection, yiyona ebalulekileyo, ukusukela phezulu emkhandlweni ukuza konsumpa. Onsumpa esinabo abakhona esinabo kufane engabe yibona ababheka isimo samahostele ukuthi ngabe izakho yisame kahle yini. Bafika wangazi ukuthi futhi uzoqala lutho awazi uzoqala uzobeni manje. Iithezi ziyadabuka abantu bengafela endlini noma yinini." Abesifazane neyingane sebehlala lapha bakhala ngeyintsiza eyikude". "Imitholampilo asinayo, sineyingane, amakhreshi aninawo, umangabe ingane igula noma ugula 'as' umhlali uthi uya eKing Edward bayakuxosha". Liphezulu inani lamadoda asengcuphekweni lokuzibulala ngenxa yokonganyelwa zinziko zobubomi nezigulo eziamene nengqondo. Into yokuqala Bhele ekufuneka uyenzile kukuyamkela imekeko yakho, into yokubana ndinalemeko yocinzelelo lwengqondo, neyithi indeze ndifune ukuzama okanye ndizame ukuzibulala. Eyesibini Bhele kukuthetha nabantu abenze i-professional studies. Uhambe uyofuna ukululeko ngokwasengqondweni, ngabantu keh abaqeqeshelwe lonto leyo abafana ne-psychologist ne-psychiatrist. Kodwa ke nokuthetha nabanye abantu ngeengxaki zakho. Ngoba eyonanto iyenza okokubana sibe kulengxaki sikuyo, singabantu abazivalela ngaphakathi kuba sikhula pha emakhaya Bhele kusithwa indoda ayikhali, xaingaba ukhala kuthwa ufuz'unyoko. Ngoku uyangqurhuleka ngaphakathi utyiwa yilento ikutyayo inzima, ubangazama xa ulala ikugcina uhleli ngoba kaloku ubangaba uthetha noBhele, uBhele uzathi "hayi mfondini subalibhetyebhetye". Kanti ubangaba uzothetha noZola oqeqeshelwe lento, uzawubuza into yokubana kutheni uziva ngoluhlobo. Yima ke Mncilashe, inyathelo lokuqala iba leliphi? Masenze umzekelo; Masithi mhlawumbi uyamangalelwa noba kuse-Police Station uyindoda ebethwa ngumama, mhlawumbi amapolisa ahleke njalo-njalo. Abantu abangamadoda ke ngoku bafela ngaphakathi, inyathelo lokuqala ke ngoku lokumelana nalonto leliphi? Elokuqala Bhele kukuhamba uyofuna uncedo kubantu boluleko lwengqonda. Iya ku-psychologist, iya ku-psychaiatrist, iya ku-social worker. Zikhona keh nezinye indawo ezifana noSADAC ezinceda ukulululeka ingqondo yomntu, noba xaingaba mhlawumbi unenxaki unayo ngokwasengqondweni babebekunikeza uncedo olukhawulezileyo ngelixesha basazama ukuxhonxa bekunika amandla wokubana ukwazi ukumelana nalemeko. Uyabona ke ezizinto uzithethayo zokuba indoda ebethwayo ekhaya ithi xa ifika e-Police Station ifike iyomangala kuhlekwe okanye indoda edlwengulweyo kufikwe kuhlekwe. Zezona zinto Bhele ezenz'intokubana abantu bethu bangakwazi ngomso into yokubana bathethe ngikuthe gabalala, ufumanisi into yokubana ke ngoku umntu uyothuka xake dibana ezonwabele. Uthi ndike ndazama ukizibulala ngenxa yenzingo zobubomi, kodwa ndinguyelo ngoku akusekhonto ezakwenza ndiza'ukuzibulala ngoba kaloku ndakwazi mna ukuphakama ndiye kwezindawo zinoncedo. Kodwa ngaphandleni koko, ndaba nosapho Bhele, inxaso yasekhaya. Ngokuqala kwam kwakungo 2007, inxaso ndayifumana ekhaya ngoko ndingekabi nonkosikazi. Ndayifumana inxaso yanintsi kakhulu, ndazibona ndingumntu owesibini. Okwesibini kube ngo 2016, inxaso kankosikazi apho nabantu basekhaya yiyo eyandenza into yokubana ndiyamkele, ngo 2007 zange ndiyamkele Bhele, kodwa ngo 2016 ndikwazile uyamkela into yokubana ndiphila nalemeko yesifo socinzelwelo lwengqondo, noluthi lundithumele. Ngoku ndinepilisi endizisebenzisayo Bhele ezesisgulo esindenza into yokubana ndibe suicidal. So ndathi ndisawuzazi ezozinto ezo, ndayamkela into yokubana ndinalemeko. Tshetshubekhi Ngcilashe, siyabulela kakhulu ke ngalovimbo lolwazi lakho. Besinethemba lokubana ababukeli bethu basinde. Sithembe kanjalo. Ngoku masicaphule izimvo zabantu ngendlela zokujongana nongcinzelelo lwengwondo ingakumbi emadodeni. Icebo endiye ndilisebenzise xandithe ndafikelwa nguxinzelelo, ndiye ndidibane nalomfana osecakwam ndimbalisele sibheke ejimini, andinike amacebo. Akukho ngukuphelo kobomi xakuthe, iyafika nakubani lanto. "Ukhulum'indaba enkulu msakazi eyamadoda asheshe athathe izingqumo ngezimpilo zabo uma eneyinkinga. Amadoda phela msakazi yinxaki yabo ukuthi awanayo indawo la azofika khona umangabe eneyinkinga yingakho nje ekhethe ukuthatha izimpilo zabo." Into edala sifele ngaphakathi singamadoda ingxaki yakho uyayithatha uyibalise umakhelwane okanye ithu. Uyohamba'esela ngayo iti kengoku kwezindawo.  I-Banyana-banyana ifikelele kwisivumelwano lemali ne-SAPA kanye phambi kokunduluka isignise kwindebu yehlabani eAustralia naseNew Zealand. Ngongcedo leMotsepe Foundation umdlali ngamnye uzakufumana uchathe ele230 000 randi kwi thumende ngaphezu kwe 560 000 randi ephuma kwiFIFA. Abasebenzi be-Banyana bona bathembiswe i150 000 randi ngamnye kulendebe yehlabathi. Ngoku kuphelise kunomja oqhamke ngomgwibelo phakathi kweBanaya neSAFA. Iqalele ngazo ngokwephuka kokuhlabanisa, emaqonde emozulu ayalandela emizuzwini. Ndehlile kulamazwi omoya. Sihlangabezeni sibuya nazo ngebobozi ngentsimbi yesixhenxe.

Ubuyele enkundleni emva kwexesha lovavanyo lwengqondo kwisibhedlela saseMpuma Koloni. Igqwetha likaMafe livakalise ukuba lizakuzifunela eyalo ingxelo yengqondo. Likwaveze ukuba lizakucela ukuba lihlehliselwe iiveki ezintandathu ityala layo. Ujaji Nathan Nerasman ulimisile okwexeshana elityala emva kokuba uMafe ephindaphinda esithi wayitshisa ipalamente nokuba kufuneka isuswe eKapa.  You must take it to Bloemfontein ipalamente if you don’t take it to Pretoria. It must be removed here this parliament. I burnt it intentionally. Me Christmas Zandile Mafe , I’m going to burn it more if it does not move to Bloemfontein or Pretoria. The service delivery protest which is occurring outside is about my release. Last year a service delivery occurred , five thousand service delivery. Most of it was a finance service delivery. Loadshedding occurred 2900 hours last year . Load shedding occurred 207 days last year. Load shedding occurred 177 times. I warn this parliament to the majority of the people. Njengoko sekukufutshane kubeyiminyaka engamashumi amathathu kulawulo lwedemocracy ingaba ongasekhoyo uRonnie Mamoepa ebengabanaliphi icebo ukuqobisana nemingeni yentlalo noqoqosho elijongene nalo eli. Lo ibingumbuzo ophambili ngethuba usekela mongameli uPaul Mashatile esenza intetho ephambili xabekuphehlelelwa iRonnie Mamoepa foundation efreedom park ePitoli izolo.

Title: Project
Answer.transcript: Kwindaba zeth emin nje, kugqejwe omnye udumo kwezemda wokhuselo loluntu ulunqunyanyisiweyo uadvovate Bisisiwe mkhwebana emva kukoba inkundla yomgaqo siseko igqibe kwelokuba seseikhona isizathu esinesihlahla sokuba uCyril Ramaphosa amnqumamise esikhundleni. IANC eGauteng yenze isindululo sokumisela isikhundla sikasekela sodolophu koomasipala abaxhuzula imikhala kubo. Egameni lendaba lolujelo ndiyanobhotisa nani mawethu sisamnkela nani babukeli kwijelo jte singalibazisanga masilibethe liphale. Kugqejwe olunye udumo olungophiyi kwezomthetho wekhuselo loluntu olunqunyanyisiweyo uadvovate Bisisiwe mkhwebana emva kukoba inkundla yomgaqo siseko igqibe kwelokuba seseikhona isizathu esinesihlahla sokuba uCyril Ramaphosa amnqumamise esikhundlen.UAdvovate Mkhwebana wanqunyanyiswa esikhundlelni ngoJune wonyaka ophelileyo. Isekela jaji eliyintloko ujaji Mandisa Maya ewisa isigwebo senkundla somgaqo siseko ngale ntsasa uthe le nkundla eyona iphezulu kweli ayibufumani ubungqina bokuba umongamemli wathabatha amanyathelo ayenikuba nomngcipheko wokungqubana  kwefuthe lakhe kukho umsebenzi wakhe waseburhulubenteni kunye nezakhe zabucala kwaye akukho nto umongameli awayenokuyizuza ngokumnqumananisa umkhuseli woluntu ngoba  useka mkhuseli woluntu uqhubile nophando ngephalaphala. Umongameli akamnqumamisanga umkhuseli woluntu emdlela indlal itsho inkundla yomgaqo siseko. Ithe ukunqunyaniyiswa kwayo akumdlelanga ndlala nangaluphi na uhlobo ngob uyaqhuba efumana wonke umvuzo wakhe kwaye unethuba elaneleyo lokuzungiselela ukuzithethelela kwakhe kuphando lwesection 194 oluphanda ukulungela kwakhe ukuba sesikhundleni. Umpha wezezemila waseGauteng umnumzana Jacob Mamaloba ubambe inkomfa nonondamba ngale ntlazana malunga namalungiselelo okusekwa kwebanki kaRhulumente kwanenkampani karhulemente yamachiza. Umnumzana Mamaloba uthi kuluvuyo ukuba ingxelo ibiqwalesela imiba yezomthetho kwanengxaki ezingapho xa kusekwa lebhanki nale nkampani ibaleke umkhomba ndlela. IANC eGauteng indulule ngokumisela isikhundla sikasekela sodolphi komasipala abaxhuzula imikhala kubo. Kuvuke ingumvuka kwingqungquthela yesibini yomasibala yalo mbutho nejoilise ekufumaneni izisombululo ngoorhukumente benkanzathi. Eli qela likwathabathe isindululo sokucutha amanyathelo okuphakamisa isindululo sokuphelelwa lithemba kunyaka mali ngamnye. Kuza kuvunyelwa isibini  kuphela samanyathelo angakubonakalisa ukuphelelwa lithemba kunyaka mali omnye. IANC ithi liqhinga lokumilisela uzinzo koorhulumente benkazathi. Izixeko ezikhulu ezifana neRhawuti zibenosekela sodolophu okuqala kunyulo loomasipala ngo2021. IANC ithi ichulumancile ngumkrela ewuhambileyo ususela kwingqungquthela yayo yokuqala yomasipala. Kurhulumento lwendibanisela, iANC ikulawulo kooomasipala abalithoba kwabalishumi elinanye , iTswane neMidvale baphantsi kweDA. Kunjalo istat sa ithi ifuthe lotshintsho loosodolophu nokungabikho kozinzo lingabaleka kuphela emva kwethuba. Kusenjalo umbuthe woomasipala beli iSalga ivakalise inkxalaba ngokungaveli elubala kwemiba nokungathathwa koxanduva koomasipala. Usapho lakwaMakhawule kwaBhaca empumakoloni lufuna ubulingisa oku kulandela okuba kwadutyulwa ikwabulawa isizalanwe salo uNyaniso McDonald Makhawula ekutyhulwa ipolisa kweso siganeko nesehla  ngoJanyuwari ekubutsheni balo nyaka. Kwiinganga ezintandathu ezidlulileyo, usapho lakwaMakhawula laphulukana nomntu oluxhomekeke kuye. Olu sapho lutyholwa ngelithi alaziswa ngophando olwenziwayo yiIPID not boyikswa ziimoto ezingaziwayo bathunyelelwa nemiyalazo ebagrogrisayo  ukuba bayeke ukuphanda eli tyala. Ivan yamapolisa idlulile yayokwenza  Iu-turn  few meters away .xa ibuya ivan ibuye yahamba emva kotata atsho ke umkhuluwa wakhe Ndiviwe nanga amapolisa zange kube uyagqiba ukuba makacacise ukuba kwenzeka ntoni  kwatsho  iigun shots kwadutyulwa. Adubulile amapolisa wabe utata uyachaneka apha entloko. Akhomntu uright sisi apha nala mntana  ebephangela emsebenzini oright eDurban ubuyile utya aitreatment yedepression ngoku ndithetha nawe, ubuyele back kwitreatment yedepression .Abahlali bathi ukebiwa kwemfiyo yinto exhaphakileyo kwaBhaca . Nokuba kungakhona esort of iforum ibildwe kakuhle kuzanywe ukulwa nalebeef because abantu abafulieyo abaphumlanga abanye bancame imfuyo yayo bayithengise. Inkokheli yasekuhlaleni uNkosana zolile makhawulana uthi babekhe  babanentlangano kunye namapolisa ephondo malunga neengxaki ezibagubungileyo eziquka ukwebiwa kwemfuo nokungabonakali kwamapolisa. Ndingu Nomzwanele Mngoma kwiindaba zeSABC kwaBhaca. Kwalapha ezindebeni, otyholwa ngokutshisa iplalamente nomqoloba uZandile Mafe uvele wadanduluka waqhashulumba ngeli xa evela enkundleni ngale ntsasa kodwa masithume umntana evenkileni ngale kuqala. Sinamnkele kwakhina kwiindaba zojelo uyakwazi kwakhona ezi ndaba kweijelo leyou tube uthi SABC kwindababa zesixhosa. Kwinqaku lokuqalala sithe kugqejwe omnye udumo kwezemda wokhuselo loluntu ulunqunyanyisiweyo uadvovate Bisisiwe mkhwebana emva kukoba inkundla yomgaqo siseko igqibe kwelokuba seseikhona isizathu esinesihlahla sokuba uCyril Ramaphosa amnqumamise esikhundleni. otyholwa ngokutshisa iplalamente nomqoloba uZandile Mafe uvele wadanduluka waqhashulumba ngeli xa evela enkundleni eKapa ngale ntsasa. Ubuyele enkundleni emva kwexesha lovavanyo lwengqondo kwisibhedlele sasempuma koloni. Igqwetha lika Mafe livakalise ukub liza kuzifunela eyalo ingxelo yengqondo likwaveze  ukuba liza kucela ukuba lehliselwe iveki ezintathu ityala lakhe. uJaji Nethern Herasmus ulimisile okwexeshana eli tyala emva kokuba uMafe ephinda phinda esithi wayitshisa ipalament ngokuba ufuna isuswe ekapa.Njengoko sele kukufutshane kube yiminyaka engamashumi emathathu wolawulo lwedemocracy ingaba ongasakheyo uRoney Mamoepa ebengenabani phi icebo lokuqobisana nemingeli yentlalo noqoqosho elijongisene nayo eli. Lo ibingumbuzo ophambile ngethuba  usekela mongameli Paul mashatile esenza intetho ephambili xa bekuphehlelelwa iRoney Mamaepa Foundation eFreedom park epitoli izolo.

Title: Project
Answer.transcript: Kukhunjulwa ubomi negalelo legqala kwezoqhagamshelwano ongasekhoyo uRoni Mamuyebha nowayetshotsha entla kumzabalazo wokutshintsha ubomi babantu. (The Roni that we knew would be concerned about the pliant of the people, he would be advocating for unity and accountability. He would be asking questions about how far we are in dealing with the triple challenges of poverty, unemployment and inequality). Kuphehlelelwe umbutho ongenzi nzuzo kuhlonitshwa le ndedeba neyayikhe yathothoza eRobben Island, wayekhe walilungu lendlu yoqingqo mithetho eGauteng. Wayehlonitshwa kakhulu uMamuyebha engumsebenzi karhulumente ophume izandla. Wayekhe wasebenza njenge gosa lezoqhagamshelwano le-ANC nakumasebe aliqela karhulumente. Intombi yakhe ithi lombutho wesisa ifoundation ngokwelamarhanuka, uzawugxila ngamandla kwezemfundo. (The main focus will be on education, it will be on communication and learning on our kids of today and clear that forward, and then what have definitely moved into other things as we go along). Intetho kamnumzama Mashatile uyenze ngelixa kuthe ndi amarhe ngokuphathelene ngobomi bakhe, nangona kunjalo akavumanga ukuphawula ngalo mba kulo msitho. (For me to speak to you). Isebe lezamazanzi nogutyulo lumangalele enkundleni oomasipala baseLimpopo ngenxa yokusilela ulawula ilindle. Eli sebe liqaphele amaziko okugutyula ilindle angamashumi amahlanu aphantsi kweemeko ezingancumisiyo. Le ngxaki ikhonjwa ekusileleni koomasipala ukukhathalela nokulondoloza iziseko zococo kweli candelo. Oomasipala iSekhukhule, iMogalekoana neLiphalale bathatyathelwe kwinkundla lisebe lamanzi nogutyulo, oku emva kokusilela koomasipala ukunqamla ukuqhubeka kokuphuphuma kwelindle. Eli sebe livakalise ukuba oomasipala abangamashumi amahlanu kwabangamashumi asithandathu anesine eLimpopo bajamelene namantsintsintsi kwiinkqubo zogutyulo lwelindle. Oku kuchaphazela iilokishi eziliqela . Abasemagunyeni kwisebe lamanzi nogutyulo bathi siyaxhalabisa isimo somasipala songayithatheli ingqalelo  sokungayithabatheli ingqalelo imiqathango engqamene nogutyulo. OkaMchunu uthi baphicotha inguqu kwimigaqo yemithetho  ezokunceda ingenelele ngqo koomasipala abasilelayo. (What do we want is to be in a position where when we see wrong we intervene directly ourselves without having to depend on another legislation as it is happening now). Kwangaxesha linye ngetyala lolwaphulo mthetho umasipala waseMogalekoana uthatyathelwe kwikomishini yamalungelo wabantu emva kokusilela ukugqithisa iinkonzo zokuqingqa imo yentlalo yoluntu ngokumayelana neenkqubo zelindle. Abasemagunyeni koomasipala  bathi bamaxhaphetshu ngokusombululula le nyewe. (Indeed the department has taken us to court they give a directive last year safe to indicate that we have developed an action plan that we have submitted to the department of water and sanitation). Abanye omasipala abaquka owaseThabazimbi, Capricon, Mopane nowaseVembe baqatshelwe njengaba qatseleyo  kumanqanaba wokuqhokeka kulawulo lwamanzi nogutyulo kwiphondo laseLimpopo. Ngoku masicaphule izimvo zababukeli ngelinqaku kukhasi lethu leWhatsapp. (Yeyi intle kakhulu into eyenziwe leli sebe inga onke amaqumrhu angafuni kusebenza babamasipala adudulwe aqhutywe ngeenkundla).( Andiligxeki mna tu eli sebe lenze ngakhona ngoba limangale, ayikho le yoba baphilise abantu impilo yobugxwayiba baphefumle ilindle ngalo lonke ixesha ingenzeka imali kudala yakhutshwa qha ke yehla ngemilenze). Isi nqumo esihle kakhulu ngoba ikakhulu kazi ngoku oomasipala sebefuna basiwe ezinkundleni zamatyala ukuze bazokwazi ukuthi befeze iyidingo zabantu). (Ayethusi lo nto leyo ukuba bafune usiwa ezinkundleni, andazi uba yintoni umsebenzi wabo). ( Eli sebe  maliqine libengathi liyabasa mpela enkundleni ndiyabaxhasa ). ( Hayi ngicbanga ukuthi sihle kakhulu isinqumo  esithathwe yisebe  lelo lithathe abo masipala , ngoba kubukeka ngathi abomasipala ngempela barhuqa ubuthongo.) (Benzekakuhle msasazi wam  babathathele amanyathelo babase ezinkundleni ngoba kaloku yonke lanto yala funxuza nala mfuxumfuxu yala manzi azokwenza izigulo eziffana nookholera le siphuma kuo kweli  Rhawuti). (ukungagutyulwa kwelindle kurhuqa isidima somntu omnyama eludakeni yanga umasipala bangathiwa rhoqo bekhangelwa ukuba bawenza na umsebenzi wabo sineekholera nje zinto ezinje). (Oomasipala abanankathalo tu, apha eTsomo oko kwakugqabhuke uphayiphi kulo nyaka uphelileyo usavuza nangoku amanzi awisa izindlu zabantu). (Omasipala balapha barhuqa iinyawo ubukhulu becala, oomasipala abasebenzayo bambalwa ungalibona elo lindle neentoni kuthiwe saa nje ezindleleni ubone uba idreyini yayigqabhuke kudala ineeveki hayi ayihoywanga). Ngoku masithi tsi gxada ngapha kwemida yeli ngamaqhabantshintshi yezithe zaqaqamba kwihlabathi. Kwenzeke imbali eNetherlands emva kokuthweswa isitsaba sikanobuhle, wazalwa eyinkwenkwe waguqukela ekubeni yinombazana itransgender ngelamarhanuka. uRicky Varerycole oneminaka eyi22 ubudala, uzakumela eli lizwe kukhuphiswano luka Miss Universe ekuzeni kuphela kwalo nyaka nalapho kulindeleke enze imbali yokuba ngowokuqala kwimbali yolu khuphiswano ukuba uyagqwesa. (Afterwards I won the crown suddenly not everyone gave me a congratulations with my victory, I think it's really sad but i still have other contestants who were supporting me still supporting). Akasindanga kwizingxeko zabanxaxhi kumaqonga ezonxibelelwano. Kuhlasele intaba mlilo uLittle Rutu kwisiqithi iRayjanice Peninsula. Umthuthu ovutha amadangatye ubuphuphuma noxa kungevakalanga ugqabhuko dububulo njengesiqhelo . Avakalise oko amagosa karhulumente weli lizwe phesheya pha kokrwecizulu bezakhiwo. Izitshingitshane nezikhukhula zidlakaze ummandla waseChicago zanyanzelisa ukuvalwa mba kwezikhululo zenqwelo moya kusoyikiselwa ingozi. Akubikwanga zingxwelerha ngesi siganeko. Qakatha qelele kwelaMandiya izikhukula zishiye ooritsho abarhuqa iinqwelo begabhule emanzini kwizitalato zase New Daily. Isixeko esinabahlali abangamashumi amabini ezigidi, 20 million, sigutyungelwe zizkhukula sanyanzela ukuba uninzi lwabantu luzingele indawo zokugoba ityholo kwiinkampu zokhuseleko. Qongqololo. Igalele ngazo kwade kophuka neyokuhlanganisa, sihlangabezeni sibuyanazo ngentsimbi yesixhenxe ngongcwalaziamaqondo emozulu ayalandela makubechosi kubehele.

Title: Project
Answer.transcript: Kukhunjulwa ubomi negalelo begqala kwezoqhakamshelwano. Ongasekhoyo uRoney Mamaepa nowayetshontsha entle kumzabalazo wotshintsha ubomi babantu. Kuphehlelewe umbutho ongenzi nzuzo kuhlonitshwa lendedeba neyekhe yathothoza eRoben Island. Wayekhe walilungu lwendlu yoqinngqo mithetho eGauteng. Wayehlonitshwa kakhulu uMamaepa engumsebenzi kaRhulumente ophuma izandla wayekhe wasebenza njengegosa lezoqhakamshelwano lweANC nakumasebe aliqela karhulumente. Intombi yakhe ithi iza kugxila ngamandla kwezemfundo.Intetho kamnumzana Mashatile uyenze ngeli xa kuthe ndi amarhe ngokuphathelene nobomi bakhe. Nangona kunjalo akavumanga ukuphawula ngalo mba kulo msitho. Isebe lezamanzi nogutyulo lumangalale enkundleni oomasipala oomasipala baseLimpompo ngenxa yoku sila ukulawula ilindle. Eli sebe liqaphele amaziko ogutyulo lwelindle olungamashumi amahlanu aphantsi kweemoto ezingancumisiyo. Le ngxaki ikhonjwa ekusilileleni koomasipala ukukhathalela nokulondoloza iziseko zococo kweli candelo. OMasipala iSekhukhune, Morhalakwena neLiphalali bathatyathelwe kwinkundla lisebe lamanzi nogutyulo oku emva kokusilela komasipala ukungqamla ukuqhubeka bokuphuphuma kwelindle. Eli sebe livakalise ukuba oomasibala abangamashumi amahlanu kwabangamashumi asithandathu anesine eLimpompo bajamelene namantsinsti kwiinqubo zogutyulo zelindle oku kuchaphazela ilokishi eziliqela. Abasemagunyeni kwisebe lezamanzi nelegutyulo bathi siyaxhalabisa isimo somasipala sokungayithatheli ingqalelo imiqathango engqamene nogutyulo. OkaMchunu uthi baphicotha ingquku kwimigaqo yemithetho ezekungceda ingenelele nqo koomasipala abasilelayo. Kwangexesha linye ngetyala lolwaphulo mthetho umasipala waseMorhalakwena uthatyatelwe kwikomishini yamalungelo abantu emva kokusilela ukugqithisa iinkonzo zokuqingqa imo yentlalo yoluntu ngokumayelana ngenqubo yelindle. Abasemagunyeni komasipala bathi bamaxhaphetshu ngokusombulula le nyewe.  Abanye oomasipala abaquka owaseThambazimbi Capricon Mopani nowaseVembe baqatshelwe njengabaqatseleyo kumanqanaba obuqhokreka  kulawulo lwamanzi nogutyulo kwiphondo laseLimpopo. Ngoku masicaphule iizimvo zababukeli ngeli nqaku  kwihlasi lethu lewhatsapp. Intle kakhulu into eyenziwe ngeli sebe , inga onke amaqumrhu angafuni ukusebenza kwabamasipala adudulwe aqhutywe ngeenkundla. Andiligxeki mna tu elisebe lenze ngakhona ngoba limangale, ayikho le into yoba aba baphilise abantu impilo yobugxwayiba  baphefumle ilindle ngalo lonke ixesha. Ingenzeka ukuba imali kudala yakhutshwayo qha klk yehla ngemilenze. Ayothusi le not bafuna usenkwa andiyazi ukuba yinton umsebenzi wabo xa bengazukwazi ukusinika . Eli sebe lolawulo nogutyulo maliqine maliqine libe ngathi liyabasa kakhulu enkundleni.   Ngoku masithi tsi gxada ngapha kwemida yeli ngamagqabantshintshi athe aqaqambe kwihlabathi. Khwenzeka imbali eNetherlands emva kokuthweswa isithsaba sikanobuhle owazalwa eyinkwekwe waguqukela ekubeni eyintombazana itransgender ngelamarhanuka uRicky Valerie Cole oneminyaka eyi22 ubudala uza kumela eli lizwe kukhuphuswano luka Ms Universe ekuzeni kuphela kwalonyaka nalapho kulindeleke ukuba enze imbali yokuba ngowukuqala kolu khuphuswano ukuba uyagqwesa. Akasindaka ke kwizigxeko zamanxaxhi kumaqonga ezonxibelelwano.  Kuhlasele intaba mlilo uLittle Ruth kwisiqithi irejanesi peninsula. Umthutho ovutha amadangatya ubuphuphuma noxa kungavakelanga ugqabhuko dubulo njengesiqheleo. Avakalise onke amagosa karhulumente weli lizwe. Phesheya pha kookreca izulu bezakhiwo izitshingitshane nezikhukhula zidlakaze umantla waseChicago zanyanzelisa ukuvalwa mba kwezikhulo lwezinqelo moya kusoyikiselwa ingozi. Akubikwanga zingxwelerha ngesi siganeko. Qakatha qelele kwelamandia, izikhukhula zishiye oorisha abarhuqula iinqwelo begabhule emanzini kwizitalato zaseNyudeli. Isixeko esinabahlali abangashumi amabini anezigidi 20miliyon zigundyukelwe zizikhukhula lwanyanzela ukuba uninzi lwabantu luzingele iindawo zokugoba ityholo kwiinkampu zokhuseleko. Qongqololo! Igalele ngazo kwade kophuka neyokuhlangabisa. Sihlangabezeni sibuya nazo ngentsimbi yesixhenxe ngongcwalazi. Amaqonda emozulu ayalendela. Makubechosi kube hele!

Title: Project
Answer.transcript: Anchor 1: Iqela lenkampani imibutho yasekuhlaleni  namanye amaqela ezepolitiko ligrogrisa ngokusa iqumfu lakwaEskom esikhundleni ngomoba wolavilo wocimicimi wombane kweli. Iinkcukacha manani ezikhutshwe ngumphathiswa wozothuthu uFikile Mbalula zibonisa ukuba uninzi lwabantu abaphulukene nobomi ezindleleni kwezi holide zidlulileyo ngabahambi abatshayisiweyo ziimoto. Molwen nonke apha ekhaya ndingaphizisanga maseko mandigawule ndiwarhuqa. Iqela lenkampani imibutho yasekuhlaleni ,abezomthetho, amafama, oosomashishini  namanye amaqela ezepolitiko ligrogrisa ngokusa iqumfu lakwaEskom esikhundleni ngomoba wolavilo wocimicimi wombane kweli nokusilela kweli qumrhu ukuza nesicwangciso sokunqanda le ngxaki ka cimicimi  . Eli khwelo lisatyelwe nayinkokheli yeUDM Njengelabuntu Holomisa notyhola urhulumente ukukholelwa yiANC ngokusilela ukusombulula le ngxaki yamandla kweli.  Anchor 2:Umba kacimicimi wombane sele uthande ukuba  nguqhelekile kwele. Abemi beli badikwe beyokosa kuba sithetha nje iqela leenkempani elimele ezopolitiko, imibutho yabasebenzi, amafama namashishini kunye noluntu luthumele imbalelwano kusomaqhuzu wakwaEskom umnumzana Andre de ruyter nomaphathiswa wamaqumrhu karhulumente umnumzana Privan Gordon enyanzelisa unikezelo lombane oluzinzileyo. Akuphelelanga apho ke sithetha nje kukho uphulo nolukhokhelwa nguAdvovate Thembeka Ngcukayithobi neminye imibutho eyohlukeneyo kuquka namanye amaqela ezopolitiko neligrogrisa ngokusa uEskom ezinkundleni zamatyala ayokuphendula ngalo cimicimi. UNjengekabantu Holomisa uthi liphelile ixesha lokwenza amabali nezingxengxezo abami beli bafuna umbane. Lo kaHolomisa uthi linyathelo elililo eli lokuya ezinkundleni kuba iinqubo zepalamente soze zize nesisombululo kule ntsidabadala yalo cimicimi.Kuye yonke loo nqulenqu abemi beli kukhangeleka ingathi baza kuhlala kwisithokothoko sobumnyama kwaye amashishini asakhulayo ngawona aluvayo ulwamvilo . Anchor 1: Kusenjalo ingxaki yocimicimi yintsinda badala engade ibenaso isisombululo. Oku kuthethwe yinkhokheli yeqela yeDNA umnumzana John Hazel ngellixa esenza isibhengezo sokuba lo mbutho uceba uqhanqalazo lukazwelonke ngomhla wamashumi amabini anesihlanu kwelimiyo. Umnumzana Jon Hazel utyhole umbutho olawulayo ngokungazithatheli ntweni imfuno zabemi beli.    Anchor 1: Umphathiswa wezothutho umnuzamna uFikile Mbalula unike iinkcukhacha manani malunga nengozi ezenzekie ngexesha leholide zehlobo, ukuqala ngomhla wokuqala kadisemba kunyaka ophelileyo ukuya kumhla weshumi elinanye kule nyanga siya kuyo uJanyuwari. Ezi  nkcukhacha manani zibonisa ukuba zehle ngo7 pesenti inani labakhweli abaginywe ziingozi.  Ukanti inye kwizindlu ezisixhenxe indlu ehlawula ukusetyenziswa kombane olundi KwaZulu Natala. Oku  kuthethwe ngusodolophi walo masipala umnumzana Willson Ntshangase nokhokhele uphulo lokucinywa kombane kule ngingqi. Intatheli yethu uVusi Khumnalo kunye nosokhamera uSibusiso Thembe balandele eli phulo.  Lusaqhuba uphulo lokuzingela ingwe elahlekileyo kwaye lusuku lwesithathu namhlanje. Igqirha lamapolisa elisebenzisa oomatshini ukulandela umkhondo lingene kweli phulo lokukhangela le ngwe. Ukulandela ukuqhwesha kwale ngwe kwindawo evalekileyo eOkaviile   erhawutini kwiveki ephelileyo. Le ngwe igamalayo inguShibha ihlasele indoda yabulala inja ibikufitshane kuyo. Kusetyenziswa inqwelontaka kunye nezinye izixhobo ukuzingela le ngwe. Anchor 3: Luyaqhuba uphulo lokukhangela ingwe enobungozi eqhweshileyo uShiba kufunyenwe umzila wayo ngakule ndawo. Ukubakho kodaka akule ndawo kwenza kubenzima ukulandela umkhondo. Igqiza elilandela umkhondo lisebenzisa oomatshini lithi lifumana ubunzima ukuyinqakula ngokukhawulezileyo. Akukacaci ukuba umnini wayo unazo iimpepha mvume zokugcina esi silwanyana sasendle.

Title: Project
Answer.transcript: Female news anchor: Umbutho wezilwanyana ukuphe isilumkiso ngokunyuka kwezilwanyana zasendle ezingcinwa ngabantu zivalelwe ngenjongo zokwenza inzuzo.  Abasemagunyeni balumkise uluntu ukuba lungasondeli kulengwe ukuze luseleke kwaye lutsalele umnxeba abakwa crime stop ku 0860010111.  Male news anchor: I arhente yezendlela eRhawutini ithi kuzatyabula kufutshane ne khulu linama shumi asibhozo lezigidi zerandi ukulungisa indlela nezakhiwo ezonakaliswe zizikhukhula zango disemba. Unogumbi wemvula nezikhukhula kunyaka opheleyo ukhokelele ekuswelekeni kwabantu, kwanakala amakhaya, iindlela, kwawa ne bhrorho. I GRA ihlole umonakala kulo lonke iphondo iqwalasela umonakalo ngelixesha leholide lehlobo.  Icandelo lemveliso, impahla, umqhaphu, izihlangu kunye nesikhumba lelinye lamacandelo abalulekileyo kuqoqosho lweli nalapho imisebenzi ivuleka maxa onke. Isebe lwezorhebo, imveliso, nokhuphiswano liqikelela ukuba elicandelo linegalelo elilinganiselwa ku 1.7% kuqoqosho lweli, kodwa ingcali zoqoqosho zithi ukuxhoma kwamaxabiso okuqesha indawo zokushishinela kuyawaqhoka amashishini amancinci, oku kwenza kubenzima ukushishina nokwenza ingeniso.  Female news anchor: U Mateboho Miri, usomashishini wevenkile eyenza impahla i Mtique e Mahikeng udlule kwimiceli mingeni eliqela nalapho athe wathatha isigqibo sosebenzisa iqumbi elincinci kokwabo njenge ndawo ashishinela kuyo. Lo somashishini oneminyaka engamashumi amathathu uthi ukuntinga kwamaxabiso okuqesha indawo zokushishinela kuko okumenze azovula ishishini apha kokwabo. Ishishini lakhe lixhomekeke kumakhasi onxebelelwano ukuze lithengise. Nangona kunjalo amaxabiso okusebenzisa inkampani zangaphandle kumenzela nzima. Ukanti kwabanye uyavakala umnqantsa epokothweni yokubhatala imali yoxesha. Ingcali zezoshishini zithi, ukungakwazi kwabo ushishina kwindawo zoshishino ingumceli ngeni kwamanye amashishini. Kwaye nanjengawo onke amanye amashishini, ucimi cimi wombane uyawaqhwalelisa amashishini aliqela. Osomashishini kunye namakhaya asezokuqhokrwa ngankumbi kukunyuka kwamaxabiso ombane.  Male news anchor: umbengo omde uyawucima umlilo sihlangabezeni sisiza nazo ngobozi ngentsimbi yesixhenxe yorhatya, mazi anethole.  Female weather anchor: ndibamba ngazibini bethuna kwiBhele ezindabeni, ndiyabulisa kuwe mzi ontsudu aphe khaya ndikwamkele kaloku aphe edesikeni yethu yemozulu. Masikhangeleni ke bethuna eyakutsha nje, siqale ngokujonga langxelo ke yemvula nomoya ngalemvakwe mini. Kukhona ukusibakala futhi kuxhaphakile namhlanje kwelaphondo laphaya eMpuma Koloni ngu 60% lamathuba ezamvula kanti ke nomoya uyaqhubeka ubhudla nge 30 kilometres nge yure kwelanxeme lwase Gqeberha, ukunyuka njalo ke pha ko Port St Johns amazantsi futhi ase Lesotho nakuwo wonke lamandla usemazantsi ephondweni lase Free State, lemeko ke mbukeli emakhaya iyaqhubekeka futhi ngomso, xhaxhe ngaye la 60% lamathuba ezamvula khona pha e Gqeberha phakathi kumbindi nje wonke kwelaphondo laphaya eMpuma Koloni. Naso ke mbukeli namhlanje kaloku ke isilumkiso sobushushu obugqithise kakhulu lantu ke siyibiza nge heat wave apha kwijelo ke lezemozulu. Kwakhona namhlanje futhi phaya KwaZulu-Natal napha kumandla ephondweni lweMpuma Koloni, naso kwakhona futhi isilumkiso namhlanje sawo kaloku lamlilo unamandla phaya ko Northern Cape, e Upington nasephondweni lentshona Koloni. Kodwa ke ngomso kwasekuseni futhi kusatshisa kakhulu kulammandla. Amaqondo obushushu ke aphezulu namhlanje uba upha ko Bloemfontein embindini futhi pha e Free State yingqatsini ka 35 namhlanje, e Kimberly kusatshisa kakhulu futhi ngaye la 36, Vryburg ibuye ke ibengu 34 naphaya e North West e Mahikeng futhi nguye la 34, e Lephalale kwakhona kuphole kamnandi futhi ngamashumi mathathu anesibini ke namhlanje, e Musina kutshise mpela ngo 31, kodwa kuphole kamnandi pha e Polokwane ngo 28 kanti e  Phalaborwa nguye la 30. Khona amaqondo obushushu aphantsi ngokuhlwa namhlanje, e Upington namhlanje ngashumi mabini ekhatshwa sisine, sekuhle futhi e Springbok nase Calvinia kuyotsho pha ko Vredendal ngeshumi nesibhozo. Sutherland ngu 16 kanti e Worcester kwakho ngashumi mabini ananye namhlanje, kanti eKapa lodumo phaya ke ngu 20, zekuthi pha e Riversdale ibe ngamashumi mabini ananye efana ke phofu naphaya e George, eGqeberha futhi naphaya ko Makhanda ephondweni lweMpuma Koloni. Amaqondo ke obushushu aphezulu emva kwedinala ngomso. E De Aar embindini ngamashumi mathathu anesixhenxe kanti e Bloemfontein futhi phaya embindini waphaya e Free State ngawo lamashumi mathathu futhi anesihlanu ngomso ekuhambeni kosuku. Kanti kuphole kamnandi pha e Pretoria noxa kutshisa emva kosuku phaya ngo 31 kanti kuhle kwapha ko Johannesburg, ko Thembisa nase Sandton ngawo lamashumi mabini futhi anesithoba ngokokuqhubeka kwemini yethu pha ngomso. Kutshisa pha kakhulu phaya KwaZulu-Natal ngamashumi mathathu anesihlanu kusatshisa mpela futhi e Richards bay ngu 34. Kanti kuyatshisa pha e Port St Johns ngu 29. Kanti eMthatha ngamashumi mathathu anesithandathu. Kuzekuthi phaya e Monti eziphunzana nguye la 30, kanti okokugqibela eGqeberha ngamashumi mabini anesibhozo. Mna ndingu qhudelingoza ndikuthanda kanje xesha elimyoli.

Title: Project
Answer.transcript: Sele ifanisiwe imizimba eliqela kumaxhoba engozi yangokuhlwa kwangecawa.  Usekela mongameli Paul Mashatile usikhalimele isiganeko esichaphazela amalungu enkonzo yesipolisa yeli nalapho ebonwa exhaphaza abantu ku hola wendlela u N1 eRhawutini ngempela veki. Atsha zintambo amabhokobhoko phambi komdlalo wango mgqibelo nekapteni yawo entsha u Duane Vermeulen.  Molweni emakhaya samkeleni ababukeli kwijelo i DTT, nanku uvimba wangokuhlwa nje. Seyifanisiwe imizimba emininzi yamaxhoba alishumi elinesihlanu yengozi ye taxi eyehle kuhola wendlela u N9 ngase Metele eMpuma Koloni kubusuku bangecawa, intsapho zamaxhoba zikhala azithuthuzeleki kukulahlekelwa ngabo zibathandayo, phakathi kwamaxhoba zintsana ezimbini olunye lwiminyaka mbini, olunye yimveku yenyanga ezimbini ubudala omabini ingamantombaza. Kutyholwa ngelithi iloli igile isilwanyana ebesiyabula wase umqhubi waphulukana nolwawulo. Isikhotshi sale loli sigile i Quantum ibikhwele amaxhoba.  Khange zikwazi ukuzibamba intsapho xeshikweni kufaniswa imizimba, ezintsapho zisothukile kwaye kusenzima ukuba bamkele ukushiywa ngamalumgu osapho.  Ewe kona thina sonakele ngoba besingayilindelanga lento, qubuliso singakhange siyilungiselele, asiyazi ke uba sothatha ntoni sidibanise nantoni, sisezohlala phantsi siyi family sibone uba masithini. Senzakele kakhulu emoyeni nasemphefumleni kangangokuba nomntana wakhe lo ebethombile eyintonjana kuye kwanyanzeleka uba simkhuphe, simise lomsebenzi.  Ukanti amagosa ebesebenza kwindawo yexhwayelo, azokunikwa intuthuzelo ngokwasemphefumlweni.  Sithathe elithuba ke uvakalisa amazwi ovelwano kubantu abahlelwe yilengozi, bekunobanzima ukusinda ngenxa yomanakalo owenzekileyo phaya.  Unobangela wengozi uphandwa liziko, i road traffic management cooperation. Kulundeleke umphathiswa wezothutho kuzwelonke uSindisiwe Chikunga atyelele ezintsapho ingaphelanga leveki sikuyo. Abongile Jantjies kwindaba ze SABC ku Komani.  Abasemagunyeni kwezothutho entshona koloni bathi bazakuvula iqonga lenkcukaca zabo emapoliseni nakwi NPA ngenzame zokuqinisekisa ukuthatyathelwa ingqalelo kwamatyala kwicandelo labo eligqib’ubudlobongela. Kuvakaliswe amatyala amayela nokubulala angamakhulu amahlanu kwiminyaka emithathu edlulileyo, ekusabanjwe iqaqobana lwababandekeyo nokusilela utshitshiso ngawo.  Ndelo le taxi lelona likhulu ekuthutheni abantu base ntshona koloni imihla ngemihla abahlali abangaphaya komyinge ongamashumi asixhenxhe wepesenti basebenzisa i taxi kodwa iminyaka ngeminyaka iqengqelekile elicandelo lingenakuzinza ngenxa ye nqulenqu zokulwa kwama qumrhu, imbambano ekunikezweni kwe mvume nobudlobongela. Abasemagunyeni lephondo bavakalisa elicandelo letaxi lingundoqo kuqoqosho yaye bathi bagangatha kwangangoko ngemigodi yokuqinisekisa uzinzo. U Makenzie uthi itaxi ezivunyelweyo izicelo zazo zingamawaka alishumi elinesithandathu kweliphondo kodwa banalo ulwazi lokuba kungabe kanti kusebenza ezingamawaka angamashumi amabini. Abasemagunyeni bathi imingeni emayela nokugqithiswa kwemvume nendlela iqala liqela elimbi loququzelelo. ISantaco umbutho ombaxa wamaqumrhu wetaxi kweliphondo ukwamkele ukusungulwa kweqela lokuququzelela, uhlabe ikhwelo lombutho kumalungu nabahlali ukuba bathi xibilili nanje ngoku kumaxapheshu noxanduva lophelisa nya ulaphulo mthetho. Abasemagunyeni bathi eligqiza liqingqiweyo alizoqwalasela abatyholwa ukubulala  kuphela koko nabo bayalela ubudlobongela nabaqinisa iminwe yolwaphulo mthetho ngaphakathi kwelicandelo lwetaxi.  I arhente yokuhamba ngololiwe kweli i PRASA ithi inethemba lokuvulwa kakhona kololiwe ohamba kumbini wesixeko saseKapa ngo March konyaka ozayo, oku kuxhomekeke ekufudusweni kwamatyotyombe angaphezu kwewaka agxunywe kwindawo yomzila kaloliwe. Igqiza lekomiti ejongene nenkcitho kumasebe ka rhulumente i SCOPA, lityelele kumbindi wesixeko saseKapa lihlolahlola lomzila.  Lomzila wololiwe usetyenziswa ngamawaka waka wabantu abasuka kwilokishi zaseKapa besiya kumbindi wesixeko kodwa oololiwe bathi barhoxiswa ngenxa yokuba abanye abantu bakhe amatyotyombe phezu kwalomzila wololiwe, kwaye kwaye ngoku kukho iphulo lokubasusa. I PRASA ithi ololiwe bazakubuyela kwisiqhelo ngonMarch wakulonyaka uzayo. Abo bathe bakha phezu kwalomzila wololiwe bathi bafuna izindlu. I SCOPA sizokudibana ngolwesithathu ukuze sifumane ingxelo ngomba womhlaba ozakunceda abantu abakhe phezu kwalomzila wololiwe. Kwindaba ze SABC ndingu Bulelani Philip eKapa.  Usekela mongameli Paul Mashatile usigxekile isiganeko esichaphazela amalungu enkonzo esipolisa yeli, ekutyholwa ukuba axhaphaze abantu kuhol... eRhawutini ngampela veki. Esiganeko sithwetyulwe kushicilelo lwe video eyenza umjikelo kumakhasi onxebelelwano, afunyenwe amaxhoba nalamagosa ayaziwa.  Usekela mongameli usigxeke kabukhali esiganeko senziwe ngamalungu eSAPS anxulumene nenkonzo yokhuseleko lwakhe. Uthi soze nanini na kwamkeleka usetyenziswa kogonyamelo ngamalungu enkozo yesipolisa ngankumbi kubantu abanga xhobanga. Ukanti inkokheli ye Democratic alliance u John Steinhuizen usichaze esisiganeko njengesenzo sosetyenziswa gwenza kwamagunya watsho esigxeka kanobomi esisenzo. Umkomishinala wamapolisa kuzwelonke unjengele Fani Masemola uthembise ngelithi akuzushiywa nempundu kuphando lwesisiganeko. Umnumzana Mashatile ubongoze abemi beli loMzantsi Africa babenomonde bavumele ukuphethwa kophando.  Umbutho i Democratic alliance ukholelwa ukuba i konfa yesizwe ezakuqhutywa kwinyanga ezayo inganika ithemba eliqinisekileyo lokuphumelela kuvoto lonyaka ozayo olunokuthi lususe ukulwawula lorhulumente i ANC, eliqela likholelwa ukuba ingqungquthela ezakuqhutywa ingaza nophuhliso.  Amaqela amathandathu aphikisayo anombono ofanayo wokukhupha umbutho olwawulayo kulindeleke ukuba adibane kwinyanga ezayo ngalenjongo. Lendibano yentsuku ezimbini izaqhutyelwa kwakwindawo enye apho uthetha thethwano lwembali lwe CODESA lwenzeka khona, inkokheli ye DA ithi oku kuzakunika uqiniseko nozinzo oluyakuba yimfuneko ekusekweni korhulumente wobumbano ngo 2024 ukuba akukho qela lifikelela ku 50%.

Title: Project

Title: Project

Seyifanisiwe imizimba emininzi yamaxhoba alishumi elinesihlanu yengozi ye taxi eyehle kuhola wendlela u N9 ngase Metele eMpuma Koloni kubusuku bangecawa, iintsapho zamaxhoba zikhala azithuthuzeleki kukulahlekelwa ngabo zibathandayo, phakathi kwamaxhoba zintsana ezimbini olunye lwiminyaka mbini, olunye yimveku yenyanga ezimbini ubudala omabini ingamantombaza. Abongile Jantjies kwindaba ze SABC ku Komani. Title: Project
Answer.transcript: Nangona kunjalo iNational Freedom Park ithi ayizothatha nxaxheba kwindibano. Kusenjalo uStain haiden usigxeke kabukhali isityholo sokubetha kwabaqhubi angamalungu ecandelo okhuseleko oluphezulu kuhola wendlela eRhawutini . Malunga neso sehlo esijikeleza ngoku kumaqonga onxibelelwano , uStain Hazen uthi kukusetyenzisa genxa igunya. Abazali abalugcwabevu nabadikwe yeyokosa eKimberyl bafuna ishenxiswe esikhundleni intloko yesebe lemfundo emntla koloni. Aba bazali bathi babike izikhalazo eziliqela zokudlwengulwa kwabantwana abancinane kwizikolo zaseKimberly kodwa akukho manyathelo athatyathiweyo. Aba bazali balugcwabevu ngumsindo bathi kwanele ngoku. Batyhola ngelithi abantwana babo abakhuselekanga kwaye bagxeka isebe lezemfundo ngongazimameli iinxalabo zabo. Kutyholwa ngelithi ziziganeko zodlengula ezilishumi elinesihlanu ezibikiweyo kwisebe lezemfundo. Abazzali banyanzelisa ukuba ishenxiswe esikhundleni sayo intloko yesebe lemfundo emntla koloni kwaye zikhuselwe izikolo. Liziphendulelele isebe lezemfundo lizikhabile izityholo zokuba zilibethise ngoyaba lo mba kwaye igqiza lophando lusaqhuba nophando lwayo. Abazali bafunge ngelithi basezakuqhuba ngoqhanqalaza ngaphambi kweofisi yesebe lezemfundo eKimberly de izinyanzeliso zabo zihlangatyezwe. Ngoku basicaphule izimvo zabantu kwikhasi leli lethu. kuwhatsapp ngelinqaku. Isebe maligxothe lowo uyintloko. Makahambe icacile akukho zinkokheli akawazi umsebenzi wakhe xa engazukuhoya izikhalazo zoluntu. Abazali boyikisela iintsana zabo kunzima ngoku msasazi wam. Mna ndiyabaxhasa abazali abethe baya ngokwabo ,kuba mva nje kusemajele kurhwaphilizo, kusezikolweni kurhaphilizo, kusezinkonzweni kuyafana. Unikwe-ibheyile yamawaka amabini erandi phantsi kwemiqathango engqongqo ubishophu, oneminyaka engamashumi amane anesibini ubudala otyholwa ngezenzo zokwabelana ngesondo nomafana oneminyaka elishumi elinesixhenxe ubudala kwinkonzo yakhe eSpingbok eMntla Koloni. Le ndonda ityholwa ngokwenza isondo nomntwana nokunyanzel aixhoba ukuba libone isenzo sesondo. Idolophu yaseSpringbok eMntla koloni isabambe ongezantsi kulandela ezi zityholo. Lendoda ivelile enkundleni namhlanje nebandla layo belizimase ukuchotshelwa kwayo ngenkxaso. Ityala liphinde ladluliselwa kwinkundla ye ngingqi. Ngoku ke masike sithi tsi gxada silumane indlebe nomhlalutyi we social media trends u Sandile Hlangani, Sandile siyakwamkela ngawaphi awona manqaku ahamba phambili kutsha nje. So abantu abanintsi ba senda imiyalezo yovelwano ku Tebogo Mahlatse, lo usishiyileyo. Abantu abanintsi bamazi ngokuba yi director ku Yizo Yizo okanye ngomnye wabantu abayi qulunqileyo i Yizo Yizo. Okwesibini linqaku abantu abalijonge kakhulu lika Senzo Meyiwa, kukho i judge entsha echongiweyo ukuba mayihlalele elityala. Abantu abanintsi ku social media bayabuzana imibuzo, ukuthi iyakuthetha ukuthi lonto leyo lizakuqala phantsi ngoku elityala okanye kuzokwenzeka ntoni, kodwa eyona nto itsala umdla ethethwa ngabantu yile yokuba ngakumbi abalandeli bebhola, kuthwa ebengumdlali we Orlando Pirates ekwanguye nomdlali we Kaizer Chiefs. So iyabakhuthaza ke bantu ukubona ukuthi abantu bayakwazi ukusuka kwizinto ebebezenza baphinde bahambe bayokwenza ezinye izinto, ndingalidibanisa ke nenqaku le Skeem Saam abantu abanintsi abalaziyo, ne Skeem Saam siya trend ke uThibos abamazi kakhulu bamazi njengo Thibos naye wenze the same thing eyenzwe okanye ebonwe yi judge ukusuka from umntu ebesaziwa njengomntu o actayo, asuke ahambe ayofunda ayokwenza enye into. Nelonqaku liyabakhuthaza abantu liyababonisa uba awuphelelanga ungumntu kulento uyenzayo, zinintsi ezinye izinto ongazenza ukuziphucula ungumntu. Okwesithathu ke okokugqibela abantu bazakuyazi ukuthi ke le video bayibonileyo kuthethwa ngalento ke ka seleka mongameli, abukabukho ubunyani okanye ubungqina bokokuba ngenene nangenyaniso yi VIP protection ka sekela mongameli, kodwa abantu abanintsi bathi bona bayayazi kwaye bayayingqina futhi ukuthi nguye, so ivuselele amanxeba lento ebantwini abanintsi ukuthi elaxesha loxinezelo zezizinto esasizibona zisenzeka. Bathi ke abantu bebengalindelanga ukuthi ngo 2023 siphethewe yi ANC kusekho lento ngesilungu ibizwa ngoba yi police brutality. Sandile ngamafutshane iveki isaqala, singalindela ntoni kule veki Kuleveki masilijonge elinqaku abantu batyhola usekela mongameli mhlambi buzade buvele ubunyani ngoba amapolisa asikhuphile istatement esichazayo ukuba bafumanekile o driver be polo vivo namaxhoba. So bazawuchaza ke ukuthi kwenzeke ntoni and then amapolisa azaliphanda. Masilijonge neli le phala phala lika mongameli ngoba uGcaleka naye uphantsi ko cinezelelo kwi social media. Enkosi kakhulu, lowo ke ngu Sandile Hlangani. U Duane Vermeulen uzakube engu kapteni xa i springbok siqubisana ne Australia kumabala e Loftus versfeld e Pitoli ngomgqibelo ngomjikelo wokuvula itumente irugby championship. Iqela elichongiweyo liquka ompondo zihlanjiwe nabadlali abanganeno ngamava nanjengoko i boks zisomeleza amalungiselelo endebe yehlabathi eFrance ngo September. Elinye iqele linabadlali abayi 14 lisingise e New Zealand ukuqalisa ukulungiselela i All blacks kumjikelo wesibini kwi tumente. Umqeqeshi we Springboks ufuna esisibini size no mehluko ebaleni. Iqela labadlali abalishuli elinesine abanamava libhekise amabombo e New Zealand ukuya kuziqhelanisa phambi komjikelo wesibini ne All blacks e Auckland. Emva kongquzulwano nokuvula irugby championship ne Australia, lizakwandula iqela lentingelo e New Zealand liyokuhlangana nabo badlali baqale banduluka. Iqela iboks linemidlalo embalwa ukulungiselela indebe yehlabathi, lifuna ukuyisebenzisa ngokukuko. Sibulele mawethu ngokusiboleka indlebe sinikhumbuze ezangomso ziza nongxa bethu ngesiZulu, kamnandi mawethu.

Sandile ngamafutshane iveki isaqala, singalindela ntoni kule veki Kuleveki masilijonge elinqaku abantu batyhola usekela mongameli mhlambi buzade buvele ubunyani ngoba amapolisa asikhuphile istatement esichazayo ukuba bafumanekile o driver be polo vivo namaxhoba. So bazawuchaza ke ukuthi kwenzeke ntoni and then amapolisa azaliphanda. Masilijonge neli le phala phala lika mongameli ngoba uGcaleka naye uphantsi ko cinezelelo kwi social media. Enkosi kakhulu, lowo ke ngu Sandile Hlangani. U Duane Vermeulen uzakube engu kapteni xa i springbok siqubisana ne Australia kumabala e Loftus versfeld e Pitoli ngomgqibelo ngomjikelo wokuvula itumente irugby championship. Iqela elichongiweyo liquka ompondo zihlanjiwe nabadlali abanganeno ngamava nanjengoko i boks zisomeleza amalungiselelo endebe yehlabathi eFrance ngo September. Elinye iqele linabadlali abayi 14 lisingise e New Zealand ukuqalisa ukulungiselela i All blacks kumjikelo wesibini kwi tumente. Umqeqeshi we Springboks ufuna esisibini size no mehluko ebaleni. Iqela labadlali abalishuli elinesine abanamava libhekise amabombo e New Zealand ukuya kuziqhelanisa phambi komjikelo wesibini ne All blacks e Auckland. Emva kongquzulwano nokuvula irugby championship ne Australia, lizakwandula iqela lentingelo e New Zealand liyokuhlangana nabo badlali baqale banduluka. Iqela iboks linemidlalo embalwa ukulungiselela indebe yehlabathi, lifuna ukuyisebenzisa ngokukuko. Sibulele mawethu ngokusiboleka indlebe sinikhumbuze ezangomso ziza nongxa bethu ngesiZulu, kamnandi mawethu.

Title: Project
Answer.transcript: -"speaks English".Nangona kunjalo iNational Freedom Party ithi ayizukuthatha inxaxheba kwindibano."speaks English".Kusenjalo, uSteenhuisen usigxeke kakubi isityholo sokubetha kwabaqhubi angamalungu ecandelo lokhuseleko oluphezulu kuhola wendlela eRhawutini. Malunga nesosehlo esijikeleza ngoku kumaqonga onxibelelwano, uSteenhuisen uthi kukusebenzisa gwenxa igunya. Abazali abaligcwabevu nabadikwe yeyokosa eKimberly bafuna ishenxiswe esikhundleni intloko yesebe lezemfundo emntla-koloni, ababazali bathi babike iziganeko eziliqela zokudlwengulwa kwabantwana abancinane kwizikolo zase Kimberly kodwa akukho manyathelo athatyathiweyo. Ababazali baligcwabevu ngumsindo bathi kwanele ngoku, batyhola ngelithi abantwana babo abakhuselekanga kwaye bagxeka isebe lezemfundo ngokungazimameli iinxalabo zabo. Kutyholwa ngelithi ziziganeko zokudlwengula ezilishumi elinesihlanu ezibikwe kwisebe lezemfundo.Abazali banyanzelisa ukuba ishenxiswe esikhundleni sayo intloko yesebeze lezemfundo emntla-koloni kwaye zikhuselwe izikolo. Liziphendulele isebe lezemfundo , lizikhabile izityholo zokuba liwubethise ngoyaba lomba kwaye igqiza lophando lisaqhuba nophando lwalo. Abazali bafunge ngelithi basezoqhubeka noqhankqalazo ngaphandle kwee-offices zesebe lezemfundo eKimberly, kude izinyanzeliso zabo zihlangatyezwe. Ngoku masicaphule izimvo zabantu kwikhasi lethu le whatsapp ngelinqaku . “Ndiyahambiselana nabazali, isebe maligxothe lowo uyintloko, makahambe, kucacile akukho sikhokhelo icacile akawazi umsebenzi wakhe xa engazuhoya izikhalo zoluntu”. “Abazali boyikisela iintsana zabo, kunzima ngoku msasazi wam. Mna ndiyabaxhasa abazali abathe baphakama ngokwabo ,baya ngokwabo kuba mva nje kuyafana kusemajele lurhwaphilizo, kusezikolweni lurhwaphilizo , kusezinkonzweni kuyafana”. “Mina ngicabanga ukuthi makuvikeleke ezikolweni ikakhulukazi ku deploy(we) mhlambi amaphoyisa abekhona, abe visible ,hayi lama security guard abakhona ema gat(ini) ngoba abagabi bahlezi bekhuluma izindaba lapha ema gat(ini) yingakho abantwana bangenelwa ezikolweni badlwengulwe”."Speaking Zulu". "Speaking Zulu". "Speaking Zulu". "Speaking Zulu". unikwe ibail yamawaka amabini erandi phantsi kwemiqathango engqongqo uBishop oneminyaka engamashumi amane anesibini ubudala otyholwa ngezenzo zokwabelana ngesondo nomfana oneminyaka elishumi elinesixhenkxe ubudala kwinkonzo yakhe eSpringbok emNtla-Koloni. Lendoda isolwa ngokwenza isenzo sesondo nomntwana nokunyanzela ixhoba ukuba libone  isenzo sesondo. idolophu yeSpringbok eMntla-Koloni isabambe ongezantsi kulandela ezizityholo, lendoda ivelile enkundleni namhlanje nebandla layo belizimase ukuchotshelwa kwayo ngenkxaso. "speaking English". Ityala liphinde ladluliselwa kwindkundla yengingqi. Ngoku ke makhe sithi tsi-gxada sifumane indlebe nomhlalutyi we social media uSandile Hlangani. Sandile siyakwamkela, ngawaphi awona amanqaku ahamba phambili kutsha nje?. "Abantu abaninzi basenda imiyalezo yovelwano kuTebogo Mahlatsi, lo usishiyileyo. abantu abaninzi bamazi ngokuba ebeyi director kwi Yizo-yizo okanye ngabanye babantu abayiqulunqileyo iYizo-yizo. Okwesibini ke, linqaku abantu abali jongileyo kakhulu lika Senzo Meyiwa, kukho ijugde entsha echongiweyo ukuba mayihlalele elityala . Abantu abaninzi bayabuza umbuzo wokuthi lizakuqala phantsi elityala okanye kuzokwenzeka ntoni, kodwa eyona nto etsala umdla ethethwa ngabantu yile yokuba ,ngakumbi abalandeli bebhola kuthwa ibingumdlali we Orlando Pirates ekwanguye nomdali we Kaizer Chiefs. Iyabakhuthaza ke abantu into yokubona ukuba bayakwazi usuka kwizinto bebezenza baphinde bahambe bayokwenza ezinye izinto. Ndingalidibanisa ke nenqaku le-Skeem-sam abantu abaninzi abalaziyo. ISkeem-sam siya trenda, uT-BOS abamazi kakhulu njengo T-bose, naye wenze the same thing ebonwe kwi judge ukusuka komntu ebesaziwa njemgomntu oAct(ayo) ahambe ke ayokwenza enye into, nelo nqaku liyabakhuthaza abantu liyabababonisa ukuba awuphelelanga ungumntu kulento uyenzayo , zininzi izinto onenza ukuziphucula ungumntu. Olwesithathu ke nokokugqibela, abantu bazoyazi ukub le video bayibonileyo kuthethwa ngalento ka sekela-mongameli , abukabikho ubunyani okanye ubungqina bokuba ngenene nange nyaniso yi VIP protection ka sekela mongameli kodwa ke abantu abaninzi kebona bathi bayayazi kwaye bayayingqina ukuthi nguye. Ivuselele amanxeba lento ebantwini abaninzi ukuthi ngelaxesha locinezelo zzezizinto sasizibona zisenzeka , bathi ke banatu bebengalindelanga ukuba ngo2023 siphethwe yi ANC kusekho lento ebizwa ngokuba yi police brutality". Sandile ngamafutshane ungathi silindele ntoni kule veli ?." kuleveki masijonge elinqaku abantu abatyhola usekela mongameli, umhlambi uzode kuvele ubunyani ngoba amapolisa asikhuphile istatement esichazayo ukuvba bafumanekile odriver bePolo vivo ,so bazakuchaza ukuba kwenzeke ntoni , amapolisa ke azakuphanda ukuba kwenzeke ntoni . masilijonge neliphala-phala lika mongameli ngoba uGcaneka naye uphantsi kocinezelelo kwi social media". Enkosi kakhulu ke Sandile Hlangani. uDuane Vermeulen uzobe engu captain xa iSpringbok siqukisana ne Australia kumabala e"Afrikaans name" Pitoli ngomgqibelo , ngumjikelo wokuvula irugby championship , iqela elichongiweyo liquka oompondo zihlanjiwe nabadlali abanganeno ngamava nangok iBoks zisomeleza amalungiselelo endebe yehalbathi eFrance ngoSeptember. eli qela labadlali abayi 14 lisingize eNew Zealand ukuyoqala ukulungiselela umdlalo ne All Blacks kumjikelo wesibini. "Afrikaans name"  uzodityaniswa nompondo zihlanjiwe u"Afrikaans name" njrnge flightbacks , umqeqeshi we Springboks ufuna esisibini size nomohluko ebaleni."Speaking English" Iqela labadlali abaneshumi elinesine banamava libhekisa amaphamba eNew Zealand ukuya kuziqhelanisa nomjikelo wesibini ne All Blacks eOakland."speaking English". emva kokungquzulana.Emva kongquzulwano lokuvula irugby championship ne Australia, lizakundiza iqela lintingele eNew Zealand liyokuhlangana nabo badlali baqale banduluka. Iqela iBoks linemidlalo embalwa ukulungiselela indebe yehlabathi , lifuna ukuyisebenzisa ngokukuko. Sibulele mawethu ngokusiboleka iindlebe , sinikhumbuze ezangomso ziza noogxa bethu besiZulu, kamnandi mawethu.

Title: Project
Answer.transcript: Umphathiswa wezemfundo eGauteng uMatome Chiloane uqiniksekise abazali ukuba bonke abantwana bazakufunelwa indawo yesikolo kweli phondo. Isebe lezempilo lithi akuzumiselwa ukuvalwa kweentshukumo kweli okanye imiqathango yohambo emva kokufunyaniswa kwehlobo olosulela kakhulu lwentsholongwane yeCovid eNtshona Koloni.  Molweni emakhaya samnkele nabo babukele kwiqonga leDT. Nanku uvimba esinilungelele wona ngokuhlwa nje. Umphathiswa wezemfundo eGauteng uMatome Chiloane uqiniksekise abazali ukuba bonke abantwana bazakufunelwa indawo yesikolo kweli phondo. Nangona izikolo zivulwa ngomso , ngabantwana abangapha ko1300 ekumele ukuba bafunelwe indawo. Kusenjalo abazali ababevutha ngumsindo banguungenele kwiofisi zesebe lezemfundo kunye nasezikolweni ngokuqinisekisa ukuba abantwana babo bayayifumana indawo.  Abazali bayavutha ngumsindo njengoko abantwana babo bengenkafunelwa ndawo lisebe lezemfundo kweli phondo laseGauteng. Ukuzothi ga ngoku ngabantwana abangapha ko1300 abangekafunelwa ndawo kwizikolo zeli phondo. Eli sebe liphinde laqiniksekisa abazali ukuba  abantwana babo bazakufunelwa indawo. Abazali bathi badanile ukusilela kwelisebe lezemfundo ukuza nesisombululo kulo mba. Imanyano yootitsalala ISADTU imeleleke ukuba kubekho isisombululo kulo mba ngokukhawuleza. Uninzi lwabazali khange bawafake onke amaxwebhu afunekayo oku kukhokeleke kwizicelo ezingaphelelanga. Eli sebe lezemfundo kweli phondo lithi libila lisoma lizama ukuza nezisombululo kule nyewe.  Ukanti njengoko kushiyeke iiyure ezimbalwa phambiu kokuba kuvulwe izikolo kumaphondo akumbindi welizwe, abazali benza amalungiselelo wokugqibela ukuvula kwezi kolo. Ngelixa abantwana bechulumancile kukuvulwa kwezikolo abazali bathi iindleko zokuvulwa kwezikolo zither xhaxhe. Sekushiyeke iyure ezimbalwa kuvulwe ngokusesikweni izikolo  kumaphondo akumbindi welilizwe ukanti abantwana nabo banemincili ukuqala amabanga amatsha kulo nyaka. Ngelixa abafundi bevuleya ukuvulwa kwezikolo abazali bathi batsala nzima nanjengogo zither xhaxhe iindleko zokuthenga impahla yesikolo. Abazali bacebisa ngokonga kwangethuba ukuze umzali angabiphantsi koxinzelelo xa kufike eli xesha Ivenkile ezithengisa i uniform zesikolo zigcwele qhu ngabathengi. Umama Maki Malapela uphantsi ko xinzelelo unoxanduva lokhulisa abazukulwana bakhe emva kokusweleka kwabazali babo, lomakhulu wamkela inkam nkam uthi ayikho imali yokuthenga izinto ezidingekayo xa abantwana bebuyepa esikolweni. Uthi “akukho mntu usebenzayo kulendlu, umama wabazukulwana bam wasweleka kunzima nokubondla, hayi ke xakufika kwi uniform abananto kulonyaka andinayo neyemi khavarisho”. Kulindeleke ukuba izikolo ezikumaphondo akumbindi welizwe zivulwe ngomso. Akuzubekwa miqathango yokucutha ukuhamba hamba kwabantu ukulandela ukufunyaniswa kolunye uhlobo olutsha lokuguquguquka kwe covid-19 i variant ngabula makhumsha eNtshona koloni ngolwesihlanu. Umphathiswa wezeMpilo uQhirha Joe Phahla ukuvakalise oku kwinkomfa kwakunye nentatheli ebanjwe kusetyenziswa ubuxhakaxhaka balemihla nalapho ebenika ingxelo malunga ne XBB1.5 variant, isebe lithi esisigqibo sithathwe kuthathelwa ingqalelo iziphakamiso zombutho wehlabathi lezempilo i WHO. Abemi beli bangaqhubeka bekhululekile baphile ngaphandle kwemiqathango ye Covid-19 nangona kuqhambuke uhlobo lokuguquguquka kwe covid-19 i XBB1.5, okwangoku umntu angasinxiba isifonyo xa ethanda kodwa ayingomqathango kususela kulonyaka uphelileyo kodwa isebe lezempilo lithi lisaphonononga ulwamvila lwe XBB1.5. Eli loMzantsi Afrika lifumanise umntu omnye one XBB1.5 nofunyaniswe kwi sampuli eqokelelwe kwiqela labantu kwaye ayikwazi ukulandelelwa ukuba isuka kubani ncakasana, kusenjalo kuzakongezwa i booster yesihlanu yogonyo kwinzame zika rhulumente zokhusela abantu abaneminyaka engamashumi amahlanu nangaphezulu. Isebe lezempilo limile kwelokuba ugonyo yiyona nto ekhuselayo kwintsholongwane ye Covid-19. Bachazwe njenge khubalo esibhedlele i Tambo Memorial abasebenzi bempilo abalishumi elinambini abaswelekile emva koqhushumba kwesigadla serhasi e Boksburg kwiMpuma yeRhawuti kusuku olwalusandulela i krisimesi, isebe lezempilo eGauteng linike imbeko kwababasenzi ngethuba lenkozo yempilisi ibibanjelwe e Boksburg civic centre ngentsasa yanamhlanje. Bebezokunika imbeko kubasebenzi abaphulukene nobomi besedyokhweni, uqhushumbo lwesigadla serhasi lasuba imiphefumlo engamashumi amathathu anesibhozo, ishumi elinesibini kubo ngabasebenzi bezempilo. Oyena mncinci kubo ukwiminyaka engamashumi amathathu ubudala kwaye omdala ukwiminyaka engamashumi amathandathu ubudala, umqhubi wesibhedlele naye uphulukene nobomi bakhe kwesisiganeko. Ogxa babo nabo bagxwale emswaneni. Imanyano zabasabenzi i DENOSA ne NEHAWU zimemelela ukuba kuphuculwe imivizo nemeko zokusebenza ngelihlonipha ababasebenzi. Ukanti isebe lezempilo eGauteng lithi uphando lusaqhuba kwaye ingxelo ngesisiganeko izakuphuma kungekudala.
