Abazali bathi badanile kukusilela kwelisebe lezemfundo ukuza nesisombululo kulomba. Ummanyano wootitshala iSADTU nomelele ukuba kubekho isisombululo kulomba ngokukhawuleza. Uninzi lwabazali khange bawafake onke amaxwebhu afunekayo. Oku kukhokhelele kwizicelo  ezingaphelelanga. Elisebe lezemfundo kweliphondo  lithi labile lisoma lizame isisombululo kulenyewe.  Ukanti njengoko kushiyeke iiyure ezimbalwa phambi kokuba kuvulwe izikolo kumaphondo akumbindi welizwe abazali benza amalungiselelo okugqibela okuvulwa kwezikolo ngelixa abantwana bechumancile ngokuvulwa kwezikolo abazali bathi iindleko zokuvulwa kwezikolo zithe xhaxhe. Sekushiyeke iiyure kuvulwe ngokusesikweni izikolo kubaphondo akumbindi welizwe. Ukanti abantwana nabo banemincili kukuqala amabanga amatsha kulonyaka. Ngelixa abafundi bevuyela ukuvulwa kwezikolo abazali bathi batsala nzima nanjengoko zithexhaxhe iindleko zokuthenga impahla yesikolo. Abazali bacebisa ngokonga ngethuba ukuze umzali angabiphantsi koxinzelelo xakufika elixesha. Iivenkile ezithengisa iiunifomu zesikolo zigcwele qhu ngabathngi. Umam’uMatyi Malaphela uphantsi koxinzelelo, unoxanduva lokukhulisa abazukulwana bakhe emva kokusweleka  kwabazali babo. Lomakhulu owamkela inkamnkam uthi ayikho imali yokuthenga izinto ezidingekayo xa abantwana bebuyela esikolweni. Uthi akukhomntu usebenzayo kulendlu, umama wabazukulwana bam wasweleka ,kunzima nokubondla. Hayike xakufikwa kwiunifomu abananto kulonyaka , andinayo nemikhavarisho. Kulindeleke  ukuba izikolo ezikumaphondo akumbindi welizwe zivulwe ngomso. Akuzubekwa miqathango yokucutha ukuhambahamba kwabantu ukulandela ukufunyaniswa kolunye uhlobo olutsha lokuguquguquka kweCOVID 19 ivariant ngabula makhumtsha eNtshona Koloni ngolwesihlanu. Umpathiswa wezempilo ugqirha Joe Phahla uvakalise oku kwinkofa kunye neentatheli ebanjwe kusetyenziswa ubuxhakaxhaka balemihla nalapho ebenika ingxelo malunga neXBB1.5 variant. Isebe lithi esisigqibo sithathwe kuthathelwa ingqalelo iziphakamiso zombutho wehlabathi lezempilo iWHO . Abemi beli bangaqhubeka bekhululekile baphile ngaphandle kwemiqathango yeCOVID 19 nangona kuqhambuke uhlobo lokuguquguquka kweCOVID 19 iXBB1.5. Okwangoku umntu angasinxiba izifonyo xa efuna kodwa ayingomqathango susela kulonyaka uphelileyo. Kodwa isebe lezempilo lithi lisaphononongwa ulwamvila lweXBB1.5. Eli loMzantsi Afrika lifumanise umntu omnye oneXBB1.5 nofunyaniswe kwisampuli eqokelelwe kwiqela labantu kwaye ayikwazi kulandelelwa ukuba isuka kubani ncakasana. Kusenjalo kuzakongezwa ibooster yesihlanu yogonyo kwiinzame zikarhulumente zokukhusela abantu abaneminyaka engamashumi amahlanu nangaphezulu. Isebe lezempilo limile kwelokuba ugonyo yeyonanto ikhuselayo kwintsholongwane iCOVID 19.  Bachazwe njengekhubalo lesibhedlela iTambo memorial abasebenzi bempilo abalishumi elinambili abasweleke emva kokuqhushumba kwesigadla serhasi eBoksburg kwimpuma yeRhawuti kusuku olwalusandulela ikhrisimesi. Isebe lezempilo eRhawutini linike imbeko kwababasebenzi ngethuba lenkonzo yempiliso ibibanjelwe eBoksburg civic centre ngentsasa yanamhlanje.  Bebezokunika imbeko kubasebenzi abaphulukene nobomi besedyokhweni. Uqhushumbo lwesigadla serhasi lwasuba imiphefumlo engamashumi amathathu anesibhozo. Ishumi elinesibini kubo ngabasebenzi bezempilo . Oyena amncinci kubo ukwiminyaka engamashumi amathathu ubudala kwaye omdala ukwiminyaka engamashumi amathandathu ubudala. Umqhubi wesibhedlele naye uphulukene nobomi bakhe kwesisiganeko. Oogxa babo nabobagxwale emswaneni. Iimanyano zabasebenzi iDENOSA neMEHAWU zimemelela ukuba kuphuculwe imivuzo neemeko zokusebenza ngelihlonipha ababasebenzi. Ukanti isebe lezempilo eGauteng lithi uphando lusaqhuba kwaye ingxelo ngesisiganeko izakuphuma kungekudala.

Title: Project
Answer.transcript: Umphathiswa wezemfundo eGauteng uMatome Chiloane uqiniksekise abazali ukuba bonke abantwana bazakufunelwa indawo yesikolo kweli phondo. Isebe lezempilo lithi akuzumiselwa ukuvalwa kweentshukumo kweli okanye imiqathango yohambo emva kokufunyaniswa kwehlobo olosulela kakhulu lwentsholongwane yeCovid eNtshona Koloni.  Molweni emakhaya samnkele nabo babukele kwiqonga leDT. Nanku uvimba esinilungelele wona ngokuhlwa nje. Umphathiswa wezemfundo eGauteng uMatome Chiloane uqiniksekise abazali ukuba bonke abantwana bazakufunelwa indawo yesikolo kweli phondo. Nangona izikolo zivulwa ngomso , ngabantwana abangapha ko1300 ekumele ukuba bafunelwe indawo. Kusenjalo abazali ababevutha ngumsindo banguungenele kwiofisi zesebe lezemfundo kunye nasezikolweni ngokuqinisekisa ukuba abantwana babo bayayifumana indawo.  Abazali bayavutha ngumsindo njengoko abantwana babo bengenkafunelwa ndawo lisebe lezemfundo kweli phondo laseGauteng. Ukuzothi ga ngoku ngabantwana abangapha ko1300 abangekafunelwa ndawo kwizikolo zeli phondo. Eli sebe liphinde laqiniksekisa abazali ukuba  abantwana babo bazakufunelwa indawo. Abazali bathi badanile ukusilela kwelisebe lezemfundo ukuza nesisombululo kulo mba. Imanyano yootitsalala ISADTU imeleleke ukuba kubekho isisombululo kulo mba ngokukhawuleza. Uninzi lwabazali khange bawafake onke amaxwebhu afunekayo oku kukhokeleke kwizicelo ezingaphelelanga. Eli sebe lezemfundo kweli phondo lithi libila lisoma lizama ukuza nezisombululo kule nyewe.  Ukanti njengoko kushiyeke iiyure ezimbalwa phambiu kokuba kuvulwe izikolo kumaphondo akumbindi welizwe, abazali benza amalungiselelo wokugqibela ukuvula kwezi kolo. Ngelixa abantwana bechulumancile kukuvulwa kwezikolo abazali bathi iindleko zokuvulwa kwezikolo zither xhaxhe. Sekushiyeke iyure ezimbalwa kuvulwe ngokusesikweni izikolo  kumaphondo akumbindi welilizwe ukanti abantwana nabo banemincili ukuqala amabanga amatsha kulo nyaka. Ngelixa abafundi bevuleya ukuvulwa kwezikolo abazali bathi batsala nzima nanjengogo zither xhaxhe iindleko zokuthenga impahla yesikolo. Abazali bacebisa ngokonga kwangethuba ukuze umzali angabiphantsi koxinzelelo xa kufike eli xesha Ivenkile ezithengisa i uniform zesikolo zigcwele qhu ngabathengi. Umama Maki Malapela uphantsi ko xinzelelo unoxanduva lokhulisa abazukulwana bakhe emva kokusweleka kwabazali babo, lomakhulu wamkela inkam nkam uthi ayikho imali yokuthenga izinto ezidingekayo xa abantwana bebuyepa esikolweni. Uthi “akukho mntu usebenzayo kulendlu, umama wabazukulwana bam wasweleka kunzima nokubondla, hayi ke xakufika kwi uniform abananto kulonyaka andinayo neyemi khavarisho”. Kulindeleke ukuba izikolo ezikumaphondo akumbindi welizwe zivulwe ngomso. Akuzubekwa miqathango yokucutha ukuhamba hamba kwabantu ukulandela ukufunyaniswa kolunye uhlobo olutsha lokuguquguquka kwe covid-19 i variant ngabula makhumsha eNtshona koloni ngolwesihlanu. Umphathiswa wezeMpilo uQhirha Joe Phahla ukuvakalise oku kwinkomfa kwakunye nentatheli ebanjwe kusetyenziswa ubuxhakaxhaka balemihla nalapho ebenika ingxelo malunga ne XBB1.5 variant, isebe lithi esisigqibo sithathwe kuthathelwa ingqalelo iziphakamiso zombutho wehlabathi lezempilo i WHO. Abemi beli bangaqhubeka bekhululekile baphile ngaphandle kwemiqathango ye Covid-19 nangona kuqhambuke uhlobo lokuguquguquka kwe covid-19 i XBB1.5, okwangoku umntu angasinxiba isifonyo xa ethanda kodwa ayingomqathango kususela kulonyaka uphelileyo kodwa isebe lezempilo lithi lisaphonononga ulwamvila lwe XBB1.5. Eli loMzantsi Afrika lifumanise umntu omnye one XBB1.5 nofunyaniswe kwi sampuli eqokelelwe kwiqela labantu kwaye ayikwazi ukulandelelwa ukuba isuka kubani ncakasana, kusenjalo kuzakongezwa i booster yesihlanu yogonyo kwinzame zika rhulumente zokhusela abantu abaneminyaka engamashumi amahlanu nangaphezulu. Isebe lezempilo limile kwelokuba ugonyo yiyona nto ekhuselayo kwintsholongwane ye Covid-19. Bachazwe njenge khubalo esibhedlele i Tambo Memorial abasebenzi bempilo abalishumi elinambini abaswelekile emva koqhushumba kwesigadla serhasi e Boksburg kwiMpuma yeRhawuti kusuku olwalusandulela i krisimesi, isebe lezempilo eGauteng linike imbeko kwababasenzi ngethuba lenkozo yempilisi ibibanjelwe e Boksburg civic centre ngentsasa yanamhlanje. Bebezokunika imbeko kubasebenzi abaphulukene nobomi besedyokhweni, uqhushumbo lwesigadla serhasi lasuba imiphefumlo engamashumi amathathu anesibhozo, ishumi elinesibini kubo ngabasebenzi bezempilo. Oyena mncinci kubo ukwiminyaka engamashumi amathathu ubudala kwaye omdala ukwiminyaka engamashumi amathandathu ubudala, umqhubi wesibhedlele naye uphulukene nobomi bakhe kwesisiganeko. Ogxa babo nabo bagxwale emswaneni. Imanyano zabasabenzi i DENOSA ne NEHAWU zimemelela ukuba kuphuculwe imivizo nemeko zokusebenza ngelihlonipha ababasebenzi. Ukanti isebe lezempilo eGauteng lithi uphando lusaqhuba kwaye ingxelo ngesisiganeko izakuphuma kungekudala. 10:12  Isebe lezempilo lithi lizakuqhuba nokuqinisekisa ukuba banikwa inkxaso abasabenzi besibhdlele iThambo Memorial kunye neentsapho zabasebenzi abathe baphulukana nobomi babo. Title: Project
Answer.transcript: Isebe lezempilo lithi lizakuqhuba nokuqinisekisa ukuba banikwa inkxaso abasabenzi besibhdlele iThambo Memorial kunye neentsapho zabasebenzi abathe baphulukana nobomi babo. Abazali nabafundi abathe basuswa kwindawo abebehlala kuyo emva kwezikhukhulo zangoApril nanyaka mnye ezahlasela iphondo lakwaZulu Natal bamemela urhulumente ukuba angenelele ekuqinisekiseni ukuba abantwana bafumana izikolo. Amaxhoba ezikhukhuli eSajonisi eMpumakoloni athi alinde uncedo luka Rhulumente emva konyaka ahlaselwa zizikhukhula. Izindlu ezisemgangathweni yenye yemiba ejongene nabahlali eSajonisi. Uninzi luhlala kwizindlu zodaka besithi kulithuba belinde izindlu ezizizo. It’s been yeasr kody ake sihlale ethembeni into yoba hayike iza kufika mhlawumbi njengabanye abantu sibabona benikwa iprefet nenton but oko thina sahlala kule situation kule meko kusenje ke nangoku. ..ime ngamandla eSajunisi kwiveki ephelileyo. Iintsapho ezimbini zishiyeke zingenamakhaya. Ibi pha ibilungelelene nale ndlu yehla ke ngoku ngokutshona komhlaba. Njengoba umhlaba usuka apha kwamakhelwano ukhukhuliseka uye wadabula ke phaya ekhaya. Izindlu zehla ngomva zawa eziwayo. ..wase Sajonisi uthi uzama ukulungisa iziseko zokukhupha amanzi kuye neendlela. Kule 13million ke sikwazi into yokuba sense iiproject eziyi4. Ezimbini zikule ward kuthiwa nguward 6 edolophini, ezimbini zikwaward 10. Esajonisi bathi iintlekele zendalo eziquka kuzo izikhukhula zisezakuwuthwaxa lo ummanga kwaye bafuna ungenelelo luka Rhulumente kazwe lonke. NdinguLwandile Mbulali eSajunisi. Abakimkhanye bathi uCyril Ramaphosa makazenze iinguqu kwicarbinet yakhe ngobukhulu ukunonophela. Bathi ukuba ngaba ugxotha abaphathiswa bebemphikisa oko kwakusingela inzame zokumanya umbutho weANC. Ngelixa ummongameli engaziwa ngokusoloko esenza inguqu kwicarbinet yakhe, kodwa unikwe inkxaso emandla ngamasebe omutho. Ukuqukwa komlisela nomthinjana kwiqoqo lolawulo kunika lokuba wona njengoko usesemandleni ungenza izinto zenzeke.Ukwenyulwa komnumzana uFikile Mbalula njengosiba khulu weANC , kushiye isithuba kwisebe lezothutho kumphathiswa wayo nto leyo inika umongameli ithuba enze inguqu kwicarbinet. Abakhi mkhanya bathi kuzanyanzeleka umongameli alule isandla soxolo nakwabo bamphikisayo. Iyantlukwano iyakudala iduma elitsaz’igazi ukuya kunyulo jikelele ngo 2024. Ngelika mongameli esadla amathambo engqondo isizwe sona sihleli sithe qwa sijonge inguqu kwi khabinethi. Amafama kunye namapolisa kwingingqi yase Hex river valley eNtshona koloni bamemelela abaqhubi ukuba bangathengi umdiliya kubathengisi kuhola wendlela u N1, abakwa ntsasana bathi ziqatsele iziganeko zokuphangwa kwabaqhubi abangacingelanga nto kulendlela. I De Doorns e Hex river valley yaziwa ngokuvelisa umdiliya kwiphondo lase Ntshona koloni, kukwalapha ke kulohola wendlela u N1 apho baphangwa khona abaqhubi abathenga umdiliya okukrokrelwa ukuba ubiwe kwifama ezikufitshane. Amapolisa athi zenyukile iziganeko zokuphangwa kulengingqi. Siyacela kubantu abaqhuba benqumla e De Doorns ukuba bangamisi bathenge i grapes apha ecaleni ku N1 because ingxaki esiye sayifumana singamapolisa yinto bana bayarojwa. Amanye amaxhoba aphalaze imbilini yawo kwiphulo lokuzama ukulumkisa abanye abaqhubi. Kwinkampu yase GG kubanjwe abantu abafunyenwe nomdiliya okukrokrelwa ukuba ubiwe, nanjengoko ilixesha lesivuno eli ukubiwa komdiliya kuchaphazela kakubi abasebenzi kunye namafama. Sekubanjwe abarhanelwa abalishumi nanye kweziveki zimbini zigqithileyo. Masinikhumbuze mawethu, SABC news izakuphehlelela ijelo ndaba elizakusasaza indaba ngelwimi zesintu iyure ezingamashumi amabini anesine. Kamnandi mawethu. Mandibambe ngazibini ezindabeni ndiyabulisa kuwe mzi ontsudu aphe khaya ndikwamkele kaloku aphe edesikeni yethu yemozulu. Masikhangeleni ke eyakutsha, siqale ngojonga ingxelo yethu yemvula nomoya ngokuhlwa nje. Kukhona ukusibakala okuqatha kakhulu pha kumantla elaphondo laphaya eMpuma Koloni, xhaxha ngu 30% emancinane noko amathutyana ezamvula ngokuhlwa kwanamhlanje. Kusibakele pha ko Lesotho kwiMpuma kwakhona pha KwaZulu-Natal, ephondweni ngokubazi eMpumalanga namhlanje ke ebusuku, kwasekuseni ke ngomso sobe sivutha kaloku zizo ezazibhaxu zenkungu phakathi kwe Gqeberha ukwenyuka kanjalo kepha elunxwemeni futhi eBisho, eMonti asemile lamthutyana angephi ngu 30% phayana kumantla ko alivani phaya e Jamestown uyotsho e Komani. Kanti kusibakele ngempela kukhona futhi izibhaxo zisamile pha kumbindi KwaZulu-Natal. Naso ke mbukeli wam isilumkiso sangomso sayo kaloku lamililo yamadlelo pha kwiMpuma yelaphondo le Mpuma Koloni ngamandla kekhona kulo lonke elaphondo laphaya e Northern Cape. Nasiya kwakhona isilumkiso sobushushu obugqithise kakhulu kwaphaya khona eMpuma Koloni nazozonke nje ezangingqi ziphawuliweyo ngaye kaloku lambala ubomvu. Amaqondo obushushu aphantsi ngokuhlwa namhlanje embindini e De Aar noko kupholile kamnandi noxa kutshisa ke kuba kusebusuku ngamashumi mabini enanye. Kanti kuphole kamnandi pha embindini e Free State e Bloemfontein ngeshumi elinesibhozo, Kimberly futhi ngawo lamashumi mabini anaye ke u four, kanti ifana napha ko Upington futhi ngu 24 ngokunjalo napha ko Vryburg ngaye la 22. Kanti kuphole kamnandi namhlanje xebe ngokuhlwa nje e North West ngaye pha e Mahikeng ngu 20. Lephalale kwakhona ngamashumi mabini enanye kanti pha eMusina ephondweni le Limpopo ngu 21. Polokwane kubuye kubekuhle kakhulu futhi pha ngo 18, kanti e Phalaborwa ngawo nje lamashumi mabini. Ngomse ke amaqondo obushushu aphezulu enjenje, kutshisa mpela pha ligqatse ubhobhoyi kakhulu e Upington ngu 41 emva kwemini, Alexander Bay ngu 26, kuyatshisa kwakhona pha e Springbok ngamashumi mathathu anesithandathu. Kutshise mpela e Calvinia ngengqatsini ka 37, Vredendal 35, Sutherland kwakhona futhi ngu 32 zekuthi pha noko kuphole kamnandi nokwakutshisa kanti kumnandi pha eKapa ngaye la 26, e George okokugqibela futhi 26, kanti pha e Riversdale 31. Mna ungoza ndikuthanda kangaka xesha elimyoli.

Title: Project
Answer.transcript: Isebe lezempilo lithi lizakuqhubekeka ukuqinisekisa ukuba banikwa inkxaso abasebenzi abathe baphulukana nobomi babo. Abazali nabafundi abasuswe kwindawo emva kwezikhukhula zango Epril zalonyaka umnye ezithe zahlasela iphondo iKwaZulu Natal bamemelela uRhulumente ukuba angenelele ekuqinisekiseni ukuba abantwana bafumana izikolo. UThobani Nxumalo oneminyaka eliyishumi nesikhombisa ebehlala elokishini yase Ntuzuma, umzi wakowabo uye wamka nezikhukhula ngo Epril. Wenza ibanga ugrade 10, yena nosapho lwakhe baziswa endaweni yase Rossford hills ngenyanga edlulileyo. Njengokuba izikolo zizovulwa ngenyanga ezayo uThobani akakasifumani isikolo. “Andiyazi ukuba ndizokwenza njani njengoko isikolo ilikamva lethu”. Abazali bakhathazekile ngekamva labantwana babo. “Andiyazi ukuba ndizokwenza njani ngengokuba sihleli nabantwana ezindlini,  asithandi uhlala nabantwana ezindlini njengoko siyazi ukuba isikolo sibalulekile kwixesha langoku” . “Incwadi zabo azibhalwanga, asiyazi noba siqhubekeke sithenge ezinye okanye impahla yesikolo” utshilo omnye wabazali. Iziphathi magunya kumnyango wezemfundo zePhondo uyaqhubekeka ukuqinisekisa ukuba bakhangela abafundi abathe bachaphazeleka ngulomonakalo. “Sizakuqhubekeka ukubakhangela abafundi abachaphazelikeyo ukuqunisekisa ukuba bayalufumana uncedo” . Inani labafundi abachaphazekileyo alikaziwa okwangoku. Amaxhoba ezikhukhula eSt Jonisi eMpuma Koloni athi asalinde uncedo luka Rhulumente emva konyaka wokuhlaselwa zizikhukhula. Umba wezindlu ezisemgangathweni ngumba ojongene nesininzi esihlala eSt Jonisi, uninzi lusahlala ezindlini ezinziwe ngodaka besithi kulithuba belinde izindlu ezizizo. “Iyeza into ethile ethi silinde ingathi zingeza izindlu nathi sihlale silinde, kodwa ke oko sahlala kule meko kusenje nangoku”. Imvula ine ngamandla eSajonisi kwiveki ephelileyo iintsapho ezimbini zishiyeke zingenamakhaya. “Ibipha, imelene nalendlu, yehla kengoku yayokutshona phantsi komhlaba”. “Njengokuba indlu kamakhelwane ibimelene naleyasekhaya yehla yadabula pha ekhaya yangena izindlu zehla ngomva zawa eziwayo”. URhulumente wase Sajonisi uthi uzama iziseko zolungisa amanzi nee ndlela. Kule thethi miliyoni sikwazi ukwenza iprokijekthi ezine, enye kwa wadi 6 ezimbini kwa wadi 10. Abahlali base Sajonisi bathi intlekele zendalo zisewuthwaxa lombandla ngoko ke bafuna ungenelelo luka Rhulumente ka Zwelonke. Abakh’ mkhanyo bathi umongameli uCyril Ramaphosa makazenze inguqu kwi khabhinethi yakhe ngokukhulu ukunonophela bathi uba uzokugxotha abaphathiswa abamphikisayo oko kuzokusengela phantsi inzame zokumanya umbutho we ANC. Ngelixa umongameli engaziwa ngokusoloko esenza inguqu kwi khabhinethi yakhe kodwa unikwe inkxaso emandla ngamasebe ombutho ukuquka umlisela nomthinjana kwiqela lolawulo kunika ithemba ukuba wona usesemandleni ungenza izinto zenzeke. Ukonyulwa kuka Fikile Mbalula njengo siba jikelele we ANC kushiye isithuba kwisebe lozothutha umphathiswa walo ntoleyo inika ithuba umongameli enze inguqu kwi khabhinethi. Mnumzana Mbalula ukholelwa ekubeni kufuneka iziquququ zosipetsu. Abakhi mkhanyi bathi kuzonyanzeleka umongameli alole isandla soxolo nakwabo bamphikisayo! Iyantlukwano iyakudala iduma elitsalisa igazi xa kuyiwa kunyulo jikelele ngo 2024. Ngelixa umongameli esitya amathambo engqondo isizwe sona sithe qwa kwinguqu ezizothi zenzeke kwi khabinethi. Amafama kunye namapolisa kwingingqi yase Hex river valley eNtshona Koloni bamemelela ukuba abaqhubi ukuba bangathengi umdiliya kuhola wendlela UN1. Abakwantsana bathi ziqatsele iziganekeo zokuphakwa kwabaqhubi abangahoyanganto kulendlela. IDidorensi eHesiriva veli yaziwa ngoku velisa umdiliya kwiphondo lase Ntshona Koloni. Kukwalapha ke kulendlela uN1 apho ba phangwa khona abaqhubi abathenga umdiliya okukrokrelwa ukuba ubiwe kwi fama ezikufutshane, amapolisa athi zonyukile iziganeko zokuphangwa kulengingqi. “Siyacela kubantu abaqhuba benqumla eDidorensi ukuba bangamisi bathenge idrephusi apha ecaleni ku N1 bhikhozi ingxaki esithe sayifumana singamapolisa yinto yokuba bayarojwa”.  Amanye amaxhoba aphalaze imbilini yawo kwiphulo lokuzama ukulumkisa abanye abaqhubi. Kwinkampu yase JJ kubanjwe abantu abafunyenwe benomdiliya ekukrokrelwa ukuba ubiwe nanjengoku ilixesha lesivuno eli. Ukubiwa komdiliya kuchaphazela kakubi abasebenzi kunye namafama. Sekubanjwe abarhanelwa abalishumi elinanye kweziveki zimbini zigqithileyo. Masinikhumbuze mawethu I SABC izokuphehlelela ijelo ndaba elizokusasaza indaba ngelwimi zesintu ngeyure ezingamashumi amabini anesine kamnandi mawethu. Mandibame ngazibini mawethu ndinamkele kaloku apha edesikeni yethu yemozulu. Masikhangele elakutshange, siqale ngengxelo yethu yemvula nomoya. Kukhona ukusibekela okoqatha kwela phondo laphaya eMpuma Koloni mancinane amathuba emvula. Kusibekele eLesotho kwi mpuma, napha Kwazulu Natal ephondweni ngokubanzi futhi eMpumalanga namhlanje ebusuku. Ekseni kengomso, sobesivuswa kaloku zizo ezazibhaxu zenkungu Phakathi kwe Gqeberha uyotsha phezukwenxweme eBisho eMonti. Izibhaxu zisemile pha kumbindi wakwa Zulu Natal. Nasi isilumkiso sangomso lamililo yamadlelo somlilo phaya eMpuma Koloni nase Mntla Koloni. Nasi isilumkiso kwakhona kobushushu obugqithisele ziphawulwe ngombala obomvu. Ngomso ke amaqondo obushushu aphezulu  kutshisa mpela e Aphenthini ngo 41 emva kwemini, Alexandre Bay ngu 42. ESpringibhokhi ngamashumi amathathu anesithathu. Zeliphole eKapa ngu26, eJoji 26, kanti pha eriva stay ngu 31. Ndikuthanda kangaka! Ixesha elimyoli.

Title: Project
Answer.transcript: Abezomthetho bamangela ukuba i NPA yongeze ityala lokubulala kwisibini esivele enkundleni namhlanje nesityholwa ngokuncedisa ekugqwesheni kuka Thabo bester. Kubonakala inkqubela kwiziganeko zokubulawa kwabasebenzi base Fort Hare njengokuba kuvele abarhanelwa abahlanu enkundleni kamantyi eDikeni ngelityala. Kubhiyozelwa intsuku ezilikhulu ngaphambi kwesiqalo sendebe yehlabathi ye FIFA kwibhola ekhatywayo yamanina. Molweni emakhaya samkele nababukeli kwijelo i DTT nanku uvimba wangokuhlwa nje. Ingcali yezomthetho ithi ikhwanqisekile ukuba i NPA yongeze lokubulala kulo wayengumsebenzi yenkampani iG4S u Senohe Matsoara, u Matshora kunye no Zolile Sekeleni batyholwa ngokuncedisa u Thabo Bester aqhweshe entolongweni. USekeleni ngutata ka Qhira Nandipha Magudumana nosisi nqanda mathe sika Bester. UMachini Motloung uthi sele isaziwa nanguthathatha ukuba umzimba owafunyanwa kwisisele sika Bester emva kokulahleka kwakhe wasele uswelekile ngelixa wayeqhwesha umdlwenguli ka Facebook. Amadoda amabini natyhola ngokuba nenxaxheba ekuqhwesheni kuka Thabo Bester asezokuhlala ngapha kwezitixo, avele kancinci kwinkundla kamantyi yase Bloemfontein namhlanje. Kongezwe amanye amatyala aquka urhwaphilizo, ukubulala kunye nokubangumqobo phambi kwengalo yomthetho. Umtyhola wokuqala uSenohe Matsoara wayesebenzela inkampani i G4S. Umrhanela wesibini uZolile Sekeleni ngutata ka Qhira Nandipha Magudumana noncuma noBester, esisibini sibanjwe ngalempela veki egqithileyo kwaye sizakufaka isicelo se bail ngomvulo. I NPA ithi buliqilima ubungqina abanabo kwelityala. Ingcali yezomthetho ithi ukuba abetshutshisi abakwazi ukuthi thaca ubungqina obuqinileyo, obungqininisa ityala lokubulala lonto ingakhokhelela okubeni lingabikho buqilima elityala. Ityala limiselwe ishumi elinesixhenxe kule imiyo nalapho esisibini sizakufaka isicelo se bail. Kusenjalo ngelixa kuvele abantu ababini enkundleni malunga nokuncedisa ekuqhwesheni kuka Thabo Bester, unina uthi kokuba u Bester abuyiselwe kweli emvakokuba ebanjwe kakhona e Arusha e Tanzania. Sibambe udliwano ndlebe olukhethekileyo nonina ka Bester ngelixa kuthe ndi indaba zokuba lo nozala ufumana izirhorhiso emva kokuvuma kwakhe esidlangalaleni ukuba uzalwa nguye u Bester. Ngelixa abasemagunyeni kweli besathetha thethana nogxa babo base Tanzania ngokubuyisela u Bester no Gqirha Magudumana kweli, unina ka Bester wothukile ukuba esisibini sikwazile ukubaleka ingalo yomthetho de kube ngulomzuzu. Lo nozala uthi wambona okokuqala nokokugqibela uMagudumana ngethuba wayefuna ukunikwa umzimba abasemagunyeni abathi ayingoka Thabo. Amapolisa athi kungenzeka kubanjwe abanye abantu ngalomba. Abarhanelwa abahlanu abanxulunyaniswa nogetyengo lwabasebenzi abahlanu be Dyunivesithi i Fort Hare eMpuma Koloni bazakugcinwa eluvalelweni de ibengumhla wesine wokuchophelwa kwesicelo se bail. Abatyholwa bajongene netyala lokubulala, elokuzama nokuphatha imipu engekho mthethweni. Batyholwa ngokugebenga umlindi wenqununu yase Fort Hare u Mboneli Vesele no manejala wezothutho kweliziko, bebevele kwinkundla kamantyi eDikeni abarhanelwa. Abatyholwa baquka umsebenzi okwisikhundla esiphezulu kwiyunivesithi yase Fort Hare nosele wanqunyanyiswa, kunye nomsebenzi owathatha umhlala phantsi, kwakunye no wayengumfundi kule yunivesithi. Abanye ababini basuka KwaZulu-Natal. Abatyholwa babanjwe kwimpela veki yepasika.  Zithakazelelwe iindaba kufunyanwa kwabathyolwa kusapho lwexhoba kunye neForte.  Tata Siyabulela that kukho abantu ababanjiweyo abazokuvela phambi kwenkundla zamatyala.Iyasivuyisa ukwazi ukuba umthetho noko singanalo ithemba kuwo. Umphathiswa uBheki Cele uthi kungakho abanye abantu abanokubanjwa. NdinguLibabala dada kwindaba zeSABC eDikeni. Umbutho uHelen Suzeman Foundation neminye imibutho yamatsha ntliziyo amalungelo oluntu ifake isimangalo kwinkundla ephakamileyo eGauteng ePitoli ngelokuphikisa isigqibo esithathwe ngumphathiswa wezekhaya ugqirha Aron Motswaledi sokuba kupheliswe inqubo yempepha mvume zabemi baseZimbabwe kwezokuhlala kweli phantsi kwenqubo Izep. Amagqwetha amele lo butho athi ugqirh aAron Motswaledi akanakuthatha isigqibo esinobuzaza nesichaphazel Ikamva lamawaka waka bamemi base Zimbabwe abahleli kweli ngokusemthethweni ngaphandle kokubamba iingxoxo kunye nabo. La magqwethat athe esi sigqibo asihambisani nkonke konke nenqubo yedemocarcy nanjengoko esithei eli lizwe lijongene nengxaki yabemi bangaphandle abakweli ngokungekhomthethweni. Kodwa abantu abazakuchaphazeleka kwesi sigqibo ngabemi baseZimbabwe abakwelilizwe ngokusemthethweni.  Isigqibo sokupheliswa lenqubo eyasungwa ngo2009 siza kuchaphazela abemi baseZiimbabwe abahlala, abafunda nabasebenza kweli ngokusemthethweni abangapha kweR170 000. Le mibutho ifuna esi sigqibo sibhengezwe njengesingekho mthethweni.  Kwalapha ezindabeni igquba lemigulukudu iJuburtton  eCasedop emntla ntshona luzubandakanye kuphulo lokubuyisa ucwangco lomthetho kwindawo yayo kodwa masiqale evenkileni. Sinamnkele kwakhona kwindaba zeli jelo, uyakwazi ukubekela kwakhona ezi ndaba kujelo lweYou tube uthi SABC indaba zesiXhosa. Kwinqaku lokuqala sithe:Ingcali yezomthetho ithi ikhwankqusekile ukuba Inpa yongeze ityala lokubulala kulowo wayengumsebenzi kwinkampani yakwaG4S uSerule Motsware. UMotsware kunye noZolile Sekeleni batyholwa ngokuncedisa uThabo Bester entolongweni aqhweshe. Usekeleni kutata ka gqirha Nandipha Magudumane nosisinqanda mathe sikaBester. UMatshini Motlou uthi sele isaziwa nangu Thand owafunyanwa kwisisele sikaBester emva kokulahleka kwakhe sele eswelekile . Ngoku masicaphule izimvo zabantu kuwhatsapp malunga neli tyala likaBester. Abasemagunyeni mabaze naye uBeste kunye negqiyazana lakhe uDr Nandipha. Lifike ixesha ngoku lokuba bazokuphendula.  Ezi ndaba zokuba nalo kaBester uphinde waqhwesha nakula Tanzani yebhongo njena, ingaba siyaqhathwa.  URhulumente waseTanzani ndimqhwabela izindla more than 100 times. Uwenzile umsebenzi omhke kakhulu ngokuthi abambe esi sidlwengu. Apho ndijonge khona man kusekubeni baphume njani apha elizweni. Bonke aba bantu bakhona xa bekuphekwa eliyekenqe kwababa bayaphuma. Makuqokelelwe bona ngabo abazasizela nenyani zesibone nabanye baphuma njani kweli lizwe.  Mandithabathe eli thuba msasazi wam ndibulele amapolisa umnumzana uBheki Cele, mhle umsebenzi awenzileyo ngokunqakula esibhongobhiyana uBester. Iqiniso malithethwe uMzanzi Afrika uyohlulakala bubudlobongwano ngoba naba bakwazile ukuqhwesha eziseleni kodwa kukho abantu abaqeshiweyo nguRhulumente. Ityala   lobuqhophololo norhwaphilizo nowayesabangu mphathiswa wophuhliso kwezoqoqosho nokhenketho KwaZulu Natal uMike Mabuyakhulu kunye nabanye abalishumi elinesihlanu

Abathyolwa bajongene  netyala lokubulala nokuzama ukubulala kunye nokuphatha imipu engekho semthethweni. Bathyolwa ngokugebengu umlindi wenqununu yaseFort Hare uMboneli Vesele nomanejala wezothutho kweliziko bebevele kwinkundla kamantyi edityeni abarhanelwa.  Abatyholwa baquka umsebenzi okwisikhundla esiphezulu kwiUniversity yase Fort Hare nosele wanqunyanyiswa kunye nomsebenzi owathatha umhlala phantsi kwakunye nowayengumfundi kuleuniversity. Abanye ababini basuka kwaZulu Natal. Abatyholwa babanjwe kwimpela veki yepasika. Zithakazelelwe iindaba zokufunyanwa kwabatyholwa lusapho lwexhoba kunye neFort Hare.  Tata siyabulela that kukhona abantu abababanjiweyo abazawuvela phambi kweenkundla zamatyala. Kuyasivusa ukwazi ukuba umthetho singanalo ithemba kulo. Umphathiswa uBheki Cele uthi kungakho abanye abantu abanokubanjwa . NdinguLubabalo Dada kwiindaba zeSABC eDikeni.  Umbutho weHelen Suzman foundation neminye imibutho yamatshantliziyo amalungelo oluntu ifake isimangalo kwinkundla ephakamileyo yaseGauteng ePitoli ngesokuphikisa isigqibo esithathwe ngumphathiswa wezekhaya ugqirha Aaron Motsoaledi sokuba kupheliswe inkqubo yeempepha mvume zabebi baseZimbabwe zokuhlala kweli phantsi kwenkqubo iZEP. Amagqwetha amele lombutho athi ugqrirha Aaron Motsoaledi akanakuthatha isigqibo esinobuzaza nesichapazela ikamva lamawakawaka labemi baseZimbabwe abahleli kweli ngokusemthethweni ngaphandle kokubamba ingxoxo kunye nabo. Lamagqwethat athi esisigqibo somphathiswa asihambisani konkekonke nenkqubo yedemocracy nanjengoko esithi elilizwe lijongene nengxaki yabemi bangaphandle abakweli ngokungekho mthethweni kodwa abantu abazakuchaphazeleka kwesisigqibo ngabemi baseZimbabwe abakwelilizwe ngokusemthethweni.  Isigqibo sokuphelisa lenkqubo eyasongulwa ngo2009 sizakuchaphazela abemi baseZimbabwe abahlala, abafunda nabasebenza kweli ngokusemthethweni abangaphaya kwe170000. Lemibutho ifuna esisigqibo sibhengezwe njengesingekho mthethweni. Kwalapha ezindabeni igquba lemigulukudu ejuphethe neKlerksdop emntla ntshona lizibandakanye kwiphulo lokubuyisa ucwangco nomthetho kwindawo yalo kodwa masiqale evenkileni. Sinamkele kwakhona kwiindaba zelijelo uyakwazi ukubukela kwakhona ezindaba kwijelo leYoutube uti SABC iindaba zesixhosa. Kwinqaku lokuqala sithe ingcali yezomthetho ithe ikhwankqisekile ukuba iNPA  yongeze ityala lokubulala kulowo wayengumsebenzi kwinkampani iG4S  uSenohe Motsoare kunye noZolile Sekeleni bathyolwa ngokuncedisa uThabo Bester aqhweshe entolongweni. Osebeleni ngutata kagqirha Nandipha Magudumane nosisinqandamathe sikaBester. UMatshini Motloeng uthi sele isaziwa nanguthathatha ukuba umzimba owafumanwa kwisisele sikaBester emva kokulahleka kwakhe wawusele uswelekile ngelixa eqhwesha umdlwenguli kafacebook. Ngoku masicaphule izimvo zabantu kwikhasi lethu likawhatsapp ngelityala likaThabo Beste. Abasemagunyeni mabaze naye uBester kunye negqiyazana lakhe uDoctor Nandipha lifikile ixesha lokuba bazokuphendula. Ezindaba zokuba lokaBester uphinde waqhwesha nakulaTanzania yebhongo njena ingaba siyaqhathwa. Urhulumente waseTanzania ndimqhwabela izandla more than 100 times. Uwenzile kakuhle umsebenzi ngokuthi abambe esisidlwengu. Apho ndijonge khona mna kusekubeni baphume njani apha elizweni. Bonke ababantu bakhona xabekuphekwa eliyelekenqe babe bayaphuma ndiba makuqokolelwe bona. Ngabo abosizela nenyani zesibone nabanye sazi nokuba abantu kanti baphuma njani kwelilizwe. Bandithabathe elithuba msasazi wam ndibulele umphathiswa wamapolisa uMnumzana uBheki Cele mhle umsebenzi awenzileyo ngokunqakula esisibhongobhiyane sakwaBester. Ingase bangayinikwa tu ibheyile ababantu, bagwetywe kwezimnyama izisele kunye noThabo Bester lowabo. Uyabona ezizigila mkhuba ezisize uThabo Bester waqhwesha entilonglweni ingase bangangaziniki ibheyile. Kwigqiza elilande uBester sovule amehlo singabemi boMzantsi Afrika. Kwaba ke bathe banesandla ekuphumeni kwakhe esiseleni umthetho mawuqine kubo. Inyaniso mayithethwe, uMzantsi Afrika uyohlulakala bubudlobongela kwelilizwe kuba kaloku uBester ukwazile ukuqhwesha eziseleni kodwa kukhona abantu abaqashiweyo ngurhulumente abakhokhelwayo khona ukuze benze umsebenzi. Naku thina masikhrosa la , noba sikhrosa nje iprovince basibamba ngapha nangapha , basigijimise ngapha nangapha besifuna zonke izinto. Yena uhambe kanjani?  Utyala lobuqhophololo norhwaphilizo olwayesawuba ngumphathiswa wophuhliso loqoqosho nokhenketho yMike Mabuyakhulu kunye nabanye abalishumi elinesihlanu.....

Title: Project
Answer.transcript: Abathyolwa abavele ngokufutshane kwinkundla ephakamileyo yaseThekwini ngalentsasa bajongene nezityholo zokuqhophololo, urhwaphilizo kunye nokuthubelezisa imali. Abatyholwa kuthiwa baxhamle ngokungekho semthethweni kumnyhadala wejazz wezigidi ezingamashumi amabini anesibhozo ngo2012. Lomsitho awuzange wenzeke kodwa kutyholwa ukuba imali kutyholwa ukuba yahlawulwa kubanikezeli benkonzo. Ityala lihlehliselwe ulwesithathu nanjengoko omnye umtyholwa ethe uyagula kwaye akakwazi ukuvela enkundleni. Abasemagunyeni babekele bucala imali eyi 1.1 billion rand yesicwangciso seminyaka elishumi elinesihlanu samanzi nokufunwa kwawo. Oku kwenza ukukhawulelana nemeko yokoma kwempompo zamanzi okwenzeka ngo2018.  Urhulumente wephondo uthi ubhenele ekubeni afumane isisombululo kwinto iingcali eziyibiza ngonobangela woguquguquko  lwemozulu. Inkulu yabaphathiswa uAllan Windy uthi ukungacaci kokulindeleka kwexa lemvula kwanoluntu luyalusanda kudala ukuba abahlali bahlale bexhobile. Phakathi kwezicwangciso ezicetywayo ukusebenzisa ubuxhakaxhaka bobuchwephetshe balemihla kwilinge lokubuya kusetyenziswe amanzi asele esebenzile, kwanokulondolozwa kwemithombo nokusebenzisa amanzi ngobulumko. Amadami kweliphondo ame kumyinge omalunga namashumi amathandathu eepesenti ntoleyo eyolatha ukuba oku kunganeno ngeshumi lepesenti xana kuthelekiswa lonyaka uphelileyo ngaxa linye. UWindy uthi nanje ngoko elilizwe lisagqushalaza phantsi kwesandla senkqubo kacimicimi wombane nokusetyenziswa ngobunene bombane yena ukholelwa ekubeni makutyalwe imali kumaphulo aquka amanzi asetyenziswa ngononoselo. NdinguMlamli Maneli kwiindaba zeSABC eKapa.  Umaspala iSol Platjie uwucikile umbane okwethutyana kwingingqi yamatyotyombe iPlanfontein eKimberely ukulandela ukusweleka kwentobazanyana eminyaka emithandathu ebanjwe ngumbane ngenxa yokufakelwa umbane ongekhosemthethweni olwaziwa njengezinyokanyoka. Oko ucinywe umbane emva kokusweleka kukaDina Selunda. Lwentwazana imidlala nabahlobo bayo kufuphi nekhaya layo xakusehla elishwangusha.  Esi sisehlo esithe sohlula umphefumlo nenyama kaDina Seluna obeneminyaka esithandathu. Kukholelwa ukuba lentwazana ibeke inqawe ngenxa yoxonyozelelo kombani ongekho semthethweni oluxananazileyo kulengingqi.  Abahlali bathi uDina ngumntu wesihlanu kulengingqi ukonzakaliswa ngumbane ngenxa yeentambo ezithe gengelele ezitalatweni. Ngekuthe kwaphetshwa ukufa kwalentwazana ukuba onke amakhaya ebenombane okhuselekileyo. Ezo zizimvo zabahlali xeshikweni bemsola umasipala iSol Platjie.  Ukanti umasipala utyhola abahlali ngokuchasa umthetho nokubeka ubomi babasebenzi bakwamasipala esichengeni. Amagosa akwamasipala athi agrogriswa yangungciphu uba bahlaselwe xababezama ukuqhawula izinyoka. Kengoko bazakubuyela kulendawo sisakuthomalala isimo. AbakwaNtsasana balivulile idokothi lophando. Intwazana uDina kulindeleke ukuba ifihlwe kulempelaveki siya kuyo.  Igquba lemigulukudu eJobhethini eKlerksdorp emntlantshona lizibandakanye ekubuyiseni ucwangco nomthetho endaweni yalo. Iqela lemiguvela nonintsi lwabo bebefudula bengamabanjwa luzibandakanya kumaphula okuphuhlisa ngakumbi ulutsha . Eliphulo lijolise ekukhwebuleni ulutsha kulwaphulomthetho. Lha ngamalungu eqela legulukudu elidume ngoburhalarhume neliziwa ngegama iakhayida ijobhethina. Intsukaphi yeligama isuka kwelo lombutho owawuxhobe ume ngamazinyo woophuma silwe wamasilamsi iakhayida yasekwa nguOsama Bin Laden ngeminyaka yoo1980. Eliqela lemigulukudu liphilise ubumi bentshontsho uluntu lwaseJobethina yintlaninge yeminyaka. Bambi beliqela bakhe bathothoza kwezimnyama izisele. USteven Muhlake ominyaka iyi39 uyise wesihlanu sabantwana naye sele esuka kuthothoza ngenxa yezenzo ezininzi zobundlobongela.  Uthi ngoku zijikilizinto njengomgulukudu uguquke yabanguye okhusela nofundisa ulutsha lwendawo yakhe, amilisele kananjalo umthetho nocwangco. Uluntu lwaseJobhethina luswele imilomo eliwaka ukubulela imigulukudu ngegalelo layo nemisebenzi emihle ukuhlaleni. UMuhlanke uqhwatyelwa iizandla njengeqhawe nomzekelo omhle kwabo bafuna ukuguqula ibali labo. UMuhlanke uyabongoza nakumphi na umntu omtsha khe azithande yena angazifaki kulwaphulomthetho kuba alusi ndawo, ndaweni yoko uzakuphalala njengamanzi mntu omtsha ufele ebubini, ulebele watsho. Namhlanje kuqatshelwa iintsuku ezilikhulu ngaphambi kokuqala kwendebe yehlabathi yamanina iFIFA. Letumente inamaqela angamashumi amathathu anesibini isidlekwa ngoqhogwana yiAustalia neNew Zealand ukuqala ngomhla wamashumi amabini ngoJuly kulonyaka eSidney naseAuckland.  Ukuphawula iintsuku ezilikhulu ngaphambi koqala kwendebe yehlabathi kuphehlelelwe iphulo elilodwa laletumente kwizixeko ezizakusindleka iSidney nase Australia logama kananjalo kuvulwe intengiso yamatikiti. Ibikwangumsitho wokugqithisa isimemelelo ngomakulinganwe ngokwesini kwezemidlalo. Ihidden park yodumo eAustralia izakusingatha umsitho wokuvula phambi kokuba iNew Zealand idlale kugroup A neNorway. Kwiiyure ezimbalwa emva koko iAustralia inyathelane neIreland kugroup B estadium Australia ezakusindleka ngefinal ngomhla wamashumi amabini ngoAugust. Iqela laseMelika lizintandane kuletumente. UMzantsi Afrika ujongene nomsebenzi ongenzimanga kangako ugroup D neSweden, Italy neArgentina. Ibhaso elizakuphumelelwa ziintshatsheli zizigidi zeedola zaseMelika edlisayo yi150 million dollars ephindaphindwe kathathu kwisiqendu sango2019 salendebe yehlabathi.  Sibulele bawethu ngokusiboleka indlebe sinikhumbuze ezangomso ziza ngesizulu. Busuku benzolo. Bhotani mawethu ndicel asikhongozele nalu uqikelelo lwemozulu. Libalele izulu kwiindawo ezininzi zelizwe kodwa ke kukhona la30 phesenti wamathuba emvula phaya eLimpopo. Ngomso ke mbukeli siyabona ukuba noko lisabalele kwiindawo ezininzi zelizwe kodwa ke zikhona ezazibhaxu zenkungu pha kwelaphondo laseMpumalanga ngokunjalo nakwindawo ezikumantla wapha KwaZuluNatal ukuyothi gha ePolokwane . Zikhona neentshizane ezithe qha ezilindelekileyo pha buthambeka eli lomtsha mpuma welizwe. Mbukeli uyabongozwa uqaphele kaloku lamozulu ethande ukufudumala nenomoya onokudala imililo yamadlelo pha kwiindawo ezisembindini ukuquka ke phaya eNothern Cape ukwehlela kwiindawo ezikumantla phaya eNtshona koloni nangokunjalo napha kwingxenye yaseFree state. Masijonge into yoba wona amaqondo wethu okutshisa asibekaphi ngokuhlwanje nangentseni yangomso. Mbukeli athandubamahle amaqondo abetha pha koo11 eKapa lodumo into ethetha ukuba kufudumele. Sisobanje phayo eVustile nangokunjalo naseFredendal kanti kephaya eSutherland liqanda nje ngelixa silindele isithandathu eUpington. Kwimimandla eseMpuma mbukeli nakhona lihle izulu kwiindawo izigudla unxweme lwapha eMpuma. EGqeberha silindele u11 degrees celcius nangokunjalo naphaya emonti ukanti sisihlanu eNkaladokhwe nangokunjalo naphaya kooKomani. Aphinde ke torho athathise amaqondo ngo14 phaya eSajonisi ngelixa silindele u17 eMpangeni, Richards Bay nangokunjalo eThekwini. Sisibozo nje pha erhawutini nangokunjalo nasePitoli azawuphinde athathise amaqondo ngo17 pha eMusina ngelixa iparabolwa naseliphalale kufudumele kakuhle ngo16 degrees celcius. Ngomso kembukeli kuphole nje kakuhle kwimibandla esentshona amaqondo abetha phaya kumashumi amabini eKapa lodumo nangokunjalo eRiverstate kanti aphinde athathise afudumale ngo27 eFredendali , ngo30 eUpington ngelixa ingu27 pha eKimberely . Kumibandla eseMpuma kuthande ukufudumala mbukeli amaqondo abetha phaya ko23 eKomani ngelixa silindele u25 ePitoli. Kamnandi mawethu.

Title: Project
Answer.transcript: (We are here to communicate a very clear message that we would like this war to be ended). Umongameli Cyril Ramaphosa ubambe intlanganiso nomongameli wase Russia uVladimir Putin. Kwenziwa izicwanciso zokunceda amaxhoba ezikhukhula eNtshona Koloni. Ibethe iMorocco ngamanqaku amabini kwelinye iBafana Bafana izibekela indawo kwi AFCON. Molweni emakhaya samkele nababukeli kwijelo iDTT nanku uvimba esinilungiselele wona ngokuhlwa nje. Umongameli wase Russia uVladimir Putin ulwamkele uphulo loziso xolo lweenkokheli zase Afrika kungquzulwano olugqubayo lweRussia neUkraine. UMongameli Cyril Ramaphosa ndawonye neenkokheli zamazwe eAfrika aquka iZambia, Cmoros, Senegal, Egypt neUganda zihlanganise iintloko nomongameli wase Russia uVladimir Putin ukuzama ukufumanisa indlela ebheka eluxolweni kolu ngquzulwano selitsale iinyanga ezilishumi elinesithandathu. Oku yinxalenye yomlenze wesibini wenzame zokumilisela uxolo kulandela utyelelo lwase Ukraine, apho ezintloko zamazwe eAfrika zidibene nomongameli wase Ukraine uVolodymyr Zelensky ngoLwesihlani. Kule ntlanganiso iqhubayo yase St Petersburg, kulindeleke uPutin nezinkokheli zaseAfrika zixoxe ngamaqhinga angakhokelela eluxolweni kungquzulwano oluqhoke uqoqosho kwalahleka imiphefumlo, ngumbhodama onyikimise ihlabathi jikelele.First of course is that we want to listen. We ere here to listen, as we did listen yesterday to president Zelensky. He outlined a number of issues to us, and we did tell him that we will be meeting you where we will also listen to your perspective on this war. We do firmly belive that this war must be settled, and it must be settled through negotiations, and through diplomatic means. The war can not go on forever, all wars have to be settled and come to an end at some stage and we are here to communicate a very clear message that we would like this war to be ended). Kunjalo kukwalindeleke uPutin nomongameli Ramaphosa bangqubanise iintloko bucala ngokubhekisele kwingqungquthela ezayo yeBRICSnangomsila wengwe ongokubanjwa kukaPutin okhutshwe yinkundla yehlabathi ejongene nolwaphulo mthetho. Kwenziwe izicwangciso zokuthutha imithwalo yokuncedo kwiyusithitali eNtshona Koloni. Zikhukulisekile iindlela ezingena kula mmandla kulandela iimvula ezimandla ezigalele iintsuku kwela phondo. Umasipala wase Sidaburg umise iziko lokusebenza ngokuhlangeneyo ukukhawulelana nemingeni eza nezikhukula. Iimvula zidale owona monakalo bashiyeka abantu bedinga. Izantyalantyala zemvula ezigalele eNtshona Koloni zenze umbhodamo kwiziseko zophuhliso yaye yanguqulu kubhode kwiindawo zokuhlalanokubize ukuba abantu bafihle iintloko kwezinye iindawo. Abantu abakwazi ukufikelela kwizidingo ezingu ndoqo qu nasekusebenziseni amanzi. Iidolophu eziithile eziqukaka iClan William zisankinziza kumantsintsi wkungabina mbane nanjengoko iziseko zophuhliso zivikiveke ziimvula. (We waiting, hoping and praying that the water could subside a little bit, but at this point in time the rain is continues. The town is unfortunately in lockdown, we are concerned because even the fuel based on the predictions the petrol stations only have fuel until Tuesday coming also. Similar with the municipal water services also are one borehole is under water, we are basically providing water to the town via last..we gonna have problems in terms of supply to the town but at this point in time we donn want the community to panic). (There is an excitement and enjoying as the trust came through and we will be delivering today to each one of them blankets,mattresses, toiletry bags and feed them for the next few days, water baby key packs and we will be distributing not only to this area but to other areas as well). Ezinye iindawo ezinabantu abakhahlelekileyo ziziphumo ziziphumo zezizikhukula yiVupperVaal, Vredendaalneefama ezibalekayo zale ngingqi. Xa kungoku nguphantsi phezulu yimigudu yokuthulula ithemba elithezekileyo kuluntu ngeenkqubo zokuqingqa imeko yesi sithili saseWest Coast. Usosiba jikelele weANC umnumzana uFikile Mbalula ukugxeke kabukhali ukutshiswa kweempahla yombutho iANC kwiphondo lase Free State. Oku kuza emveni kokuba kuthe ndi ivido ebonakalisa iqela labantu litshisa iimpahla ezinemibhalo yeANC. Kutyholwa ngelithi eli qela labantu liqhankqazela ukugxothwa kosesuko nguba ngusosiba jikekele umnumzana Ace Marhashule. Oka mbalula ebthetha kwindibano emalunga nokubekwa kwebhanki karhulumente, le ndibano ibanjelw eThekwini Kwazulu Natal. Abaxhasi beANC abangaxolanga batshise iimpahla zabo zeqela le ANC. Kukholelwa ukuba aba bantu batshise ezi mpahla zombutho iANC ngabaxhzsi abavutha ngumsindo balowo ebesakuba ngusosiba jikelele weANC umnumzana Ace Marhashule bebonakalisa ukungoneliseki kwabo kukugxothwa kukaMarhashule. (People are not concerned about roke people who burnt ANC shirts who claim to be members and we can't even prove that they are actually members of the ANC mobilized in the name of the individual who that individual himself have got a right if he loves this organisation to stand up for his own membership and defend it, he is not doing that instead he is going around mobilizing forming political formations doing all of that talking to leaders. How can a leader be confused about his standing in the party). Ephendula malunga nophulo lokudala uxolo phakathi kweRussia neUkraine, okaMbalula uthi awubonisi mfanekiso mhle kwaphela umbhodamo owenzeke kwikomkhulu lase Poland eWoso kwigqiza lezokhuseleko lukamongameli Cyril Ramaphosa kunye neentatheli zoMzantsi Afrika. (It is disturbing that we have South Africans who were not allowed to diembark for hundred and whatever hours 24 hours in an aero plane, which is unheard of. What did these people do you know, what did they do that fundamentally a country like Poland will actually act in such a manner that will not allow for the justice of human right people to disembark for an aero plane. Only after 24 hours that they were actually allowed. It is disturbing). Kusenjalo kule ntlanganiso iququzelelwe iANC bekukhona oosomashishini phakathi kwabanye kushukuxwa umba womthetho osayilwayo wokumiliselwa kweenguqu kwibhanki yoMzantsi Afrika iPost Bank ukuze ibeyenye yamaqumrhu karhulumente. Kulindeleke ukuba ezi nguqu zimiliselwe kwezi nyanga zimbalwa zizayo. Xa sibuya evenkileni, bamnkelwe ngovuyo abaqhubi beemoto kumyalelo wamagosa esixeko saseTshwane okukhuthaza isiqinisekiso zengqesho,ukuthatyathwa kwemifanekiso nshicilelo lweevido xa amagosa endlela esi sixeko athe abamisa. Kodwa kuqala masithi tsi gxada emakethi. Sikwamkele kwakhona mbukeli sisamkela nabo basandokungena, uyakwazi ke ufumana ezi ndaba uphela kwazi kwikhasi likaYoutube ngokuba uthi SABC iindaba zesiXhosa. Ukanti masikhe siphinde silume kwinqaku lethu eliphala phambili.  Umongameli wase Russia uVladimir Putin ulwamkele uphulo loziso xolo lweenkokheli zase Afrika kungquzulwano olugqubayo lweRussia neUkraine.  UMongameli Cyril Ramaphosa ndawonye neenkokheli zamazwe eAfrika aquka iZambia, Cmoros, Senegal, Egypt neUganda zihlanganise iintloko nomongameli wase Russia uVladimir Putin ukuzama ukufumanisa indlela ebheka eluxolweni kolu ngquzulwano selitsale iinyanga ezilishumi elinesithandathu. Abaqhubi beemoto bawamkele umyalelo wamagosa endlela yesixeko saseTswhane okhuthaza iziqinisekiso zengqesho, ukuthatyathwa kwemifanekiso noshicilelolwemifanekiso xa amagoso esi sixeko ebamisa. Amatyala obuqhetseba nokuxhatshazwa ngamagosa ezenlela esi sixeko athande ukuqatsela. IOrganisational Doing Tax Abuse iwamkelelo myalelo yawuzisa kumajelo eSABC ze wavakliswa ngobunjalo ngobambe njengentloko yamapolisa esixeko uBazel Nkwashu. izicelo zesenzo zokuqhushekiso

Title: Project
Answer.transcript: Ngobusuku bobuba bebenxibelelana namagosa ezendlela ukuphelisa ubuqhetseba nempatho egwenxa. Abaqhubi baseTswane baphefumle bophela ngeziphithiphithi ezingaginyisi mathe abangquzulana nazo kumagosa ezendlela kwesisixeko. Isithethi samapolise wesixeko uIsaac Mahamba walile ukuphefumla ngalombandela. Nanjengoko kusaqhutywa imibhiyozo yolutsha kubanjwe itumente yebhola ekhatywayo neyomnyazi kwindawo eyambethwe ludushe yaseMajola eSajonisi eMpuma Koloni. Lenkqubo yezemidlalo itshayelelwe kuleveki imibutho ye6 engekho phantsi korhulumente iSizwe Khuphelo foundation. Lombutho isocial change nebizofaka isandla ukunceda abantu kulengingqi. Oonontlalontle batyalwe kwiintsapho ezingaphaya kwamakhulu amathandathu nachatshazelwe ludushe olugqube kulengingqi kuleminyaka elishumi egqithileyo.  …yaseMajola yanyanzelisa ukuba abantu abaninzi bashiye amakhaya abo. Bambi ke balandulela eli, abanye babo basoloko bethe gqolo ukuya kwilali eMathyolweni xakukho iintetha zohlaselo kwakhona. Kodwa ngoku ithemba liyebuyela nanjokongo imibutho iSisa igxumeke iintente kwezilali inikeza ngoncedo.  Sizama ukumilisela uxolo apha kuMajola , sijonge kulutsha siphinde sijonge kwezolimo esizakuzityala apha isikakhulu ukwenza iigadi zomama. Abathandi nabalandeli bebhola ekhatywayo bathi bayavuya ezemidlalo zibuyile . Asichaphazela kakhulu kethina nengeqela lebhola iPSG  edlala kuSAB iregional league. Sigqibele singakwazi ukuzodlala iigames apha kwezindawo eziseMajola. Bekunyanzeleka sitravellishe oko oko. Amakhukhulu abantu ashuyeka engena ndawo bambi belahlekelwe yiyo yonke into kodwa ngoku uncedo lufikile. Emva kokuba sifumanisile ukuba abantu njengoba sifumanisile ukuba iihouseholds ezichaphazelekile ziyi680, sizawuthi ukufumana information iphelele sikwazi ukubiza uhome affairs azise izinto kubantu bakhe . Lemisitho eqhubayo apha eMajola ivula amathuba okushishina . Besingakwazi nokuba sidibane, bekungekho ziigame zidlalayo , nabantu abenza ibusiness bengakwazi ukuza . Abantu bebusiness bafumana ithuba xakukho ezigames . Lemibutho yesisa isebenza nzima ukuqinisekisa ukuba kubuya ithemba Phakathi kwabahlali baseMajola yaye ibinethemba lokuba abantu bazophakama beme ngeenywa basebenzise ubuhle bendalo obuzele kummandla waseMajola. Khona ukuze amakhenkethi batyelele lombandla ngokukhuselekile. NdinguNkululeko Nyembezi weendaba zeSABC eMajola.  Masihlebele mgaba kengoku sithethe nomhlalutyi wamanqaku aphala phambi kumakhasi onxibelelwano uSandile Hlangani. Masikwamkele Sandile sibulele ngexesha lakho. Ngawaphi amanqaku aphala phambili kutsha nje?  Wake waya Sisanda eMayimayi? Lelinye inqaku eliphala phambili iMayimayi, abantu abanintsi ke iMayimayi babeyazi njengendawo apho kwakukhandwa khona amayeza . Ngelaxesha leCOVID yindawo abantu ababethanda ukuya kuyo. Eyonanto ebangela uba mayitrende kenamhlanje kukuba uSjava noBig Zulu bothuse iifans zabo ngokuba bayityelele lendawo baperfome bahala isimahla bengakhange abantu babhatale. Inqaku lesibini ke labantu elitrendayo abazawulazi linqaku likaGogo Maweni . UGogo Maweni uyatyholwa kwiisocial media kuthiwa urhuqe wahlambalaza igama lamagqirha . Elinye lamagqirha likhuphe ividio lithetha kulevidio lisithi kangangokuba abasamkholwa noba uligqirha noba uligqirha gqwirha. Abantu abanintsi ke ebangele ukuba elinqaku litrende kakhulu kukuba besithi lechanel mayimkhuphe uGogo maweni angasayisebenzeli lechanel. Inqaku lesithathu ke linqaku leKazer Chiefs esizokulazi ukuba uPitso Msimane ngexesha exelela abalandeli bakhe ukuthi uzibeka phantsi iintambo u…. bayebathi bangathanda ukuba bambone eyicoach yeKazier Chiefs . Into ebangele ukuba itrende leKazier Chiefs kukuba umqeqeshi obesakuba ngowethyuni zine naye ubaxelele abalandeli bakhe ukuba uzibeke phantsi iintambo . Abantu abanintsi bathi abasayithethi indaba kaPisto Msimane bafuna umqeqeshi lo ebekwityhuni zine ibenguye oqeqesha iKazier Chiefs.  Loluphi ke olona shicelelo lwevidiyo olutshothse entla? Umprofethi waseZimbabwe ubothuse kakhulu abantu ngalentsasa yanamhlanje kuphume ividiyo yake ithe sabalala kumakhasi onxibelelwano esithi unguthixo yena ubuqu kangangokuba Amandla okanye ubungangamsha anabo bungaphezu kukathixo ubuqu.  Ingama ngawaphi ke amanqaku esingalindela ukuba ankqenkqeze phambili kuleveki siya kuyo? Kuleveki singena kuyo ngomso inqaku esizakulibona linqaku lePhalaphala gate farm. Into ebangela ukuba malihambe phambili okanye ukuba lizakuhlamba phambili kukuba abantu abanintsi bathi badikiwe bafuna ukubona ireport yalePhalaphala iphuma. Badiniwe kukuba kusoloko kusithiwa kusainvestigeythwa.  Sibulele ke kakhulu kuye uSandile Hlangani. INehawu eMpumalanga imemelela urhulumente wephondo aqinise kwimigqaliselo yokhuseleko kumaziko ezonyango. Ngoku emva kokuba abasebenzi bakwisibhedlela iCaroliner behlaselwe liqela ekutyholwa ukuba yimigulukudu ebutsheni bemini yangecawe. ICaroliner yenye yeengingqi ezichatshazelwa luhlaselo lwemiguvela kweliphondo.  Esisibhedlele suke sasisigculelo sokulaselwa zizaphulimthetho. Kutyholwa ukuba imigulukudu imbonzeleke ngonyezi kuqhamke ingxwabangxwaba emva kokuba umguvela eyalele abasebenzi bamnike unyango . Kushiywe indawo yolwamkelo lwezigulani yonakalisekile kwaxhatshazwa abasebenzi, bambi bathathelwa izinto. Bathe xhungu yinxalabo abasebenzi bambi bathathelwa izinto.  INEHAWU imemelela urhulumente khe akhokhelise ukhuseleko lwabasebenzi. Kokwesibini sihlaselwa esisibhedlele. Abahlali bathi baphila ubomi bentshontsho. Isebe lezempilo lisigxekile esisenzo . Amapolisa asaphanda ngesisehlo . Ibafana bafana ibethe imorocco ngamanqaku amabini kwelinye kumdlalo ozibekelindawo iAfkhon kwibala ebelizinyaswe ngabalandeli abaqabele ku57 000 e FNB eRhawutini. Omabini ke lamaqela sele ezibekele indawo kwiAfkhon kodwa ibilithuba lokuzibonakalisa kweBafana Bafana ngakwiqela elajika kwesemi final yendebe yehlabathi. Ibafana ikwindebe yokuqala kugroup K. Oncokola banzi ngalomdlalo sinentatheli uMduduzi Ndlovu. Mduduzi siyakwamkela ,udlale njani lomdlalo namhlanje?
