Title: Project
Answer.transcript: Iqela lakhe alizuphazamiseka kumdlalo weDSTV premiership ngaphambi komdlalo wekhefu neqela icotton sport yaseCameroon. Tshoni lingenandaba siyanimema mawethu ukuba nisondele sisithi ngxatsho nakuni mawethu kwijelo i DTT. Sinivubisela ngetshelo lamatyholo amadali ngalentlwa amasi alo antubululu. Molweni ke.  Bagqejwe olungophiyo abathengi abanamatyala nanjengoko kuzakufuneka bangene nzulu ezipokothweni ukuze bakwazi ukuhlawula amatyala abo. Ukuze emva kokuba ibhanki enguvimba inyuse nge50 basis points iqondo lenzala kwimali mboleko ntoleyo inyuse inzala yokubolekisa kwayo kwiibhanki zorhwebo yayakutsho kwi7.5% ngelixa inzala ibhanki ezibolekisa ngayo inyuke yaya kutsho ku11.25% . Ibhanki enguvimba ithi izama ukulawula ukunyuka kwamaxabiso. Kuzakubanzima ngakumbi kubathengi abaxinwe ngamatyala kwilinge lebhanki enguvimba lokulawula ukunyuka kwamaxabiso inyuse imali yenzalimboleko ityeli lethoba susela ngoNovemba ka2021 .Izinga lokunyuka kwamaxabiso libekwe ku6.1% nangona bekuqikelelwe ukuba lizakuba ku5.4% . Esona sizathu kukunyuka kwamaxabiso okutya, amafutha kunye nombane. Ucimicimi wombane naye unyuse amaxabiso oshishino. Okukukunyuswa ngemali yenzalimboleko kufak’uxinzelelo kubathengi. Emva kwesisibhengezo irandi ithande ukomelela xa ithelekiswa nedola yaseMelika. Kusenjalo ibhanki enguvimba yehlise uqikelelo loqoqosho kulonyaka laku0.2% lusuk ku0.3%. Ithi oku kudalwa yimiba eliqela nequka ulwamvila locimicimi nonefuthe elibi kwezoshishino . Isebe lwenkozo zoluleko lutyumbe umlawuli wethutyana weziko loluleko laseMangawung eFreystatha emva kokudula kweendaba zokuqhwesha kwebanjwa ekwakuthiwa uzibulele uThabo Bester odume ngelomdlwenguli kafacebook. Isebe lwezoluleko belichuba isikhwebu ngezamvanje ngalodulubhentsu kaBester obesaziwa ngelokuba sele ekwelemimoya kanti usadla amazimba. Ndiyabulela.  Umkomishinali weenkozo zoluleko uMnumzana Marhoti Thobagale uthi kuyabonakala uBester wancediswa ukuqhwesha ngegumgedle elinokuba elinesembizeni. Ukanti esenza intlanganiso yeKhabhinethi yaleveki umphathiswa kwiofisi kamongameli uNkosazana Khumbuzo Ntshabeni uthe ikhabhinethi igqibe ekuyaleleni isebe leenkonzo zoluleko ligxabhagxabhise ukuphelisa izivumelwano neenkampani zabucala zokulawula amaziko oluleko amabini kwelilizwe egameni lelisebe. Luyaqhuba uphando lwamapolisa lokuqhwesha kukaThabo Bester kwaye neenzame zokumphica phantsi kwezicithi ziyaqhuba.  Owayesaba nguManejala umasipala iPhiksli likaYisaba Sebe eFolsraks eMpumalanga ubephakathi kwabantu abathandathi nenkampeni ababanjelwe urhwaphilizo nobuqhophololo obubalelwe kwizigidi obubalelwe kwizigidi zerandi.  Abarhanelwa bavele kwinkundla kamantyi yaseFolsraks. ULinda Tshabalala natyholwa nabo batyholwa ngokurhwaphiliza umasipala phakathi konyaka u2017 no2021.  Phakanti kwabakhweli eplangeni nobuqhophololo norhwaphilizo ngababesaba kuba ngoomanejala bomasipala.  Wayesaba ngumlawuli umsebenzi kamasipala nonikezela ngeenkonzo kuquka  nelungu lendlu yomthetho yephondo. Phakathi kwamatyala bakwajamelene netyala lokwaphula umthetho wokulawula iimali zikamasipala. Bonke bakhululwe ngebheyile. Ityala labo lirhoxiselwe umhla wesithathu nguJulayi logama kusaphandwa nangakumbi. Usosibajikelele weANC uMnumzana Fikile Mbalula ubungqinile ukunyaniseka kwencwadi ethutyelezisiweyo ebhalwe ngowayesakuba nguThabo Mbeki eyibhalela eliqela. Umnumzana Mbalula uthi kulilishwa ukuba kusekho abantu ngaphakathi embuthweni abasaqhuba nokuthubelelisa amaxwebhu ayindaba yakwamkhozi nangalungelanga uwonkewonke. Ebethetha noonondaba eRhawutini ukulandela intlanganiso yeKomiti iNWC. Intatheli yethu yezopolitiko uAbongile umfo kaDumako ibilapho. Ikomiti yokusebenza kwantsuku zonke yeANC ingqubanise iintloko kuleveki ngelifuna ukuqwalasela imiba echaphazela lomzi kulombutho ulawulayo. INWC ivakalise inkxalabo yayo ngokuthutyeleziswa kumajelo eendaba incwadi ebhalwe ngobesakuba ngumongaleli uThabo Mbeki ijoliswe kubunkokheli beANC. Kulencwadi lokaMbheki ukhwela ezehlela kumalungu epalamente eANC ngokuzalelendle ukuqwalasela ngokuthe khabalala ibholo lasephalaphala elijikeleze umongameli uCyril Ramaphosa. UMbalula uthi uzakufuna ukuqwalasela ngokutsha ngokuthi badibanise iintloko nalo kaMbheki. Kanti ke uMbalula uthi oqhubekileyo phaya kulamasipala oseMangawung eFreystatha uzakufumana amanyathelo athe gabalala kwiANC. Unobhala jikelele weANC okhusele isigqibo seNWC sokuhlaziya iqumrhu elizokulungiselela inkofa yoluntu ezakuchopha ngoJuni ngelithi kukulwa ngaphakathi okufikelele kwesisigqibo. NdinguAbongile Dumako kwiindaba zeSABC eRhawutini.  Kwalapha ezindabeni ukhiqiwe esikhundleni usodolophu womasipala wasekuRuleni uTheyna Campbell weDA isihlandlo sesibini zingaphelanga iinyanga ezintandathu kodwa masithume umntwana evenkileni kuqala. Sinamkele kwakhona kwelijelo , uyakwazi ukubukela kwakhona ezindaba kwijelo leYoutube uthi SABC iindaba zesixhosa. Kwinqaku lokuqala sithe bagqejwe olungophiyo abathengi abaxinwe ngamatyala nanjengoko kuzakufuneka bangene nzulu ezipokothweni ukuze bakwazi ukuhlawula amatyala abo. Oku kuza emveni kokuba ibhanki enguvimba inyuse nge50 basis points iqondo lenzala kwimali mboleko ntoleyo inyuse inzala yokubolekisa kwayo kwiibhanki zorhwebo yayakutsho kwi7.5%. Ngoku masicaphule izimvo zababukeli kwikhasi lethu lawhatsapp ngokonyuka kwakhona kwemali yanzalimboleko . Ngelixesha akukhomntu ungasaziyo isimo uMzantsi Afrika akuso ngenxa yokwenyuka kwezinto kwelilizwe nokunqaba kwemzisebenzi kodwa urhulumente usavumela izinti ezinjalo. Hayi siyagxothwa kwelilizwe. Amaxabiso sevele ephezulu kwangoku, andiyazi ukuba kuzakwenziwa njani kuba neenkampani esiziphangelelayo azifuni kuyinyusela imali. Ukunyuka kwayo akuncedisani kuba akukhomehluko sizawubona , akukho tshintsho sizalubona. Lanto yayisithi makucingelwe abantu abangathathintweni ingathi seyililizwi nje ayisenzeki. Ohluthayo uhluthisa esakhe isisu, oosomashishini abasasicingeli.

Title: Project
Answer.transcript: Speaker 1: His team will not be impacted by the DSTV premiership game before their CAF game with Cotonsport from Cameroon.  We greet all listeners and warmly invite you to listen to our news bulletin at this hour. Consumers who have outstanding credit were shocked and unhappy to learn that their credit repayments will now increase. This comes after the Reserve Bank has increased the repo rate by 50 basis points which has led to the repo rate that they charge commercial banks being 7.75%, this has subsequently led to the interest rate that banks charge rising to 11.25%. The South African Reserve Bank states this is a measure to curb inflation.                                     Speaker 2:  It is going to be difficult for consumers who have credit due to the reserve bank's approach to curb inflation. It has increased the repo rate 9 times from November 2021. The inflation rate is at 6% although they have predicted it now will be at 5.4%. The key factor is the hiking price increase in food, oil and electricity. Loadshedding has had an impact on operating costs of businesses.                        Speaker 3: The honourable must eat too, must spend money on goods and services too. And the problem is inflation is eating their income. And if no one does anything about it eating their income, they are going to be in an even worse position. And that institution in society tasked with protection of those income against the ravages of inflation is the central bank.   Speaker 2: This increase in interest rates puts pressure on consumers.     Speaker 4: In companies this count more, in audit volume they know that consumers are taking strain, the income is being squeezed. Whether it be from the fact that wages haven't fully compensated for last year's price increase or be it from higher interest rates that's when you will start to see more credit than usual.       Speaker 2: After this announcement by the reserve bank the rand has strengthened against the US dollar.             Speaker 5: The rand has strengthened against the US dollar, it has resulted due to the increase in repo rate.                       Speaker 2: At the same time the reserve bank has decreased the economic growth prediction to be 0.2% from 0.3%. It mentions this is as a result of many factors one of them being loadshedding which has the most impact on businesses.       Speaker 1: The department of correctional services has appointed a temporary leader for the Mangaung correctional service centre in Free State after the publication of the news about Thabo Bester's escape from prison who was reported as dead, he is popularly known as the facebook rapist. The department of correctional services was discussing about the mystery of Bester's escape who was believed to be dead.        Speaker 6: The commissioner for correctional services Mr Makgoti Thobakgale states it is clear Bester was assisted in escaping from prison.    Speaker 7: As correctional services we are dealing with a well calculate and organised escape. Hence on an ongoing basis the SAPS continues to investigate the matter.                             Speaker 6: While making a speech at the cabinet this week the minister of the office of presidency Ms Khumbuzo Ntshabeni has said that the cabinet has decided to order the correctional services to be quick in ending agreements with private companies whoch guard two correctional services in this country.               Speaker 8: Cabinet directed the department of correctional services to speedily finalise the process to take over the operations of two private company managed correctional centers. And ensure consequence management for everyone involved.                                 Speaker 6: The police are continuing their investigation on Bester's escape also attempts to interrogate him in cells are continuing.    Speaker 1: Former manager of the Pixley Ka Isaka Seme municipality in Volksrust, Mpumalanga is one of six people arrested for corruption and theft of funds estimated at R24 million. The suspects appeared in the magistrates court of Volksrust. Linda Tshabalala and his co- accused are accused of stealing the municipality funds between years 2017 and 2021.                              Speaker 9: Among those in the dock in a corruption case is a former manager of the municipality, leader, an employee of the municipality who provided services. They face trial of misusing government money in the municipality. All are out on bail.                       Speaker 10: Seven accused appeared before the Volksrust magistrate court today facing the charges of fraud and corruption after they were arrested by the members of the Hawks in the middle of a serious commercial crime investigation. The accused were granted bail according to the status. Five accused was granted R35 000 bail, one was granted bail of R40 000.          Speaker 9: Their case is postponed to 6th of July due to investigations being ongoing.        Speaker 1:  Secretary- general of the ANC Fikile Mbalula agreed with the truthfulness of a publicised letter written by former president Thabo Mbeki writing to the ANC. Mbalula says it is unfortunate that there are still people in the congress who publish private letters which is not supposed to be seen by public.  He was speaking in a press conference in Gauteng. Our political journalist Abongile Dumako was  a part of the press present.  Speaker 11: The committee oof the ANC met this week the NWC expressed their concerns over the publicising of the letter written by Thabo Mbeki speaking to the leadership of the ANC. In the letter Thabo Mbeki accusses the ANC of being incompetent surrounding the Phala Phala saga of President Cyril Ramaphosa.  Mbalula says this issue needs to be looked at again working together with Mbeki.              Speaker 12: The ANC finds it regrettable that the letter from former president Thabo Mbeki directed at national officials landed in the public domain through a letter. The national officials will discuss the letter and seek an audience with former president.    Speaker 11: Mbalula says what occurred in the Mangaung municipality in Free State will be resolved attentively by the ANC.        Speaker 12 (Mbalula): People of Mangaung have voted for the ANC throughout and we cannot allow courtery of few individuals to undermine that confidence.    Speaker 11: Chairperson of the ANC has supported the decision of the NWC of appointing a group that will prepare for youth conference of this party in June. Signing out, i am Abongile Dumako from SABC news in Gauteng.         Speaker 1: On this news mayor of Ekurhuleni Tamia Campbell has been fired from her position from the DA without completing even six months of her full term. It is time to hear the views of the viewers about the increase in interest rate.    Viewer 1: No one isn't aware of the current state in SA due to the increase in prices/ inflation and unemployment. The government is still allowing things like the interest rates increase, we are being kicked out of this country.       Viewer 2: While a person is already struggling this means it's going to get way worse.     Viewer 3: Prices are already up I have no idea how we are going to survive because the companies we also work for do not want to increase our wages.    Viewer 4: The common ideal that poor peoiple must be taken into account is not longer happening, the rich get rich for themselves, business people do not think about us anymore.    Viewer 5: The banks are increasing credit repayments, food prices are also going up.

Title: Project
Answer.transcript: Viewer 1: It seems like us who live beyond the means we will suffer greatly Viewer 2: Everything is going up, electricity, food but salary is not. viewer 3: Now someone must be stingy. Viewer 4: Reporter people are in debt, many debts they should try to get themselves out of debt nobody will do that for them.  Viewer 5:Everything is going up, food, petrol but we have hope that will survive regardless.  Speaker 1 (News reader): Mayor of the Ekurhuleni Municipality has been fired not more than six months in office for the second term. 126 counsellors voted for her resignation while 91 voted for her to keep her position. Campbell was kicked out like this in October last year and came back. The ANC in Gauteng accepts her termination stating it will support a runner up to fill the position. Before opposing parties EFF and others managed to take the position of speaker and mayor from the DA. The decision to fire Campbell was based off that she failed to provide essential services to the communities including not picking up rubbish bins and finance related matters. The DA has said this decision is similar to the one ANC proposed October last year.  President Cyril Ramaphosa is adamant that he did not break any laws regarding the theft of money in US dollars from his farm in Phala Phal. He is still facing pressure regarding the theft of the money from his farm in 2020. The president answered questions in the provincial cabinets.  Speaker 2: Ramaphosa's leadership is impacted by the saga of money being stolen from his farm in 2020. But he stands by his word that the money came from sales , it is not fraudulent. However, opposing parties states he is lying he can never say the accusations are true, that it is money laundering.    Speaker 3: Mr president you are part of the problem because you accepted dirty dollars in this country that entered illegally.   Speaker 2: President Ramaphosa has urged members of parliament to await decisions or results of the investigation by various institutions.  President Ramaphosa: I have publicly said I am willing, prepared to cooperate and have done so and some of these institutions have said so, let us wait for the whole process.  Speaker 2: The president was also questioned on loadshedding, asking why the gvernment has spent millions of rands installing generators in minister's houses although government institutions like hospitals are riddled with issues of loadshedding.  President ramaphosa: And I would not characterise that as giving more priority to those other residencies, places you are referring. Our hospitals and various other entities.... Speaker 1: The Eastern Cape province has seen a decrease in unemployment for the past two years. this province is committed to creating work opportunities.   Speaker 4: Between the years 2020 and 2022 about 20 thousand people got employed in the province. Reports showed that industries such as transport and business have shown the most growth in employment, even thouugh youth unemployment is still high.  Speaker 5: When you are not employed you must go out there and seek opportunities, do not just sit down.   Speaker 6: We are at home with our degrees and we cannot get employment.   Speaker 4: Economy experts state that economy has shown growth in the province.  Speaker 7: first importantly we have made sure we produce the skills that are needed here in easstern cape and try by all means to improve the tourism industry.   Speaker 2: The provincial government has welcomed the new propositiojs.  Speaker 8: So we work commited to improve eastern Cape and the people of Eastern Cape by creating jobs.   Speaker 4: In 2022 inventors have pledged to invest amounts estimated at R332 billion.  From SABC news I am Lwando Nomoyi, in Gqeberha.  Speaker 1: Tomorrow COSATU will hold a 50- year remembrance of the worker's protest held in Thekwini where black workers protested against earning little and poor living conditions. The protest in 1973 lasted three months and negatively afFected businesses. They at the time of apartheid were not allowed to have protests. Speaker 8: Naidoo who was the first chairperson of Cosatu says there are many economic related issues that affect this country and there is need for unions to work collectively. Naidoo: in this period o transition we need to be completely united. Unlikely the union in South Arica has become more fragmented than it was in my time. I think absolute priority of trade unions today is unity between the different federations.   Speaker 8: COSATU leadership says sometimes leaders f the unions need to be ashamed of the way they conduct themselves.  Speaker 9: We see divisions in unions which at times may result to other workers when they see theatrics by leaders and seeing a union running bankrupt whn you have got a case. Where is our affiliation fees that we pay to the union? Why can the unions not represent us? Because we have leaders at times that use trade unions as a milking cow. Speaker 8: Competition between unions also has the impact on their efficiency, workers about 70 thousand are not under any an unions in SA. Members of COSATU will commemorate this day of protests of 1973 at Karrisfontein sportsgrounds, Durban. I am Siphiwe Makhanya from SABC news in Durban.  Speaker 1: Into sports, Mamelodi Sundowns coach Rulani Mokoena is confident that his team will not be interrupted  in winning a DSTV premiership game ahead of its CAF league game against Cotonsport from Cameroon. Speaker 9: they will be striving for a win on Saturday. Sundowns could win the league without playing a game if Supersport loses a point.  Speaker 10: We still have games to play and we need to play with best intensity, best concentration  and same desire but if it happens it happens. But I do not doubt my team as they have never given me a reason to doubt them.  Speaker 9:While the Sundowns is confident about the quarter finals of the champions league, fans are eyeing a second star on the team jersey.   Speaker 11: Mamelodi Sundowns we will win the champions eague for sure.  Speaker 9: Sundowns game against Cotonsport will be played at Loftus Versfeld on Saturday evening. ans wearing yellow sundowns jersey entrance will be free. Everyone is looking forward to see what will be the results.    Speaker 1: If we did not look at the time we would do this all day. The time has ended, Mamfene is waiting to give you the weather. Mageba will bring the news tomorrow, i am signing out.   Weather forecaster: Warm greetings, today's prediction of the weather , the western cape is cloudy no signs of rain. In the upper areas rain is expected, in Gauteng. KZN and Mpumalanga it is 60% chance of rain, while it is 30% chance in North West. Limpopo has high cahnce of rain. In Eastern Cape, drive carefully there is signs of mist. In Mpumalanga and Gauteng thunderstorms are expected, temperatures are warm , being 20 degrees celsius in Gqeberha, 14 degrees in east London, 10 in Mthatha. Pretoria is expected 14 degrees celsius. in Cape Town it is warm as it is 12 degrees, in Sutherlands, 3 degrees less. Upington is 15 degrees. Tomorrow's prediction in belville it is cool, Kuilsriver  in Cape Town by 24, 28 degrees in Worcester. It will be hot at 34 in Vredendal, 31 degrees in Upington, 29 in Vryburg. Graaf Reinet is expected 24 degrees, it will be cool in East London and Gqeberha by 23, Makhanda is 23. In Gauteng expect 21 and expect 31 degrees in Lephalale.  Signing out.

Title: Project
Answer.transcript: Kunjalo, engathi thina singathathintweni sizo thwala kanzima. tindza litye msakazi impilo yase South Africa uma sekwendzeka kanje kunyuka tonke into nemali mboleko yasemabhenki iyenyuka , oogesi banyukile, ukudla kuyanyuka estolo,imisebenti ayikho, into eseyifuneka ngoku kukonga umntu agcise, ade anqandwe ngabantu ngokukugcisa. Abantu msasazi bazifake ematyaleni kakhulu ingase bazikhuphe ngokwabo kuba akekho umntu oyobakhupha ematyaleni. Akukhonto inganyukiyo  sesaqhela ukutya kuyenyuka , ipetroli ziyenyuka but ke sinethemba sizakuphumela nakule. Ukhiqiwe esikhundleni usodolophu wamasipala waseBhrululeni  Ukenya kambrielweDA isihlandlo sesibini singaphelanga inyanga ezintandathu, ngoceba baya126 abavotele ukukhiqwa kwakhe baze abayi91 bavotela ukuba asigcine isikhundla uKhembell wayekhiqwe ngoluhlobo ngo Octorber waze waphinda wanyulwa kungekudalanga. iAnc eGauteng ilamkele inyathelo lokukhiphwa kuka Khambell yatsho  isithi iza kuxhasa umgqatso ophuma kwiqela elincinane ukuba angene ezihlangwini zakhe .Ngaphambiili amaqhela aphikisayo kwelibhunga naquka iANC , iEFF namanye akwazi ukuthatha izikhundla esika somlomonombhexeshi webhunga kwiDA .Isindululo sokukhiqwa kuka Khumbell siphakanyiswe ngilithi  usilele ekuhambiseni inkonzo ebantwini kuquka ukungathuthwa kwenkunkuma nemeko yezimali kamasipala esegedukeni. IDA ithe  esisindululo siyafana nesasiphakanyiswe yi ANC  kuOKthibha wonyaka ophelileyo. Umongameli Cyrial Ramaphosa umile kwelokuba akenzanga lwaphulo mthetho kwibhoolo lokwabiwa kwemali ezidola zase Melika kwifama yakhe iphalaphala.Umongameli Ramaphosa usajongene noxinizelelo malunga nokubiwa kwemali ezidolazi zaseMelika kwifama yakhe ngo 2020. Umongameli ebephendula imibuzo kwibhunga likazwelonke lesizwe lamaphondo. uLawulo luka Mongameli Ramaphosa luyaqhubeka  luphazanyiswa sisehlo sokubiwa kwemali yaphesheya kwifama yakhe ngo 2020, kodwa uthi le mali isuka kwintengiso yesizilwanyana kwaye ayikho mdaka kodwa nozxa kunjalo amaqela aphikisayo athi uRamaphosa akanokuma phambi kwalendlu yowiso mthetho. Athi eli  liyalwisana nokulukunyeziswa kwemali ngondlela mnyama.Ngexesha eJongene nezozithyolo. MR President you are part of the problem cause you accepted dirty dollars that came into this country illegally. URamaphosa uhlabe ukhwelo kumalungu asepalamente ukuba alinde iziphumo zophando zamaziko aliqela ."I have publicly said I'm willing to and prepared to cooperate and i have done so , and some of those institutions have even said so. So let us wait for the whole process .Umongameli uphinde kwakhona waxinwa ngemibuzo  yenxaki yoncimi ncimi yombane.  Ebuzwa ukuba kutheni uRhulumente echithe into ephantse  ukufikelela kwisigidi seRandi efakela ijaneratha kwizindlu zabaphathiswa kodwa amaziko karhulumente afana nezibhedlele ambhethwe zingxaki zokuchatshazelwa  kokungabikho kombane . I  would not catargorise that as giviing more priority to those other residences or other places that you are refrerring to. Our hospitals as I was saying and our various other entities. Iphondo lase mpumakoloni libonwe lisithi malehle izinga lentswela ngqesho kuleminyaka idlulileyo. Eli phondlo lizimisele ukuqhuba  nokukhulisa amathuba engqesho. Phakathi konyaka ka2020 no2022 ngabantu abathe rhatya kumawaka angamashumi abathe bafumana ingqesho ephondweni. Le ngxelo ithe  yabonakalisa ukuba amacandelo afanan nezezimali , ezothuytho kwaye  nelorhwebo ngawona abonakalise impucuko kwingqesho. Ukanti ingqesho kulutsha isasilela. Ewe ungasebenzi xa uhleli phantsi ubanesikadi ebantwinI. Sihleli neDiploma zethu ngoku asikwazi kufumana imisebenzi . IIngcali kwezoqoqoqsho  zithi imeko yezoqoqoqsho ephondweni  ibonakalise uhlumo . to mak sure into yokubana into yokuqala  siproducer iziskills ezifunekayo apha e Eastern Cape  okwesibini sizame ukukomeleza isector ye tourism .Urhulumente wephondo ulwamkele elinyathele. kwinkomfa yotyalo mali kunyaka ka2022 abatyali zimali bazibophelele ekutyaleni ebalelwa kwi333billlion rand . Ngomso i cosatu izakubamba isikhumbuzo seminyaka engama 25 soqhanqalazo yabasebenzi esasibanjelwe ethekwini apho amawaka abasebenzi babantu abamnyama babebambe khona uqhanqhalazo lwemirhoolo emincinci ngo 1973 elaqhuba inyanga ezintathu laze lachana amashishini.

Title: Project
Answer.transcript: Kubulawe omnye umfundi kwisiganeko esoyamiswa nezixholoxholo  ngokwesini kwiuniversity fort hare eDikeni. Adibene nomangemeli weANC amahlakane onxantathu kuboniswana ngeenguqu ezithukuzayo kwikhabhinethi. Molweni emakhaya nakubabukeli kwijelo Idtt nanku uvimba esinilungiselele wona kuhlwanje . IUniversity yaseFort Hare kwiphondo laseMpuma Koloni kwakhona iphinde yathwaxwa sesinye isiganeko sodushe ngokwesini. Umfundi owenza unyaka wesithathu kwizifundo zesocial science uhlaselwe wahlatywa wasweleka kwikhempasi yaseDikeni yayizolo. Lomfundi ebehamba nabanye abafundi ababini. Omnye wabafundi ukwazile ukuqhwesha ngelixa ababini bephangwa. Umfundi osindileyo kwesisibini kutyholwa ngokuba udwengulwe ukanti ngoku sekhutshiwe esibhedlela. Iuniversity yaseFort Hare izilile. Umfundi owenza unyaka wesithathu kwisocial science ufanyanwe enamanxeba kufuphi naleblorho. Abaphathi kwelizikomfundo basothukile. Abafundi bathi baziva bengakhuselekanga bamemelela ukuba amapolisa abonakale kufuphi nelizikomfundo . Kudala sitheta nabo ukuba benzesho ukuba sikhuselekile basebenzisane neUniversity benzesho ukuba abafundi bakaNokholeji bakhuselekile kodwa until ngoku akukabikhonto. Mna ndicinga into yokuba bekusuppose iiveni zamapolisa azinqabanga kulendawo kuba yindawo ehamba abafundi kodwa ayenzeki lonto. Amapolisa avule amatyala aquka elokubulala, elokuzama ukubulala kwanokudlwengula. Akukabikhomntu ubanjiweyo malunga nesisehlo. NdinguLubabalo Dada kwiindaba zeSABC eDikeni.  Amahlakane kanxantathu iCOSATU neSAPS adibene nomongameli uCyril Ramaphosa ngokunxulumene nohlengahlengiso lwakhe oluthethekayo lwekhabhinethi. Umongameli uthethathethana nentlaninge yababandakayo ngokuba ngubani anokumolatha kwesiphi isikhundla kwikhabhinethi yakhe okanye amkhiqe. UMnumzana Paul Mashatile kulindeleke achongwe njengesekela likamongameli ukulandela ukwehla kukaDavid Mabuza. Bekusisithethe ukuba umongameli weANC okwangumongameli welizwe adibanise iintloko kuqala namahlakani eqela lakhe phambi kokuba enze naluphi na utshintsho kwikhabhinethi yakhe kodwa ke ilele kwakuye ukuba athathe isigqibo ngokuchonga abaphathiswa . Nanjengoko umongameli esadla amathambo engqondo ngohlengahlengisho, umdla ongaphaya kokuqonda kubemi beli abathwaxwa ziimeko zoqoqosho nezinye zokuhlala. Enye ingxubakaxaka ngulodanya cimi walomnbane oswantsulisa kanobomi kuqoqosho. Kwintetho yakhe yobume besizwe uRamaphosa ubhengeze ukusekwa kwesebe elizakujongana ncakasana nombane kwilinge lokukhawulela lentsindabadala yocimicimi yombane. Nakubeni kunjalo amahlakane akukhabe ngawo amone ukusekwa kwalombane ngelithi akuyomfuneko. Uthekelelo luthakacha ekubeni umongameli uRamaphosa asenze phambi kokuba iphele le iveki izayo.  Inkulu yamaphathiswa isanda ukonyulwa phaya eFreystatha uMnumzana Mxolisi Dukwana ithi uluntu loluphondo luzakuba yinxalenye yokuphembelela ulawulo urhulumente azakuyithatha. Umnumzana Dukwana wonyulwe emva kokulahlwa esikhundleni kukankosikazi Sisi Ntombela ukulandela ukugxothwa kwakhe yikomiti yesigqeba sephondo .  Uzibekele umnqantsa ngethuba egxeka kabukhali ubuqhophololo kwikomishoni yophando lokubanjwa ngobhongwana kwarhulumente weli. Ngonyaka ka2019 uDukwana waxelela lekomishoni ukuba inkqubo yolawulo idale isimbo soloyiko eFreystatha. Ukwagxeke lowo obesakulala ngangubo enye naye uAce Marhashule wathi wafumisa iimpokotho zakhe ngezigidi zerandi njengamaqithiqithi okunceda kwinkqubo ye255 million yerandi nethwe mbende ziingxaki zophicotho. Uthi eliphondo lidinga ngokumandla ulawulo olusisikhokhelo.  UDukwana ungena ezihlangwini zolawulo oluhexayo nalapho ukuziswa kweenkonzo kudodobala. Icandelo lezolimo lelilenyi lalawo anegalelo eliphambili kuqoqosho lwelaphondo liphakathi kwalawo adinga uncedo kamsinya . Ngoku amehlo athe ntsho kuwiso lwakhe lobume bephondo azakulenza ngolwesibini . Amawakawaka abahlali baseNigeria bathutheleke kwizikhululo zonyulo namhlanje kunyulo lomongameli ozongena ezihlangwini zika Mohamed Buhari. IInkokheli ezikhuphisanayo zivotele kwiingingqi zakho. Unyulo lomongameli waseNigeria luqale ngonyawo lonwabu kwamanye amaziko okuvota. Kodwa oko akubathezanga mandla abahlali abanxanelwe inguqu kubutyobo bolawulo, ubundlobongela, nobunzima ngaphantsi komongameli osishiyayo uMohamed Buhari. Umgqatswa onxanelwe ukungena ezihlangwini zikaBuhari okwayesakuba ikulumeni yaseLagosi uBhola Tinubhu onamashumi asixhenxe ubudala weqela elilawulayo iAll Progressive Congress nowayesakuba ngusekelamongameli uAthikhu Abhubhakha ona76 iminyaka ubudala weqela eliphikisayo iPeople’s Democratic Party kunye nowayesakuba yikulumeni yaseAnambra uPeter Ombri ona61 weqela elincinane ilabour party.  Bobathathu ababagqatswa bavotele kwiingingqi zabo bexhakwe yinginginya yabaxhasi nabalandeli babo. Ubalo kwizixeko ezingamashumi amathathu anesithandathu kuquka nesixeko iAbhuda kulindeleke ukuba luqukunjelwe kwisithuba seentsuku ezintlanu emva konyulo. Akungomntu yinyambalala eNigeria. Inkokheli yeEFF uMnumzana Julius Malema ithi ukuhanjiswa kweenkonzo emntlantshona akuhoywanga ngumasipala kunye nabaseburhulumenteni. Ugxeke kabukhali inkulu baphathiswa yasemntla ntshona uMnumzana Bhushi Mape amtyhole ngokulahlekisa ipalamente ngokufihla imingena ngokunikezelwa kweenkozo emntla ntshona.  Bafinyeze imikhono njengoko iphulo lokucoca liqhuba ngaphandle kwamagingxigingxi. UMalema uthi ukungabikho sezintanjeni zolawulo akumelanga ibesisizathu zokungenzi kakuhle eluntwini. UMalema uthi inkulu yamaphathiswa yasemntla ntshona uBhushi Mape uyasilela ukuvuma imiceli mngeni yokuhanjiswa kweenkonzo kweliphondo.

Title: Project
Answer.transcript: Speaker 1: The national scourge of gender-based violence and femicide seems to be affecting our institution.   Newsreader (speaker 2): Another student was murdered in a gender- based violence at the University of Fort Hare in Alice.  Speaker 3: We can confirm that we received an invitation from the president to consult with us on a possible cabinet reshuffle.    Speaker 2: ANC officials met to negotiate possible cabinet reshuffles.  I greet all viewers at home, this is our news bulletin this evening.  The University of Fort Hare in Eastern Cape another female student was murdered. She was doing third year in social science studies, she was attacked in the early hours of yesterday's morning. She was with other two students, one managed to escape from the robber, the other surviving student it is believed she was raped she has now been discharged from hospital.   Speaker 4: The University of Fort Hare is mourning, a third year student in social science studies was found with stab wounds next to this bridge. Officials in this institution are shocked.   Speaker 5:  The national scourge of gender-based violence and femicide seems to be affecting our institution more so than any other institution. We appeal to the national government to prioritise the fight against gender based violence and femicide.    Speaker 4: Students are saying they feel unsafe, they are calling for the police be swift in response and protect the students.   Speaker 6: Even if I am going to town to do grocery we do not feel safe because there is a forest.  Speaker 7: It has been long we have been negotiating with them, the univerity to ensure this place is safe for students. Police vans should not be scarce in this area and patrol because this is where criminals commit crimes.   Speaker 4: Police have opened a case of murder, attempted murder and rape, no one has been arrested yet. i am Lubabalo Dada from SABC news in Alice.    Speaker 2: COSATU officials and SACP met with President Cyril Ramaphosa with regards to the news of a possible cabinet reshuffle. President is discussing with those involved about who he can appoint and who to fire, Paul Mashatile is expected to be appointed as the deputy president following the resignation of David Mabuza.   Speaker 8: President of the ANC and country is supposed to meet with his advisors about who to appoint to the cabinet and who to fire. The President is still in discussions, members of the community who are faced with economic issues and societal issues, main being loadshedding which has a negative impact on businesses. The president has announced a panel that will be focused on electricity in an attempt to put an end to loadshedding. Even so, the officials have disagreed with the proposition to appoint this panel saying there is no need.   Speaker 3: We have received an invitation from the president to consult with us on a possible cabinet reshuffle, we discussed the principles, there are ongoing discussions within the alliance. We are focusing on the principles and the performance of the government, later on the president may take in consideration our ideas.  Speaker 8: It is predicted that the president will make a decision before the end of next week.     Speaker 2: Minister who have recently been appointed in Free State Mxolisi Dukwana says the community will be a part of the leadership, Mxolisi has been appointed after the firing of Sisi Ntombela by the province.     Speaker 9: As business we welcome you we say engage with us so you can hear our views. We believe ANC is ANC but if you come with a different mindset than we know ANC to be there will be a huge difference.   We are hoping for change, hoping that promises will be kept and services will be delivered.   Speaker 2: Dukwana has criticised the commission of inquiry into state capture saying there is corruption within, in 2019 Dukwana told the commission threats  have caused fear in Free State. He also criticised who was a former ally Ace Magashule saying he got himself rich by using millions of rands which investigations on are still ongoing. He says the province needs good leadership.  Speaker 10: I believe in the participation of people, whether it be business, comunities in solving their problems. We must create a situation where people are able to actively participate in dealing with challenges they are facing.   Speaker 2: Dukwana is filling the shoes of bad leadership in which service delivery is lacking. Agriculture industry is one in which improves the economy in that province and needs urgent assistance. Everyone is looking towards a speech he will make on Tuesday.  Speaker 2: Thousands and thousands of citizens in Nigeria have appeared in voting stations for the election of president who will be the successor to president Mohammed Mohare. Opposing parties voted in their communities. Speaker 10: The election for president in Nigeria has started in Nigeria.  Speaker 11: I am here to cast my vote, vote and exercise my constitutional right.  Officials are yet to arrive i this institution we are still waiting for them      Speaker 10: This has not discouraged citizens who want to see change, an end to crime and difficulties under the previous president. Eager to fill the shoes is contestant who was a governor in Lagos Bola Tinubu who is 70 years old from the leading party All Progressive Congress, and former deputy president Atiku Abbubaker who is 76 years old from the opposing party People's Democratic Party , and also former governor of Anambra Peter Obi who is 61 years old from a small party the Labour Party. These three contestants voted in their areas meeting crowds of supporters. Count of votes in 36 states including Abuja is expected to concluded in five days time after the election.     Speaker 2: EFF leader Julius malema says service delivery in North West is not performed by municipalities and goverment, criticising the minister of North West Pule Mabe who he accussed of lying to the parliament by being untruthful about lack of service delivery in North West.   Speaker 12: The cleaning operation is operating without difficulties, Malema says just because you are not a leading party does not mean you must not make a change in society.   Malema: Distokgo municipality has been a big disaster, even this big run of elections has not benefited our people. So we do not have to wait to be government to show love to our people, that's why we campaign. Service delivery has collapsed in North Wesr and our people must come to appreciate that the ANC will not take them out of this mess, you cannot have a premier who is in denial

Title: Project
Answer.transcript: Kukhunjulwa ubomi negalelo legqala kwezoqhagamshelwano ongasekhoyo uRoni Mamuyebha nowayetshotsha entla kumzabalazo wokutshintsha ubomi babantu. (The Roni that we knew would be concerned about the pliant of the people, he would be advocating for unity and accountability. He would be asking questions about how far we are in dealing with the triple challenges of poverty, unemployment and inequality). Kuphehlelelwe umbutho ongenzi nzuzo kuhlonitshwa le ndedeba neyayikhe yathothoza eRobben Island, wayekhe walilungu lendlu yoqingqo mithetho eGauteng. Wayehlonitshwa kakhulu uMamuyebha engumsebenzi karhulumente ophume izandla. Wayekhe wasebenza njenge gosa lezoqhagamshelwano le-ANC nakumasebe aliqela karhulumente. Intombi yakhe ithi lombutho wesisa ifoundation ngokwelamarhanuka, uzawugxila ngamandla kwezemfundo. (The main focus will be on education, it will be on communication and learning on our kids of today and clear that forward, and then what have definitely moved into other things as we go along). Intetho kamn

Title: Project
Answer.transcript: Icandelo lezothutho limemelela ukhuseleko ukulandela ukutshiswa kwesigadla okuthe gqolo kweli. Ucaster Semenya uphumelele idyala elibalulekileyo lenkundla kwinkonzo yakhe yokuthabatha inxaxheba kwezeembaleki ngaphandle okuthabatha amachiza okwehlisa izinga letestesterone emzimbeni wakhe. Kwezemidlalo ispringbok izakubopha oompondo zihlanjiwe kwabadlali xazidlala neeall blacks kungquzulwano lwabo lwesibini lwetumente irainbow championship eAuckland. Uxabise ixesha ukuze nalo likuxabise. Njengesiqhelo ngelixesha kulamajelo eSABC 1 neDTT ziindaba. Uxolo malubenani. Icandelo lezothutho limemelela ukhuseleko lwezigadla ukulandela ukutshiswa kwezigadla okuthe gqolo kweli. Okukuthethwe njengoko kusuku lwesibini lwenkofa olujongene nokukhulisa icandelo lezothutho kuMazantsi eAfrika nelibanjelwe epitoli. Okukulandela iziganeko zokutshiswa kwezinye zezigadla ezimbini eMpangeni KwaZuluNatal. Phambi koku kutshiswe izigadla ezilishumi lesihlanu kwiziganeko ezohlukeneyo KwaZuluNatal, eMpumalanga naseLimpopo ukuqala kubusuku bangecawa. Lusuku lwesibini lwenkomfa lokushukuxa imiba ejongene necandelo lezothutho nokukhulisa elicandelo. Umlawuli wenkampani yezigadla ugxeke kabukhali ukutshiswa kwezigadla okuthe gqolo kweli. Watsho esithi iziganeko ezibumila bunje azichaphazeli kuphela icandelo lozothutha kodwa noqoqosho lwelilizwe. Uthi lomkhwa wokutshiswa kwezigadla udala ulibaziseko nakwinkqubo yokuhanjiswa kwempahla yabathengi. Kubongozwa amapolisa ukuba asebenze ngokukhawuleza ukusombulula lengxaki ukuze nabatyali mali babenomdla wokutyala kwelicandelo lwezothutho.  Ukhulume ngebheyli yamawaka eshumi erandi uJoel Michael ongomnye wabarhanelwa kwinkumbula yabarhanelwa abatyholwa ngokuncedisa ibanjwa uThabo Bester lincedisa ukuqhawula entolongweni. Isicelo sebheyle besiphulaphulwe kwinkundla yamantyi eseBloemfontein eFreystatha ngalentsasa.  Phakathi kwemiqathango yebheyile yakhe kukuba avele kanye ngeveki kwisikhululo samapolisa iBloemfontein angemki kwisithili saseMangaung. Akuvumelekanga aqhakamshelane ngqo okanye abebuqhakamshelana namangqina enkundla. Amagqwetha akhe anikwe uluhlu lwamashumi anesibhozo wokuba angaqhagamshelani nawo nangawuphi na umhlobo. Kusenjalo uMoeketsi Ramulula omnye umrhanelwa kwelityala lokuncedisa uBester aqhawule entolongweni. Usilaxazile isicelo sakhe sebheyile. Sebelishumi elinambini abarhanelwa abamhokamhokana nelityala lokuqhwesha kukaBester entolongweni. Ukanti uThabang Miyer omgomnye umrhanelwa obanjwe nabababini kwiveki ephelileyo wakhululwa ngebheyile yamawaka alishumi erandi kwiveki ephelileyo. Abahlali baseMatatiel eMpuma Koloni abalindele ukwakhelwa izindlu ezizokwakhiwa ngurhulumente bachulumancile liphulo elicetyawo lokwakhiwa kwezindlu zexabiso eliphantsi ezingamakhulu alithoba namashumi amathathu. Isebe lezokuhlaliswa koluntu libekele bucala imali engaphaya kwekhulu elinamashumi amathandathu anesixhenxe sesigidi serandi ukulungiselela eliphulo.  Iilali ezinintsi ngaphantsi kommandla waseMatatiela ziphila ngaphantsi kwebomvu indlala , ukutya kunqongophele, iindawo zokuhlala nazo azikho semgangathweni. Kulendawo yaseTsitsong abantu bahlaselwa yinkanyamba ngoku ku nje banethemba lokuba ulwakhiwo lwezindlu luzakuqala ngakubo khona ukuze kuguquke imeko yokuphila phakathi kwabo. Kungoku nje bahlala kwizindlu eziwuhlukayo ebabezinikwe okwethutyanango2012.  Ngoku imeko iya ibamaxongo. Oko sanethwayo ziimvula silala nabantwana ekuhlupekeni. Asinandawo zokulala, asikwazi nokuthini, sihluphekile kulendawo sikuyo. Umntu obeyidinga kakhulu lendlu uyewasweleka. Kwakubuhlungu kakhulu usweleke esithi mntanam ezizindlu zizawufika noba zifike umntu engasekho kodwa ndiyavuya ngoba sizakuyifumana thina.  Linkqubo yokwakhiwa kwezindlu izakwenziwa kwiilali ezininzi kulommandla waseMatatiela. Abantu benzelwe iitemporary structures kodwa sivuyiswa kukuba namhlanje besizisa izindlu eziyi200 ezinothi zakhiwe and kwiveki ephelileyo besizisa ezaseMhlonyaneni eziyi491, ezasePotse and alsonaseMarikeng yi1500 ezisakhiwa kezona ngurhulumente wephondo. So sithi ke sifuna ukuvuyisana nabantu baseMatatiela ngokuthi si appointwe sibezi implementing agents as uMatatiela local Municipality so soqhuba ke njengoba neenkampani sele ziappointiwe. Lowasethyini oselula uphila ngokukhubazeka. Unabantwana abaselula abane, bonke abanazo izazisi. Andinathemba tata nokuba ndizakuyifumana kodwa besendithe mandihlale kanje ndiloko ndizihluphekela kanje nalamantshontsho am akusenandaba. Umasipala waseMatatiela uthi ufuna ukuphuhlisa zonke iilali khona ukuze zikwazi ukusebenzisa ezolimo nokhenketho ukulwisana nendlala nentswelongqesho. In Matatitiel nature and tourism are our investment of choice. Sithi ke zonke iiwards makubekho ibusiness plan so that kubekhona icommunical development. Siyayitshintsha ke ishape yaseMatatiela khona ukuze bafumane impilo ebhetele. Sihamba ke kwiiwards zonke siinvita amakhosi khona ukuze sikwazi ukuwalimela. Ukwakhiwa kwezindlu kuyaqhubeka nanjengoko unokhontrakha sele echongiwe ukuba aqalise umsebenzi. NdinguNkululeko Nyembezi weeNdaba zeSABC eMatatiela.  Kulindeleke ukuba iwise isigwebo inkundla kamantyi yaseNew Brighten naseGqeberha kwisicelo sebheyile sikaNothukelo Noqekwa namhlanje . Uthyolwa ngokupheka iyelenqe lokupheka ukubulawa kosakuba ngumyeni wakhe ugqirha Bantu Noqekwa. Wadutyulwa lahlanjiselwa izwide ngoMay. Isibini samadoda uAndile Jongi noSiyabulela Gcayiya bagcinwe eluvalelweni, basikhalele isikhalo sabo sebheyile. Olugebengo ludale isantyu kwicala lezonyango iGqeberha. Lwalapha ezindabeni luyavakala ulwamvila koqoqosho oluhexayo kwabo abangathathi ntweni. Kodwa masithume umntwana evenkileni kuqala.  Sinamkele kwakhona kwiindaba zelijelo. Uyakwazi ukubukela kwakhona ezindaba kwijelo leyouthube uthi SABC iindaba zesixhosa. Kwinqaku lokuqala sithe icandelo lezothutho limemelela ukhuseleko ukulandela ukutshiswa kwesigadla okuthe gqolo kweli. Oku kuthethwe kusuku lwesibini lwenkofa ejongene nokukhulisa icandelo lezothutho nguMazantsi eAfrika nebanjelwe ePitoli. Kuphinwe kwatshiswa ezinye izigadla ezimbini eMpangeni KwaZuluNatal. Phambi koku kutshiswe izigadla ezilishumi lesihlanu kwiziganeko ezohlukeneyo KwaZuluNatal, eMpumalanga naseLimpopo ukuqala kubusuku bangecawa. Imbaleki enembasa zegolide kumgama we800meters kwiiOlympics uCaster Semenya iliphumelele idabi layo lokuthatha inxaxhebo kugqatso lwembaleki lwamanina ngaphandle engathathanga machiza okwehlisa izinga letestesterone emzimbeni wakhe.  Inkundla yamalungelo oluntu yaseEurope iCTHR igwebe ukuba iinkundla zaseSwitzerland zimnike uthuba lokulwa idabi nemiqathanga uCaster Semenya. USemenya noneminyaka engamashumi amathathu anesibini ubhenele kwinkundla yeECHR ngoFebuary ka2021 emva kokuchithwa kwetyala kwinkundla yamatyala ezemidlalo kwidabi elithathe iminyaka. IECHR igwebe ngelithi zangesimamelisiswe isibhengeno sikaSemenya. Ixhobe ngelithi zange anikwe migaqo neziseko ezaneleyo eSwitzerland. Nezozakumnika umhlaba wokuba azise izikhalazo zakhe ngaphambili ezizizo. IASP neDA ixheletshe ukuguzula iANC elawulweni lwaKwaZuluNatal.

Title: Project
Answer.transcript: Kwiindaba zethu emini nje ugqejwe olunye uduma kwezomthetho umkhuseli woluntu onqunyanyanyisiweyo u-advocate Busisiwe Mkhwebana emva kokuba inkundla yomgaqo siseko igqibe kwelokuba sesikhona isizathu esinesihlahla sokuba umongameli uCyril Ramaphosa amnqumamise esikhundleni.  Intsa eGauteng yenze isindululo sokumisela isikhundla sikasela sodolophu koomasipala exhuzula imikhala kubo. Egameni lonondaba beli jelo ndiyanibhotisa mawethu sisamkela nani babukeli kwijelo ivilithi singalibalibazisanga masilibethe liphale. Kugqejwe olunye uduma olungophiyo kwezomthetho  umkhuseli woluntu  onqunyanyisiweyo u-advocate Busisiwe Mkhwebane emva kokuba inkundla yomgaqo siseko igqibe kwelokuba  sesikhona isizathu esinesihlahla sokuba umongameli uCyril Ramaphosa amnqumamise esikhundleni. U-advocate Mkhwebane wanqunyanyiswa esikhundleni ngoJuni wonyaka ophelileyo. Isekela jaji eyintloko ujaji Samaya ebuyisa isigwebo somgaqo siseko ngale ntsasa uthe le nkundla yona iphezulu kweli ayibufumani bokuba umongameli wathabatha amanyathelo ayenoba nomngcipheko wokungqubana kwefuthe lakhe kukho umsebenzi wakhe  waseburhulumenteni kunye nezakhe zabucala kwaye akukho nto umongameli wayenokuyizuza ngokumnqumamisa umkhuseli woluntu kuba usekela mkhuseli woluntu uqhubile nophando ngephalaphala. Umongameli akamnqumamisanga umkhuseli woluntu emdlela indlala, itsho inkundla yomgaqo siseko. Ithe ukunqunyanyiswa kwakhe akumdlelanga ndlala nangaluphi na uhlobo kuba uyaqhuba efumana wonke umvuzo wakhe kwaye unethuba ela neleyo lokulungiselela ukuzithethelela kwakhe kuphando lwesection 194 oluphanda ukulungela kwakhe ukubasesikhundleni. Umphathiswa wezezimali umnumzana Jacob Mamabolo ubambe inkomfa nonondaba ngale ntlazana malunga namalungiselelo okusekwa kwebhanki karhulumente kwanenkampani karhulumente yamachiza. Umnumzana Mamabolo uthi kuluvuyo ukuba  ingxelo ibiqwalasela imiba yezomthetho kwaneengxaki ezingako xakusekwa le bhanki nale nkampani ibanike umkhomba ndlela. (Today ladies and gentlemen I am deeply honored and I must say i am very delighted to say the report on both the pharmaceutical company and the bank has actually cleared the way for us to proceed, in other words there is nothing in law that prohibits or that works against or that stops us from establishing the provincial owned bank and the pharmaceutical company. I must say and emphasize that we are pleased that the legal fully support this process. The report that we have also helps us to you know navigate the compliance space because it does elaborate what the law says and how we can go through that, so this paves the way for us to move forward. IANC eGauteng indulule ngokumisela isikhundla sikasekela sodolophu koomasipala exhuzula imikhala kubo. Oku kubengumvuka wengqungquthela  yesibini yomasipala yalo mbutho nejolise ukufumana izisombululo ngoorhulumente beenkazathi. Eli qela likwathabahe isindululo sokucutha amanyathelo wokuphakamisa isindulolo sokuphelelwa lithemba kunyakamali ngamnye. Kuzakuvunelwa isibini kuphela samanyathelo angokubonakalisa kokuphelelwa lithemba kunyakamali omnye. I-ANC ithi eli ligqinga lokumilisela kuzinzo koorhulumene beenkazathi. Izixeko ezikhulu ezifana neeRhawuti zibe noosekela sodolophu ukuqala kunyulo loomasipala ngo2021. (We are going to create the position of the deputy mayor in all the municipalities to strengthen service delivery and also resolve  as the National African Congress in this summit that we are tired of inconsistences, destabilization and motions of no confidence that are used to destabilize this delivery). I-ANC ithi ichulumancile ngumqela ewuhambileyo susela kwingqungquthela yayo yokuqala yomasipala ngorhulumento lwendibanisela i-ANC kulawulo komasipala abalithoba kwishumi elinanye. ITshwane neMidVaal baphantsi kweDA. (We are readd to defeat hem in the next election we are not worried, we also hear that he says they will swash all he motions ha would come). Kunjalo iStats SA ithi ifuthe lokutshintsha koosodolophu nongabikho kozinzo lingabaleka kuphela emva kwethuba. (In relation to whether the changes and qualities are already showing some level of impact in the numbers it's too early to tell we haven't seen that yet). Kusenjalo umbutho womasipala beli SANGA ivakalise inkxalabo ngokungathathwa koxanduva koomasipala. Usapho lwakwaMakhawula kwaBhaca  eMpumo Koloni lufuna ubulingisa. Oku kulandela ukuba kwadutyulwa kwabulawa isizalwane salo uNyaniso Mac Donald Makhawula ekutyholwa ipolisa kweso siganeka  nesehla ngo Janyuwari ebuthseni balo nyaka. Kwinyanga ezintandathu ezidlulileyo  usapho lakwamaKhawula laphulukana nomntu eluxhomekeke kuye. Olu sapho lutyhola ngelithi alaziswa ngophando olwenziwayo yiIPID, nto nje boyikiswa ziimoto ezingaziwayo bathunyelelwa nemiyalezo ebagrogrisayo ukuba bayeke ukuphanda eli tyala.(Iveni yamapolisa idlulile yayokwenza iyhu theni, few meters away, xa ibuya iveni ibuye yahamba emveni kotata. Atsho ke kumkhuluwa wakhe, Ndiviwe nanga amapolisa. Zange ube abe uyagqiba uba makacacise ubana kwenzekani, kwatsho iigun shots, kwadutyulwa. Badubilile amapolisa wabe utata uyachaneka apha ngemva entloko. Akhomtu urayithi sisi, nangoku lamntana ebephangela emsebenzini orayithi eDurban ubuyile utya treatment yedepression ngoku ndithetha nawe ubuyele back kwitreatment yedepression. Abahlali bathi ukwebiwa kwemfuyo yinto exhaphakileyo kwaBhaca. (Noba kungakhona a sort of iForum ibhildwe kakuhlekuzanywe ukulwa nale beef because abantu abantu abafileyo apha abaphumlanga, abanye bayincamile imfuyo yabo bayithengisile). I-IPI ithi isaliphanda eli tyala .(The are technical reports that still have to be obtained from outside sources, and then after the case will be ready for finalization). Inkokheli yasekuhlaleni unkosana Zolile Makhawula uthi babekhe bane ntlangano namapolisa ephondo malunga neengxaki ezibagubungeleyo eziquka ukwebiwa kwemfuyo nokungabonakali kwamapolisa. NinguNomzwanele Mngoma kwiindaba zeSABC kwaBhaca. Kwalapha ezindabeni, otyholwa ngokutshisa ipalamente nomqholobu uZandile Mafe uvele wadanduluka waqhashambula ngelixa evela enkundleni ngale ntsasa, kodwa masithume umtwana evenkileni kuqala. Sinamkele kwakhona kwindaba zeli jele, uyakwazi ukubukela kwakhona ezi ndaba kwijelo leYoutube uthi SABC iindaba zesiXhosa. Kwinqaku lokuqala sithe,  ugqejwe olunye uduma olungophiyo kwezomthetho umkhuseli woluntu onqunyanyanyisiweyo u-advocate Busisiwe Mkhwebana emva kokuba inkundla yomgaqo siseko igqibe kwelokuba sesikhona isizathu esinesihlahla sokuba umongameli uCyril Ramaphosa amnqumamise esikhundleni. Otyholwa ngokutshisa ipalamente nomqholobu uZandile Mafe uvele wadanduluka waqhashambula kwinkundla ephakamileyo eKapa ngale ntsasa. Ubuyele enkundleni emva kwexesha lovavanyo lwengqondo kwisibhedlele saseMpuma Koloni. Igqwetha lika Mafe livakalise ukuba lizakuzifunela elayo ingxelo yengqondo, likwaveze ukuba lizakucela lihleliselwe iiveki ezintandathu ityala lakhe. Ujaji Nathan Erasmus ulimisile okwexeshana eli tyala emva kokuba uMafe ephinda phinda esithi  wayitshisa ipalamente nokuba kufuneka isuswe eKapa. (Must take it to Bloemfontein that parliament if you donn take it to Pretoria. It must relocate, it must move here this parliament. Iburnt it intentionally. Title: Project
Answer.transcript: Kwindaba zethu Emini nje ayaphokoka amazwi emvelwano emva kokusweleka kowaye sakuba ngumphathiswa kwi ofisi yo mongangameli engu gqirha u zeyn pahad. Kusweleke abantu abalishumi elinesi xhenxe ku qhushumbo lwe rhasi e Boksburg empuma randi. Kwezemidlao I banyana banyana Ifikelele kwisivumelwano semali ne SAFA kanye phambi kokuba induluke isingise kwindebe ye hlabathi e Australia nase New Zeland. Molweni nonke aphe khaya sisamkele nani babukeli bethu kwi jelo lddt ndinga phozisanga Maseko mandigawule ndiwarhuqa. Owaba ngumphathiswa wokuqala kwi ofisi yomongameli u gqirha Essop Pahard ulilandundele eli phakade eneminyaka engamashumi asibhozo ane sine ubudala. U gqirha Pahad waba ngumphathiswa wokuqala ukuchophele I arhente yezo qhagamshelano ka rhulimente I GCIS, uza kufihlwa nge cala emva kwentsimbi yesibini le siya kuyo e west park, ukanti inkonzo yomgcwabo izakubanjelwa e herosek. Ow unyana wetsha ntliziyo lenkululeko u rhaolam mosein pahad owayibeka inqawe ngo 2001, u gqirha Essop Pahad owazalwa nge 21 ka June ngo 1939 e Schweizer e mntla ntshona uwunabele u qaqaqa eneminyaka  eyi 84, ube engu njingalwazi nge PHD yezifundo zembali azi nxonxothe kumthombe we dyunivesity yase UK I Sussex no mgomo wayo owawu gangatha Intshikumo zo politico zama ndiya eMzantsi Afrika ekwasisinxiba mxhaga kwizifindo zobu ngcaphephe kubu gcisa bezopolitiko zobuzwekazi I Afrika kekambe ubesisi thwala ndwe nakwi dyunivesithi I Witwatersrand kwizifundo zenzulu lwazi zezo politico. U Pahad usi khonzile isizwe njengo mphathiswa kwi ofisi yokongamela yase mzantsi afrika e xanduva amalungelo abantwana, izimo zaba khubazekileyo, intlalo yamanina , I komishini yolutsha, unxibelelwano ku rhulemento ne nqobo zobu xhaka xhaka banamhla, ibhunga loku khuthaza utyalo mali kumazwe jikelele ekwakwi arhente yokuphuhlisa yamajelo eendaba ngokuba abandakanye uluntu ngoku ngena mkhethe. Izihlalo nezi khundla ebethenjwe ngazo kungasa sizibala utshatshele kuzo washiya umzila ozinzileyo. Kungoko u mongameli u Cryi ramaphosa e gxwane e mswaneni ephosa amazwi oxolo emaluxakathwe lu sapho, izihlobo, iinkokheli nalilizwe jikelele ngli xesha loku khatywa kwe bhekile ngulowo obeli bhongo lesizwe ukanti ke uzakufihlwa namhlanje u gqirha Essop Pahad malunga ne ntsimbi yesibini e west park e rhawutini, ndim lo lilitha ntsundwane kwindaba ze SABC. Ukanti kengonku siqhagamshelana nqo no mhleli wendaba zopolitiko iSABC u mnumzana Mzwandile mbenje nozakusi tyebisela banzi ngesinga kulindela ngale mva kwe mini xa babeka u gqirha pahad. Sibulise sibulele nange xesha lakho, unikwe eliphi izinga lomngcabo wase bu rhulumenteni u girha Pahad?. Sibonge, siyavuya sibingelele nakuba laleli nebala, sibonile I statement esiphuma kuloyo ongu mongameli njengamanje obambile wazi kaloku umongameli wezwe u cryil ramaphosa ungaphandle use drc okush ukuthi inbambo lika mongameli njenganamhlanje u paul mashatile usethe ke uzomnika izinga lesibini lika rhulumeni loku hlonishwa uma uno kuthi ke laba abadlala iqhaza elibalulekile sebedlulile emhlabeni. Njengoba utshilo futhi sesizwileuhambile u Dr Pahad uzofihlwa ke kulemingcwabo yase west park, nzothi ukuqhela kancance khonu zobona ukuthi nengcwaba lakhe seligujiwe sekulindelwe ukuthi baqale bafike abantu nge hora lesibili kodwa njengoba ubona ubona kusema tasa tasa ngoba abntu basazama ukufaka ama tente ekuzoba ngawona azo singatha umndeni wakwa Pahad bahlale khona bahlale khona esikwaziyo futhi ukuthi uzokuba yizi gaba ezibili lomsebenzi ozokwenziwa namhlanje, isigaba somndeni esi zokuba sifutshane lapho bazakuthi fahla fahla ngamazwi kodwa ke kuza kuthi masekuya esi gabeni esisemthethweni njengokuba sesitshilo ukuthi ibamba lika mongameli li xoke ukuthi oludaba lomngcwabo lubeselu zingeni luka rhulumente. uPaul mashatile nguyena ozokothula inkulumo ezochaza ukuthi ubaba u Pahad ebe ngumntu onjani owasebenza njani okwananje njengoba ubona basa Sebenza abasebenzi bazothi mabeqeda bese ke nalaba bafika nge hora lesibini umcimbi aqale. Mhlawumbe kuyoku qala kakuhle ngo half pat two njengoba kuyabambezeleka  kancane. Kodwa esikwaiyo ukuthi uma li gqamarha u half past four ube umcimbi usu phuthuliwe. Sizokuthulela njengo msakazo we SABC lolu daba ezi ndabeni. Kawutsho ke shandu, ingaba sesiyazi kukuba izo banjwa nini inkonzo yesikumbuzo yakhe?. Akukachazwa loko kodwa dyacabanga umcimbi uzothi mawusuphelile bazokwazi ke batsho ukuthi uzo khunjulwa nini ke kakuhle, uzokhumbula kaloku uzo khunjulwa nini ke kakuhle, uzokhumbula into eyenza ukuba angcwatywe namhlanje yi ngokuba uyinkolo yobu silimane. Umungabe ushonile ukhonza ukhonzo lobusilimane umele uthi ma ushona lithi liyo kushona ilanga nawe ube ube ubekiwe. Bese kuthi kuthi izinto lapho abantu bafuna   ukuhlonipha ubungubani liye kamva. Iqembu lakhe eliwu khongolose yilo elizo phethela lizoba selisazisa ukuthi bazo hlela nini ukumhloniopha ngoku gcwele I memorial service. Sothi utshotsho ubekho shando kandaba ongumhleli wendaba aphekhaya umnumzana mbetshe. Lunyuke lwafika kwi shumi elinesi xhenxe inani labantu abaswelekileyo kulandela ukuvuza kwe rhasi okuqokelela uqhushumbo kwindawo yo gobityholo e Boksburg empuma Randi. Esi sehlo sibandakanya abalishumi elinanye basesi bhedlele. Inkulu baphathiswa e Gauteng umnumzana Lisuphi uqinisekise ngenani labantu abachaphazelekileyono khuseleko lwabo. Kusaqinisekiswe ngabantu abali shumi elinesixhenxe abathe bachaphazeleke kwisehlo esenzeke e Boksburg emva kokuvuza kwe rhasi kumatyotyombe ase enzoelo nfokuhlwa kwayizolo. Abanye basesibhedlele inkulu baphathiswa iqinisekisile ngokuthe kwenzeka .  they are 4 years  and one is mine, that’s what we have we have 16 we have one female and males all awake breathing on their own and on 20 we have one female on oxygen awake and talking and there are 5 adults that have been later admitted this morning there is one that is under oxygen and there is one that has unfortunately passed on and those that are whit the hospital the total number is eleven. Inxalabo yabahlali kukuthi ungaba irhasi azizuphinda ziqhushumbe kusini na kodwa inkulu baphathiswa kusekhona nengxelo elindelekileyo malinga nale nyewe abahlali bakhalazela ukungakwazi nokulala kwindawo yabo ngenxe yezi qhushumbiso ezivakala kuyo yonke indawo. Uthi ingxaki kunzima noku lala bayangxolelwa kukhona imigodi ngapha na ngapha kunzima naku khuseleko kuba amapolisa aya fumbathiswa. Ukanti lendawo inengxaki noo zamazama neziqhushumbisi kuquka no lwaphu mthetho. It really is sad to see the lives that have been lost due to illegal mining the zama zamas in this area have really become out of control. Apho kubuhlungu khona kukuba abantu baphulukene nezihloba ne zalamane zabo ngenxa yesi sehlo. Umongameli ongu mfela ndawonye wemanyano zabasebenzi I COSATU u zingiswa lusu ukhokela uqhanqalazo lwabasebenzi e gqeberha empuma koloni lomfela ndawonye uququzelele uqhanqalazo losuku olunye kuzwe lonke ukuqaqambisa imiba edlumzi kwezaba sebenzi nakuluntu lweli. U  lusu uthi bazaku hqithisa intlaninge yama xwebhu  ezinyanzeliso zabo kumasebe ohlukeneyo. beza kunikezela nezi xwebhu lezinyanzeliso kumaseba ahlukeneyo bekhalela into yokubana intswela ngqesho, I crime I corruption nezinye izinto abaza kuzi balula kodwa ke apha enkqubeni ndinaye u mongameli we COSATU umama u zingiswa lusi, mama masikwamkele enkqubeni khawusixelele nje ngmini yanamhlanje nezinto eniza kuzenza apho siyakhona. Mandibulise kuwe msasaz ndibulise nakuba babukeli namhlanje sidibene apha e gqeberha kodwa kumhlaba wonke kwilizwe lonke lomzantsi afrika kumaphondo alithuba, siya thina apha e vuyisile muni square siyonikezela uxwebhu lwezikhalazo kodwa singanikelzeli zikhalazo sinikezela nezi sombululo kwingxaki esizi bonayo, siyonika ke ophethe iixeko u mayor, sinike umphathi wama polisa sinike ophetheyo apha kwi candelo lwabasebenzi I department of employment and labour siphinde sinikezele ku MEC onikwe ukuba makaphathe kwi candelo lezo mnotho, sithi ke siyi cosatu imiba esijongene nayo emzantsi Africa yimiba efika ichaphazele abasebenzi ichaphazelele nabanga phangeliyo imiba yentswela ngqesho, imiba yorhwaphilizo beza kunikezela nezi xwebhu lezinyanzeliso kumaseba ahlukeneyo bekhalela into yokubana intswela ngqesho, I crime I corruption nezinye izinto abaza kuzi balula kodwa ke apha enkqubeni ndinaye u mongameli we COSATU umama u zingiswa lusi, mama masikwamkele enkqubeni khawusixelele nje ngmini yanamhlanje nezinto eniza kuzenza apho siyakhona. Title: Project
Answer.transcript: Everymorning xayehlanjwa uyakhala , ukhe ubone? Uworse apha ezingalweni, ibihlu lento. Lamntana every morning xayehlanjwa uyakhala. Lufuna ubulungisa usapho lomntwana oyinkwenkwana nekukrokrelwa uba utshiswe ngamanzi ashushu ngowasethyini. Baphila ubomi bentshontsho abahlali baseWelkom kwaye bamelela ungenelelo lwamapolisa. Ibafanabafana iphumelele umdlalo wayo wesibini kwindebe yeCOSAS ngamanqaku amabini kwelinye. Molweni emakhaya khongozelani uvimba esinilungiselele wona ngokuhlwanje. Sithande ukulumkisa abo bantliziyo ziluthathaka ngelinqaku usapho lomntwana wakwaLanga eKapa kwiphondo laseNtshona Koloni otshiswe ngamanzi ashushu ngowasetyhini ohlala ekuhlaleni nomemelela ukuba kwenziwe ubulungisa. Kutyholwa ukuba uAsanda Matshaluza utshise ngamanzi inkwenkwana eneminyaka emine ngethuba idlala nabahlobo bayo ngakokwayo. Kungoku nje umntwana utshe ebusweni nasemzimbeni. Oku kwenzeke kwinyanga ephelileyo kodwa umrhanelwa yena unqakulwe kwiintsuku nje ezimbalwa ezidlulileyo. Usele ke ethe muku enkundleni ngesisihelegu. Usapho lwalemveku luthi eyonanto enokubaxolisa kuba umtheto wobulungiswa uthabathe indima yawo. Esisenzo sikwabashiye bexhwalekile emphufumlweni. Umntu xa enje into ewrongo kumele ajeziswe ngesenzo sakhe. Ukuba kwakungonto yokuba yena zange enze ngolwahlobo bekumele azoxolisa kuthi “hayi ibiyimistake ,hayi bekwenze kanje” Xa ethi ezobuzwa uphendula into engeyiyo, uyathuka emva koko so sabona sidelelekile sicekelwe phantsi nguAsanda. Sakhubeka ke kwababuhlungu, zange sive kamnandi. Uluntu lwasezone 17 lushiyeke ngasemva lulugxwabevu ngumsindo emveni koku. Mna ndingumakhelwane wakhe, everymorning uyakhala xayehlanjwa worse apha ezingalweni. Ibihlungu lento, every moring uyakhala lamntana. Akazange akhale lamntana xayehlanjwa. Lomntana uzokhula like isixa sokutsha asipheli, uzokhula eneanger mncinci lamntana mncinci kakhulu. Ndikhathazeke nyani bhuti andifuni nokuxoka. Elityala lihlehliselwe iveki ezayo de kufunyanwe iinkcukacha malunga nesicelo sebheyile. UMakhaluza ushiyeka engolongoloza eziseleni ezibandayo kungokunjenana. Abahlali babongoza kwabasemagunyeni ngelithi makalelwe ibheyile umrhanelwa lona . NdinguMlamli Maneli kwiindaba zeSABC eKapa. Babanjwe yinxalabo abahlali baseWelkom logama bememelela ukubona amapolisa kwingingqi yabo emveni kokudutyulwa kwabantu abasixhenxe kwindawo yentselo kwaseleka omnye wabo. Okwangoku babini abarhanelwa abayanyiswa nalenyewe. Amaxhala axhomile namaphaphu aphezulu kubahlali baseThabong ngenkuseleko yabo nabo babathandayo kulengingqi nanjengoko amanqanaba obundlobongela eqatsela . Iimbutho zemigewu ziguzule ulutsha oluthwaxwe yintswela ngqesho ukungqoloba abahlali namashishini wabemi bangaphandle. Uthi bandlandlathekiswa bubundlobongela kulengingqi yaye ukholelwa ukuba intswela ngqesho ngunobangela. Kungoku abantu baphila ubomi bentshontsho. Iqengqelekile iminyaka engaphaya kwamashumi anambini lengingqi yonganyelwe yimigulukudu. Abahlali bakholelwa ukuba lishwangusha eli elisuka kwisizukulwana ukuya kwesinye kodwa ngoku bathi unotshe unokuqhubeka ngokutshikela kwamatshijolo kulendawo. Uthi ingxaki abajamelene nayo namapolisa emnxebeni bahamba ngonyawo lonwabu ukuya kufika kwindawo ababhalele kuyo bafika sele kukudala isiganeko zenzekile. Iqonga lasekuhlaleni lenjongo zokhuseleko laqala ukusebenza kulengingqi ukuqala konyaka. Liyanqwala ukuba alenzi ngokwaneleyo eliqonga linamaungu asibhozo kuphela yaye baziva bengafumani nkxaso eliqiliba kumapolisa. Amapolisa avakalisa ukuba kunesikhululo sakwabakwantsasana esithyuthya-thyuthya kulengingqi . Amapolisa athi ukwakhiwa kwesikhululo samapolisa kulengingqi kuyoba yinkqubo eyokuthabatha ithuba elide. Kuyatarhuzisa nakubantu beendawo zentselo ukuba bayithabathele ingqalelo inkuseleko yabathengi .  Usapho lwaseLimpopo luthi alusenathemba lokuba amapolisa azakude amnqakule umbulali wentombi yayo. ULerato Mamabolo ushiywe eswelekile ecaleni kwendlela emva kokuba egqitywa kubonwa nancumisana naye nokwanguyise kwabantwana bakhe ngempela veki egqithileyo. Lowasethyini oneminyaka engamashumi amathathu anesine ophume ngo30 ngaseKronvillestat kukholelwa ukuba ubethwe kanobom ngulowo ancumisana naye. Uye wonganyelwa ngamanxeba wasweleka kwisibhedlele sasePhiladelphia. Ukanti indoda ekukholelwa ukuba yiyo embuleleyo isahambahamba ngokukhululekile ezitalatweni.  Usapho luka Mamabolo eMutoti eDenellton lusothukie yindlela emasikizi esweleke ngalo intombi yabo. Umzimba kaLerato Mamabolo ufunyanwe nasendleleni ngabantu abagqithayo. Uye wabalekiselwa esibhedlela nalapho aye wonganyelwa ngamanxeba ayo. Ukusweleka kwakhe kothuse iingqingqi ezininzi. Usapho lutyhola uyise wabantwana bakhe ngesisohlo. nosabonwe esehla esenyuka ezitalatweni ngokukhululekwileyo. Bathyola ngelithi iamapolisa aseDenallton aphanzile ukubamba umrhanelwa nangona kuvulwe ityala. Usapho luthi umrhanelwa ufaka ityuwa emnxebeni nanjengoko ethe gqolo egqitha ngakwikhaya lolusapho. Kubonakala ngathi ebemkhaba, ebenawo namanxeba entloko washiywa nasendlini. Akaqali kumbetha sisothukile silusapho ukuba umntu usweleka njani engagulanga. Umama wexhoba uthi ufuna kwenziwe ubulungisa kwintombi yakhe kubanjwe umenzi wobubi. Asidanisile kakhulu amapolisa kuba nangoku akukabanjwa mntu. Ndifuna abanjwe umrhanelwa ayophoswa kwesimnyama isisele kulahlwe nezitsixo. Kungoku nje olusapho luthi xa amapolisa engade athathe manyathelo ngelityala luzakuthatha uxanduva lokufumana umrhanelwa ngokwalo.  Unyana wam uwafowunele amapolisa ngecawa emva kokuba ebonwe esehlika emotweni. Amapolisa athe makajonge ukuba uhlalaphi ibengona afowunela amapolisa . Lento isothusile silusapho kuba ngoku siyazibuza ukuba sijike sangamapolisa na lento ekufuneka elandelelwe sithi umrhanelwa. Siwafowunele ke kodwa emva kokubona ukuba uhlalaphi kodwa khange kubanjwe umnxeba.  Ukantu amapolisa kweliphondo laseLimpopo athe tyum ngamomba nangona eceliwe ukuba aphefumle. Iphondo laseMpoma Koloni lijamelene namantsintsintsi okugqithisa iinkonzo zamanzi nogutyulo kubemi balo ngenxa yolondolozo olurhuqa pantsi nokutshatyalaliswa kophuhliso kweziseko ezingundoqo wamanzi. Ukusilela kwamasipala ukuchitha imali kumaphulo okugqithisa amanzi kuyayiqatselisa lemeko. Isebe lobambisano norhulumento lwaseMpuma Koloni kubambogqiza nezicwangciso zokuqokozela ngaphaya kwamanzi nogutyulo. Ukufumana amanzi acocekileyo lilungelo eliqulathwe kumgwaqo siseko kodwa ukuziswa kweenkonzo zamanzi kungumngeni kwiinkonzo zikamasipala kweliphondo. Abemi beliphondo bathi ukungalungiswa kwamanzi kunegalelo kwingxaki yokushokoxeka kwamanzi. Amanzi esiwaselayo awasiphathi kakuhle ngaba nawo kaloku ayachaphazeleka kuba lendlu ilapha ekugqibeleni and then ke yonke lesuwa ifikelela apha kuthi. Abantu abasemagunyeni bathi ukuxokonyezelwa kweetephu ngokungekho semagunyeni kongeza kwiingxaki zokushokoxeka kwamanzi. Umthamo ezazenzele wona ungaphantsi kwezi zisetyenziswayo. Ulwawulo lomasipala lithi ikhona inkxaso ezakuncedisana noomasipala abasokolayo ukusebenzisa imali ebekelwe iinkonzo zamanzi. Thina singuKhokta iDepartment of water affairs kunyenoMISA siyasebenzisana noomasipala ukuplana into yokuba mabayikhawulezise into yokuqasha iicompanies zikwazi ukubasesaythini ngoJuly. Abantu bayabongozwa ukuba bawalondoloze amanzi , babike neendawo ezivuzayo kananjalo. NdinguLubabalo Dada kwiindaba zeSABC eMpuma Koloni.  Ukubakho kwamandla ombane kweli kuxhume ngomyinge ongamashumi amathathu ekhulwini wakhokhelela kumaqondo asezantsi acimicimi.

Title: Project
Answer.transcript: IANC ibambe indibano emsinga ngalempelaveki ukuxuzula imiba yoqoqosho namalungiselelo ayo onyulo lwa2024. Imiba ngoshokoxeko lombane kweli selingumba osisigxina kwiingxoxo zeNEC nanjengoko eliqela lilawulayo lizama ukuwuphelisa locimicimi. Kweli bangaphephumla noko nanjengoko isimo esimandundu socimicimi sidedile etafileni okwangoku. Ilungu leNEC ugqirha Kgoseontso Ramakgupa uthi zonke iimpawu zintama kukuba ilizwe alisayi kukekelela kwim emaxongo yodanyacimi. Kulindeleke yande imfuno yambane nanjengoko kulindeleke umsinga womoya obandayo kumantla elizwe.  IANC ikwanike uxanduva ugqirha Ramakgupa aqubisane nenkqubo yohambiso lombane ukuthintela umbhodamo wokuhohloka koovimba bombane. IANC ikokhelise phambili ukuphelisa nya ucimicimi wombane phantsi konyulo lwazwelonke kulonyaka uzayo. Yaye ifuna ukusebenza kwizikhululo ezivelisa u600mw wamandla. Zinikwe ingqwalasela , zivelise ngaphandle kwamagingxigingxi.  Amanye amaqela ezopolitiko amemelele urhulumente ukuba akuchithe ukwembiwa kwemigodi ngokungekho semthethweni. Oku okweva kokuvuza kwesixhobo secylinder segesi eBoksburg. Nyewe leyo yayanyaniswa noozamazama yathatha imiphefumlo, ishiye neengxwelerha. Esisiganeko sibangele ukuba amanye amaqela ezopolitiko amemelele ukutyalwa kwamajoni ukulwa izenzo zokwembiwa kwemigodi ngokungekho semthethweni.Amanye amaqela amemelela ukuqiniswa kwemithetho elawula ukusetyenziswa kwerhasi. Amanye athi ungenelelo ukwembiwa kwemigodi ngokungekho semthethweni malukhawuleziswe. Uluzipho uthi ukwembiwa kwemigodi ngokungekho emthethweni kugrogrisa ukhuseleko kwelilizwe njengoko iziganeko zolwaphulomthetho ezoyanyiswa nako zinobuzaza. NdinguLulama Matya weendaba zeSABC epalamente eKapa. Amaqela ecandelo lentlekele achophe phezu kwezithende kwiphondo iZulunatal. Oku kulandela isilumkiso semozulu esimaxongo eThekwini nakwimimandla ekunxweme. Oku kwenzela ngelixa amaxhoba esichotho aseNanda kwiiveki ezimbini ezidlulileyo ebesaxhwarhiswe kwiholo yoluntu. Iziseko zophuhlisa zombane, amanzi kunye neeblorho zoonakaliswa.  Kanti elishiya eli limagad’ahlabayo ushiya izinto zakhe ngasemva kunjalonje ukwashiya nentabalala yolwazi ngaye kumakhasi onxibelelwano. Wakhe nje wathatha umzuzu ucinge kwenzeka ntoni kwiisocial media page zakho xa usweleka. Sinaye ke uSandile Hlangani sizothetha ngalomba . Sandile siyakwamkela, kwenzeka ntoni kwisocial media page emva kokuba umntu ethe wasweleka . Abantu abanintsi abangayaziyo yilanto kuthiwa ngesilungu yidigital footprint. Zizinto othi wena uzenze kwisocial media noba nguwhatsapp, noba nguInstagram , noba ngutwitter. Uyabhala phaya iipictures zakho nezabanye abantu. Ezazinto eziya xasele (inaudible). Icebo ke asele eze nalo ufacebook ke uMeta noInstagram noTwitter uthe makenze into ekuthiwa yimemory. Ngamanye amagama umemoriser iaccounti leyakho wena mntu uzawusweleka okanye umntu osele esishiyile. Icebo elihle kukuba ngalomzuzu usaphilayo wena wenze lento siyibiza ngokuba yilegacy person. Ilegacy person ngumntu othi wena umthyumbe okokuba uthi wena xa sele udlulile emhlabeni olawula iaccount yakho. Ubukhulu becala ke ungayifaka lento lena (inaudible) ukwenzela okokubana ngoba abanye abantu abafuni ukusharer okanye ukunikezela ngeinformation yabo iilogin details kufacebook okanye kutwitter. Lamntu yena nguye ozakuyenza lonto leyo ukuze kube imemorisiwe loaccount yakho. Into eyenzekayo kuzawubhalwa ucakwegama lakho “remembering”. Lememory kulapho ke iifriends zakho nefamily zidibana khona zishiye amazwi nayiphi na into abafuna ukuyithetha ngawe xasele uhambile.  Sandile yenzeka lento xasele uyilungiselele? Abantu baye bathini xabengenazo neepasswords zalomntu? Into ekufuneka beyenzile kengoku abantu xabengenazo iinkcukacha zokuyivula leaccount kufuneka babhalele ufacebook okanye utwitter leyo account (inaudible). Izinto abazifunayo zizinto ezifana nedeath certificate yalomntu ushiyileyo okanye ubashiyileyo . Ukuba ngumntwana omncinci oyiminor kufuneka abanike lento kuthiwa yibirth neID yakhe umntu omdala. Xabesuka (inaudible) bazawninika imemory kodwa into abangasoze bayenze kukuninika iinkcukacha (inaudible), into abanokuyenza kukuba bayimemorise. Sandile siyabulela ngexesha lakho . Ithe engcochoyini kagroup A ibafanabafana kwitumente yeCOSAFA Cup eqhubayo ethekwini ngethuba idlala neNamibia ibafana ize ngasemva yafaka inqaku yalinganisa. Waphela umdlalo ngenqaku macala ngokufanayo. Ngokufanayo ibafana izimisele ngakumbi de yayibhaxuka iBotswana ngamanqaku amabini eqandeni namanqaku amane kwimidlalo emibini ngoku ibafana ishiyekelwe ngumdlalo omnye eSwatini ukuzibekela indawo kwiisemi finals zokhuphiswano. Nanga amabali ngomdlalo webafana neBotswana. Ngalendlela siwuqongqothile uvimba wangokuhlwanje, masidibane ngomso xeshanye.

Title: Project
Answer.transcript: Umongameli uCyril Ramaphosa uthi lulwimi etywaleni ukuba kufunwa ukubhukuqwa usekela mongameli uPaul Mashatile. Ivuliwe ngoku indlela ekuwhola wendlela iN3  phakathi kweVan ndrinies pass neEscourt KwaZuluNatal nebivalwe zizigadla. UMac sestafien weredbull usatshotshentla kumdyakho weemoto zegranpri emva kokulwa kubemdakisana kukhuphiswano lwaseSilverston eBrithani. Molweni emakhaya nanku uvimba esinilungiselele wona kuhlwanje. Umongameli uCyril Ramaphosa uthi akukho cebo lokugxotha usekela mongameli uPaul Mashatile. Oku kusemva kweengxelo ezibalwe ngusekela mongameli ngalomba. Umongameli uCyril Ramaphosa uzihlabile izithyolo zobhukuqo lukasekela mongameli uPaul Mashatile esithi abukho baphela ubunyaniso kwezizihloko zezintlokomo. OkaRamaphosa ebekwiingxoxo namajelo eendaba emva komhlangano wekomiti yeANC jikelele yakulempela veki eBoksburg. Ikomiti yeANC ishukuxe imiba ebalekayo eqhoka eli equka kodwa engaphelelanga kule, ucimicimi, ungeno lwemida yeli ngokungekho mthethweni. Ngolubangela neenquleqhu  kwezamandla okaRamaphosa uthe ikomiti yeANC ikhuthazekile yinkqubekela.  Kumngeni woqwebhu lokuvalela umongameli waseRussia uFreden Putin ludluliswa yiIEC nengqungquthela yeBRICS umongameli uCyril Ramaphosa uthe lomhlangano awuzokubanjwa ngobuxhakaxhaka banamhlanje .  Ivuliwe ngoku indlela enaba kuwhola wendlela uN3 enaba phambili kweVan ndrinies pass neEscourt KwaZuluNatal. Lendlela ibivaliwe ngenxa yeenkqubo zokucoca iimvuthuluka zezigadla ezintandathu ebezinongquzulwano namhlanje . Abasemagunyeni bathi ulibaziseko kuwhola uN3 kulithwaxa ilizwe ngeebillion zerandi nanjengoko amaziko amabini oqoqosho laseDurban nelaseRhawutini ethungelana ngoN3. (speaks in Zulu)  Liyonyuka izinga lokuxhonyiswa kweemoto kwezithwalimali eMpumalanga konzakaliswe abalindi abane kwiziganeko ezibini zokuqweqwedisa ezithwalimali ehlanzeni kuleveki. Amapolisa azingela abaphandi ababaleke nentywentywa engadizwanga emva kokuqhushumbiswa kwezimoto. Kuqweqwediswe enye imoto ethwala imali kumgwaqo iR40 eMarigde eBukbaksrigde. Kuqhamke uqhoqhozwano phakathi konqwalintloko nabalind’ukwenzakala amagosa okhuselo amabini . Ukhe wavalwa umgwaqo ngelixa amapolisa ebeqokelela iinkcukacha zokubalikhubalo kuphando lwezikrelemnqa. Kwiintsuku ezintathu ezidlulileyo naseSabhi kumgwaqo iWhite river kuphangwe enye imoto ethwalimali . Iqela lamadoda livulele ngezulu nezandla laphela emehlweni nentyela yemali engaqangazwanga . Abalindi ababini abafulathelwe ngamawabo babolekisana ngezincwinana izigulane sibhedlela. Abahlali abambonzeleka kwindawo yexhwayelo  ngelokuzixathulela iintsalela baphazamisana nengalo yomthetho batshilo abakwantsasana.  Kuwe ikhephu kwiintaba zaseCyrus kwiphondo leNtshona Koloni. Kuvakala inkwanca kulolonke eliphondo nanjengoko kukho umsinga obandayo. Kulindeleke ukuba iqhubeke ingqele eqhaqhazelisa amazinyo nemvula emandla kwiingqingqi eziliqela kweliphondo. Umyezo wezilwanyana zasendle iMytrosburg nature reserve utsala uninzi nanjengoko abantu begaleleka ngobunintsi kuwo kobubusika nangona kukhw’ingqele eqhaqhazelisa amazinyo ngethemba lokuzibonela ikhephu . (speaks in English) Inkonzo yoMzantsi Afrika iqikelela ukuba usuka lwangomso luzakuba lolona lubandayo ngenxa yokubakho komsinga womoya obandayo . Kukwalindeleke ukuba kuwe ikhephu nemvula emandla kulengingqi ukanti abantu abangena zindawo zokufihla iintloko ngabona bazakuchatshazelwa yilengqele izawube iqhaqhazelisa amazinyo.  Ukuhlala estratweni kunzima kulesimo esikuso khona manje kuba kuyabanda, kuyagodolwa, mangingathola nje omunye umuntu ongasizwela ubuhlungu asilethele ingubo nempahla efudumele. (speaks in english) Kukhutshwe isilumkiso somoya obhudla ngamandla iAlexander Bay nasePlattenberg Bay liziko elijongene neentlekele lithi liyibekele phantsi kweliso elibukhali lemeko. Ukuqinisekisa ukuba abahlali bayamelana neengqele ezisikethanjeni umbutho ongajonganganzunzo eKarerha imother’s gift ubonelela ngesoup, iziqhamo nemifuno kubalali abasweleyo. Umbutho unikisa ngokutya okushushu kubahlali abakumakhulu amane neziphaluka qho ngeveki . Kwezingqele zigqugqisa iMpuma Koloni kobubusika imfuno yokutya okushushu yandile.  Amaqondo obushushu afikele ku11 degrees eTinarha namhlanje. Uninzi loluntu lwalapha ludinga ukutya okushushu nanjengoko kubanda. Okukabethi nentsimbi yeshumi kusasa kodwa abantu abatsha nabantu abadala sele befolile ukufumana into eyaphantsi kwempumlo. Kukutya kokuqala nokokugqibela kubantu balapha . Lesoup kitchen iluncedo kakhulu kubantu balapha nezinye iilokishi nalapha izinga liphezulu.
